title: Jeffrey Smith on Food Fight: Truth about GMOs
body:
Are genetically modified foods safe to eat? Not according to investigator Jeffrey Smith, creator of the film Genetic Roulette, who uncovered what the food industry doesn’t want you to know in an interview on Beyond Belief with George Noory.

International best-selling author Jeffrey M. Smith is the leading spokesperson on the health dangers of Genetically Modified Organisms (GMOs). His first book, Seeds of Deception: Exposing Industry and Government Lies about the Safety of the Genetically Engineered Foods You’re Eating, became the world’s best-selling and #1 rated book on GMOs. His second book, Genetic Roulette: The Documented Health Risks of Genetically Engineered Foods, is the authoritative work that presents irrefutable evidence that GMOs are harmful.
teaser: Hear how the world’s most powerful Ag biotech companies bluff and mislead critics, and put the health of society at risk.

title: John Hogue on Nostradamus, 2012 and the End of Times
body:
Does the end of the Mayan calendar really mean the end of days? Author John Hogue, considered the world’s authority on Nostradamus, shared his thoughts on the subject with George Noory.

Defining himself as a “Rogue” Scholar, John Hogue has traveled three times around the world studying meditation disciplines, reporting on new religious movements and compiling a reference of the world’s new millennium prophecies. Considered the world authority on Nostradamus and other prophetic traditions, Hogue is critically acclaimed for his ability to cut through the social, religious and nationalistic projections of prophets to find the threads of insight they all share.
teaser: Does the end of the Mayan calendar really mean the end of days?

title: Katherine Albrecht on Digital Stalking: Do You Know Who's Watching You?
body:
Is it only a matter of time before people are micro-chipped for 24/7 tracking? It’s not as far-fetched as you think, explained privacy crusader Katherine Albrecht, in an interview on Beyond Belief with George Noory.

Host of the daily syndicated radio show Uncovering the Truth with Katherine Albrecht since early 2007, Katherine is the author or co-author of six books and videos, including the award-winning bestseller Spychips: How Major Corporations and Governments Plan to Track your Every Move with RFID. She is also the Director of CASPIAN Consumer Privacy (Consumers Against Supermarket Privacy Invasion and Numbering), a grass-roots organization she founded to oppose shopper surveillance in 1999.
teaser: Is it only a matter of time before people are micro-chipped for 24/7 tracking?

title: Joshua Warren on Hunting Ghosts
body:
How do we find evidence of the spirit world? Paranormal investigator Joshua Warren shares the tools and technology he uses to find ghosts in an interview with George Noory.

Joshua P. Warren is a world-renowned paranormal investigator who currently appears on the Travel Channel series Paranormal Paparazzi and hosts a regional radio show, Speaking of Strange. He has also been regularly featured on TLC, the Travel Channel, and the History Channel. As president of his research team, L.E.M.U.R., Warren uses scientific methods to document unexplainable activity.
teaser: How do we find evidence of the spirit world? Paranormal investigator Joshua Warren shares the tools and technology he uses to find ghosts.

title: Lloyd Pye on History and the Alien Skull
body:
Can one unusual skull prove the existence of aliens on earth? Researcher Lloyd Pye shares his remarkable findings with George Noory.

A researcher and author known for his work with the Starchild Skull, a one-of-a-kind skull that raises questions about human alien hybrids, Lloyd Pye writes extensively about mainstream science normally kept from public discussion because it cast doubts on currently accepted paradigms and dogmas.
teaser: Can one unusual skull prove the existence of aliens on earth? Researcher Lloyd Pye shares his remarkable findings.

title: The Answer to Cancer with Dr. Leonard Coldwell
body:
Cancer is one of the leading health concerns, today, from colon to breast cancer. It is good to know that there are many things that you can do to help prevent and cure cancer. In this interview, Dr. Leonard Coldwell explains to George Noory what his tips and treatments for cancer patients are.
Dr. Leonard Coldwell is known for his writing on cancer treatment, Stress-Related Illness, and Burnout Syndrome. He is the author of 19 bestselling books, including: The Only Answer to Cancer, The Only Answer to Surviving Your Illness and Your Doctor. Dr. Coldwell’s system for healing is called the Instinct Based Medicine System®(or IBMS), which seeks to eliminate the root cause of all disease.
Video Disclaimer: The information contained in the multimedia content posted represents the views and opinions of the original creators of such Video Content and does not necessarily represent the views or opinions of Gaia.
teaser: Cancer is one of the leading health concerns, today. It is good to know that there are many things that you can do to help prevent and cure cancer. Dr. Leonard Coldwell explains the latest tips and treatments.

title: Past Lives, Future Lives with Bruce Goldberg
body:
Many people claim to have had astounding revelations from past lives. Still, others remain skeptical to the notion of other lifetimes. Yet, if it is possible that the soul reincarnates, what lessons can we learn from past life regression? Dr. Bruce Goldberg, a clinical hypnotherapist and author of, The Search for Grace and Astral Voyages, explains his research into past life regression in this interview with George Noory. 

Dr. Bruce Goldberg is a clinical hypnotherapist and a dentist who wrote the international bestseller, Past Lives, Future Lives, as well as, The Search for Grace, (which was made into a CBS movie), Astral Voyages, and many others.  Dr. Goldberg has regressed over 15,000 patients into over 35,000 past and future lifetimes.
teaser: Many people claim to have had astounding revelations from past lives while others remain skeptical. Is possible that the soul reincarnates and what lessons can we learn from past life regression? Dr. Bruce Goldberg, a clinical hypnotherapist and author of, The Search for Grace and Astral Voyages, explains.

title: Alive in the Light with Dannion Brinkley
body:
When a loved one is near death, the body may be near its end but the soul is vibrant and alive in the light. With someone so close to the spirit world yet still attached to their body, there may be lessons we can learn from them as they lay upon their deathbeds. Dannion Brinkley, author of Saved by the Light, shares what he’s learned from near-death experiences, his own and those of countless others with George Noory.

An internationally renowned author and speaker in the field of spirituality, self-development and Complementary and Alternative Medicine, Dannion Brinkley is the author of three international best-selling books: Saved by the Light, At Peace in the Light and Secrets of the Light. In addition, he has experienced three of the most complete Near Death Experiences (NDEs) ever recorded.
teaser: When a loved one is near death the body may be near its end, but the soul is alive in the light. There may be lessons we can learn from people on their deathbeds as they are so close to the spirit world. Dannion Brinkley, author of Saved by the Light, shares what he’s learned from near-death experiences.

title: The CryptoHunter with John Rhodes
body:
Science has yet to discover all of the species of life here on planet Earth. Of the species yet to be discovered, we may be in for some big surprises. CryptoHunter John Rhodes explains his passion for cryptozoology and the search for mysterious creatures from reptilian-humanoids to big foot and the Loch Ness monster in this interview with George Noory. 

John Rhodes is the world's foremost authority on reptilian-humanoids or reptilian aliens. His pioneering work, investigating claims of reptilian alien contact, eventually resulted in the birth of an entirely new genre of study in the UFO community.
teaser: Science has yet to discover all of the species of life here on planet Earth. Of the species yet to be discovered, we may be in for some big surprises. CryptoHunter John Rhodes explains his search for mysterious creatures from reptilian-humanoids to big foot and the Loch Ness monster.

title: The Rainbow Body
body:
There are over 180,000 documented cases of people transforming into a "light body" after death. This is not a normal process one experiences at the moment of death. Rather, the rainbow body is a major jump in the evolution of human consciousness. Once accessible only to those working with highly advanced spiritual disciplines. Now, this experience may be accessible to all of us. David Wilcock, author of The Source Field Investigations, shares his perspective in this interview with George Noory. 

David Wilcock is a professional lecturer, filmmaker and researcher of ancient civilizations, consciousness science, and new paradigms of matter and energy. His upcoming Hollywood film, CONVERGENCE, unveils the proof that all life on Earth is united in a field of consciousness, which affects our minds in fascinating ways.
teaser: There are over 180,000 documented cases of people transforming into a "light body" after death. Once only accessible to those working with advanced spiritual disciplines, anyone may now be able to transform into a rainbow body. David Wilcock, author of The Source Field Investigations, shares his perspective.

title: Speaking with Spirits with James Van Praagh
body:
We all have the ability to reach beyond the veil to communicate with those who have died. It may be easier than you thought and you may already be doing it. Well-known medium James Van Praagh shares how to fine-tune your extrasensory perception to speak with spirits in this interview with George Noory.

The New York Times bestselling author of Unfinished Business, Ghosts Among Us and Talking to Heaven, James Van Praagh is considered a pioneer in the mediumship movement and the voice of the spirit world for more than twenty-five years. He is also the co-executive producer of the hit CBS primetime series Ghost Whisperer, starring Jennifer Love Hewitt.
teaser: We all have the ability to reach beyond the veil to communicate with those who have died. It may be easier than you thought and you may already be doing it. Well-known medium James Van Praagh shares how to fine-tune your extrasensory perception to speak with spirits.

title: Season of the Witch with Fiona Horne
body:
The ancient ways of bringing about positive changes to heart, mind and home are once again becoming accepted practices as the season of the witch begins to unfold anew.  Practicing witch Fiona Horne explains Wicca and how magic spells can influence your world in positive ways in this interview with George Noory.

Known in the U.S., U.K. and Australia as a leading expert on modern witchcraft, Fiona Horne is also an accomplished actor, rock singer and television/radio host.  As the author of L.A. Witch: Fiona Horne's Guide to Coven Magick, she is considered to be the world’s most recognizable author on white witchcraft.
teaser: The ancient ways of bringing about positive changes to heart, mind and home are once again becoming accepted practices as the season of the witch begins to unfold anew.  Practicing witch Fiona Horne explains Wicca and how magic spells can influence your world in positive ways.

title: Finding Your Soul Mate with Marla Martenson
body:
Finding the ideal life partner can be one of the greatest challenges we may face. It’s good to know, that while you are searching, your soul mate is out there looking for you, too. Let Beverly Hills matchmaker Marla Martenson teaches you how to attract your soul mate in this interview with George Noory.

A professional matchmaker working in Los Angeles since 2001, Marla Martenson has helped countless couples connect with their soul mates and go on to marriage. Author of Diary of A Beverly Hills Matchmaker, she is also a certified life/dating coach and motivational speaker.
teaser: Finding the ideal life partner can be one of the greatest challenges we may face. It’s good to know, that while you are searching, your soul mate is out there looking for you, too. Let Beverly Hills matchmaker, Marla Martenson teach you how to attract your soul mate.

title: Defying the Doctrine of UFO Denial with Stanton Friedman
body:
Despite countless eyewitness accounts, the U.S. government has never officially declared the nature of UFOs. Is there proof that some UFOs have been alien visitors? Nuclear physicist Stanton Friedman, the original civilian investigator of the Roswell Incident, reveals the secret history of UFOs in this interview with George Noory. 

The original civilian investigator of the Roswell Incident, nuclear physicist Stanton Friedman is a professional Ufologist who resides in Fredericton, New Brunswick, Canada.  He studied physics at the University of Chicago and worked as a nuclear physicist on research and development projects for several large companies.
teaser: Despite countless eyewitness accounts, the U.S. government has never officially declared the nature of UFOs. Is there proof that some UFOs have been alien visitors? Nuclear physicist Stanton Friedman, the original civilian investigator of the Roswell Incident, reveals the secret history of UFOs.

title: Psychic Readings: What's in the Cards? with Joseph Jacobs
body:
The future is a mysterious place full of endless possibilities. Fortunately for us, a few people have the intuition and tools, such as cards and astrology, to reveal the light of what has yet to come. Joseph Jacobs, called the psychic to the psychics, explains the tools of psychic readings and shares his insights for the year ahead in this interview with George Noory.

Called the Dean of American Psychics, Joseph Jacobs is an internationally known psychic who uses a combination of cards, numerology and intuition to formulate his readings. He has previously worked as a pre-production consultant on NBC's The Other Side and has hosted his own local cable show.
teaser: The future is a mysterious place full of endless possibilities. Fortunately for us, some people have the intuition and tools, such as cards and astrology, to reveal the light of what has yet to come. Joseph Jacobs, called the psychic to the psychics, explains psychic readings and shares his insights for the year ahead.

title: Shroud of Turin: Secrets Revealed with Barrie Schwortz
body:
No other piece of Christian history has stirred more controversy than the Shroud of Turin. Though it is the single most studied artifact in human history, its origins remain a mystery. Barrie Schwortz, the original documenting photographer of the Shroud of Turn, reveals the secrets he has discovered in this interview. 

As the Official Documenting Photographer for the Shroud of Turin Research Project, Inc., (STURP), Barrie M. Schwortz was a member of the team that completed the first extensive scientific examination of the Shroud of Turin in 1978.
teaser: No other piece of Christian history has stirred more controversy than the Shroud of Turin. Though it is the single most studied artifact in human history, its origins remain a mystery. Barrie Schwortz, the original documenting photographer of the Shroud of Turin, reveals the secrets he has discovered.

title: Exopolitics with Paola Leopizzi Harris
body:
Wild speculation has grown about the governments’ involvement with extraterrestrial life. There are only a few people who know the truth. Investigative reporter Paola Leopizzi Harris shares her views of the political implications of hidden contact with intelligent alien species in this interview with George Norry. 

An Italo-American photojournalist and investigative reporter in the field of extraterrestrial related phenomena research, Paola Leopizzi Harris is also a widely published free-lance writer and author of Exopolitics: Stargate to a New Reality. She has studied extraterrestrial related phenomena since 1979 and is on personal terms with many of the leading researchers in the field.
teaser: Wild speculation has grown about the governments’ involvement with extraterrestrial life. There are only a few people who know the truth. Investigative reporter Paola Leopizzi Harris shares her views of the political implications of hidden contact with intelligent alien species.

title: The Ark of the Covenant's Secret Purpose with William Henry
body:
Throughout time, the truth about the Ark of the Covenant has become lost; replaced by conjecture and speculation. However, it may actually be part of a larger, supernaturally powerful Judgment Day device. Investigative mythologist William Henry reveals the Ark of the Covenant's secret purpose in this interview with George Noory. 

Investigative mythologist and author of ten books on ancient mythology and neo-archaeology, William Henry researches the connection between the original Christianity, stargates and the ascension of humanity into beings of light.
teaser: Throughout time, the truth about the Ark of the Covenant has become lost; replaced by conjecture and speculation. However, it may actually be part of a larger, supernaturally powerful Judgment Day device. Investigative mythologist William Henry reveals the Ark of the Covenant's secret purpose.

title: The Queen of Numerology with Glynis McCants
body:
Do numbers have special meanings that can give insights to romance, career, and future events? If so what do your numbers mean? Find out what your numbers are and what they reveal with the Numbers Lady, Glynis McCants in this interview with George Noory. 

Known as Hollywood's Celebrity Numerologist, Glynis McCants has been studying numerology for 21 years. She uses the Pythagoras number system, which is more than 2,500 years old. After evaluating more than 15,000 numerology charts, Glynis wrote the best-selling book, Glynis Has Your Number. Her latest book is Love by the Numbers.
teaser: Do numbers have special meanings that can give insights to romance, career, and future events? If so what do your numbers mean? Find out what your numbers are and what they reveal with the Numbers Lady, Glynis McCants.

title: Near Miss Asteroids with Dan Durda
body:
A sense of urgency is growing, world-wide, to assess the looming threat that asteroids pose to the planet. The truth is we do not know when one will hit the Earth, but it is a certainty. Planetary scientist Dan Durda discusses possibilities of a true cosmic catastrophe and the near future of space exploration in this interview with George Noory.

Dr. Dan Durda is currently a research scientist at the Southwest Research Institute in Boulder, CO, and an Adjunct Professor in the Department of Sciences at Front Range Community College. His research interests include: near-Earth asteroids, Kuiper belt comets, and interplanetary dust.
teaser: A sense of urgency is growing to assess the looming threat that asteroids pose to our planet. The truth is, we do not know when one will hit the Earth, but it is a certainty. Planetary scientist Dan Durda discusses possibilities of a true cosmic catastrophe and the near future of space exploration.

title: Mistress of the Spirits with Rosemary Ellen Guiley
body:
A hidden world full of fairies, ghosts and angels, among other things, coexists with our own mundane world.  We are not separate from this world and can interact and communicate with all of its inhabitants. Rosemary Ellen Guiley, an expert on all things paranormal, discusses paranormal investigations, different types of spirits and interactions, techniques for spiritual communication and much more in this interview with George Noory.


Rosemary Ellen Guiley is one of the leading experts on the paranormal with more than 50 books on a wide range of paranormal, spiritual, and mystical topics. She spends a great deal of her time out in the field conducting investigations and research on  inter-dimensional entity contact, technological and spirit communications,  and geographic areas of intense paranormal activity.
teaser: A hidden world full of fairies, ghosts and angels, among other things, coexists with our own mundane world. Rosemary Ellen Guiley, an expert on all things paranormal, discusses paranormal investigations, different types of spirits and interactions, techniques for spiritual communication and much more.

title: White Light Express with Sarah Nash
body:
The White Light Express was born when a few friends gathered to focus intention and prayer to bring about abundance and healing for those who were in need. Sarah Nash presents stories of success and simple ways you can make positive changes in your life using the white light, meditation, and prayer in this interview with George Noory. 

Sarah Nash has the ability to tap into a different reality and take a look at her clients’ lives through the eyes of their Higher Selves, Guardian Angels and Guides. This sheds light on what is hidden within the depths of the subconscious to bring a present day awareness that helps them to remember their divinity, the blueprint of the soul essence and soul plan.
teaser: The White Light Express was born when a few friends gathered to focus intention and prayer to bring about abundance and healing for those who were in need. Sarah Nash presents stories of success and simple ways you can make positive changes in your life using the white light, meditation, and prayer.

title: Awakening the Dormant Brain with Neil Slade
body:
Awakening the dormant brain dramatically increases your intelligence and creativity as well as releases your mind’s paranormal abilities like telepathy and telekinesis. Researcher Neil Slade discusses the role of the amygdala and how to activate the human brain's routes of paranormal experience in this fascinating interview with George Noory.

Neil Slade is an author of seven books on brain and behavior including, The Frontal Lobes Supercharge, and Secret of The Dormant Brain Lab. His educational books are easy to understand explorations of how the human brain works, and how to access creativity and problem solving. His most recent title, Secret of the Dormant Brain Lab is an account of his work with brain researcher "D.A.T. Stingo" at his wilderness research facility.
teaser: Awakening the dormant brain dramatically increases your intelligence and creativity as well as releases your mind’s paranormal abilities like telepathy and telekinesis. Researcher Neil Slade discusses the role of the amygdala and how to activate the human brain's routes of paranormal experience.

title: Conscious Evolution through Technology with Nick Begich
body:
New advancements in technology are unlocking the secrets of the brain. These innovations could open the hidden possibilities of the mind and awaken the next evolution for mankind. This same technology, if it used for dubious means, could have a dire consequences for all of humanity. Dr. Nick Begich, well known for his work and research on HAARP, reveals new technologies and techniques that can awaken the next evolution for mankind or usher in a new era of thought control in this interview with George Noory. 

Co-author of Angels Don't Play This HAARP, Nicholas Begich received his doctorate in traditional medicine from The Open International University for Complementary Medicines. He began pursuing independent research in the sciences and politics and is now the Executive Director of The Lay Institute on Technology, Inc. as well as the publisher of Earthpulse Press Incorporated
teaser: Advancements in technology are unlocking the secrets of the brain. Dr. Nick Begich brings to light technologies and techniques that could open hidden possibilities of the mind and awaken the next evolution for mankind or usher in a new era of thought control.

title: The Subtle Body with Cyndi Dale
body:
Most of what we perceive as reality is really only about 2% of the full picture. The unseen portion of reality is comprised of subtle energy that holds a powerful influence over the physical world. We can learn to tap into this energy and use it for healing and manifestation. Intuitive healer, Cyndi Dale describes the anatomy of the soul and how to direct subtle energy for our greatest good in this interview with George Noory.

Cyndi Dale, author of The Subtle Body: An Encyclopedia of Your Energetic Anatomy has long been a natural intuitive with a passion to helping people open their essential energy.  In addition to her natural intuitive gifts, she is trained in shamanism, intuitive healing, energy healing, family of origin therapy, therapeutic touch, the Lakota way and faith healing and holds a fourth degree mastership in Reiki.
teaser: Most of our reality is unseen and comprised of subtle energy that holds a powerful influence over the physical world. We can learn to tap into this energy for healing and manifestation.  Intuitive healer, Cyndi Dale describes the anatomy of the soul and how to direct subtle energy for our greatest good.

title: The Ticking EMP Bomb with William R. Forstchen
body:
From communication to transportation, we all are vitally dependent upon electricity for our everyday needs. This fast-paced modern world would not function without it. Yet, we are woefully unprepared to deal with the consequences should we find the electricity permanently shut off. History Professor, William R. Forscthen explains what we can do to ensure the safety and survival of our loved ones, should we ever face the threat of an electromagnetic pulse in this interview with George Noory. 

William Forstchen,  Faculty Fellow and Professor of History at Montreat College, received his Ph.D. from Purdue University with specializations in Military History and the History of Technology and is. He is the author of over forty books, including Gettysburg and Pearl Harbor (coauthored with Newt Gingrich).
teaser: We all are vitally dependent upon electricity for our everyday needs. If the electricity is permanently shut off, we are woefully unprepared. History Professor, William R. Forscthen explains what we can do to ensure the safety and survival of our loved ones, should we ever face the threat of an EMP.

title: Into The Twilight Zone with Marc Zicree
body:
You’re about to enter The Twilight Zone.Through its 156 episodes, The Twilight Zone haunted the imaginations of millions of American viewers from 1959 to 1964. Media expert Marc Zicree is a Twilight Zone scholar, and has cataloged every episode ever made in his book, The Twilight Zone Companion.In this fun and dynamic interview, Zicree shares his behind-the-scenes knowledge of the classic series in this interview with George Noory.

Marc Zicree, writer, producer, director and author of The Twilight Zone Companion, is regarded as one of the country’s top media experts with an understanding of the genius of Rod Serling. He, along with his wife Elaine, has produced hundreds of hours of films and television programs for virtually every major studio and network.
teaser: Media expert Marc Zicree is a Twilight Zone scholar, and has cataloged every episode ever made in his book, The Twilight Zone Companion.In this fun and dynamic interview, Zicree shares his behind-the-scenes knowledge of the classic series.

title: Unforgettable with Marilu Henner
body:
What if you could instantly remember everything you ever experienced, right down to the time and day? There are only 12 people in the world that have been documented with such ability. As scientists continue to debate the nature of HSAM to find out if it is a product of nature or nurture, they are discovering the things that all of us can do to improve our memory.  Actress and author, Marilu Henner explains how her remarkable memory affects her life and career as well as the connection between health and memory in this unforgettable interview with George Noory. 

Marilu Henner has starred on stage, in several hit TV series, films, commercials, television movies and specials.  Her incredible amount of energy is replenished constantly with good health and compatible habits. The knowledge and discipline which she has gathered to maintain her demanding schedule is available in her books which include, Total Memory Makeover, Marilus Henner’s Total Health Makeover and Wear Your Life Well.
teaser: What if you could instantly remember everything you ever experienced, right down to the time and day? There are only 12 people in the world that have been documented with such ability. Actress and author, Marilu Henner explains how her unforgettable memory affects her life, career and health.

title: Your Soul Contract with Dr. Lauren Cielo
body:
You have the power to reach through the veil, beyond the basic five senses, to discover your life’s purpose and the agreements you made before being born.  Dr. Lauren Cielo offers simple techniques that awaken your psychic abilities so you can discover your soul contracts and make positive changes in this interview with George Noory.  

A former engineer at a Fortune 500 Company and now a professional clairvoyant healer and teacher, Dr. Cielo uses cutting edge tools and techniques to read energy, and shift or change situations to benefit both clients and their loved ones.
teaser: You have the power to reach through the veil, beyond the basic five senses, to discover your life’s purpose and the agreements you made before being born.  Dr. Lauren Cielo offers simple techniques that awaken your psychic abilities so you can discover your soul contracts and make positive changes.

title: Future Heart Health: Stem Cells & Regeneration with Christian Wilde
body:
Even though science is making incredible advances in understanding the origins and treatments of heart disease, it is still one of the biggest causes of death. Revolutionary treatments that include stem cell therapy, regenerative science and the benefits of turmeric offer an optimistic future for heart health. Christian Wilde reveals breakthroughs in cardiovascular science in this interview with George Noory.

Christian Wilde is the author of two ground breaking books, Miracle Stem Cell heart Repair and Hidden Causes of Heart Attack and Stroke. As a researcher, he has devoted many years to exploring early detection and prevention of heart disease for the general public. He has also been a voice for adult stem cell research, documenting the progress since 2002.
teaser: Despite the advances, heart disease is still one of the main causes of death today. Christian Wilde offers an optimistic future for heart health as he reveals revolutionary cardiovascular treatments including stem cell therapy, regenerative science and the benefits of turmeric.

title: Losing My Religion with Tina Sacchi
body:
With record numbers of people losing their religion, they find themselves searching for a spiritual connection while floundering amid a sea of disempowering emotions. Tina Sacchi reveals her ONE formula to help you discover your authentic self and live a heartfelt spiritual life, with or without religion in this inspiring interview with George Noory.

Tina Sacchi is a Master in Holistic Alternative Arts, which includes Hypnotherapy, Energy Healing, Mysticism, Chakra Balancing, Soul Path Guidance, Past Lives Resolve, Future Life Progression, Raw & Healthy Food Coaching and Life Event Ceremonies.   As a loving and caring spiritual leader, Tina has helped thousands of people find their inner truth and has helped them make their transition to their own calling.
teaser: With record numbers of people losing their religion, they find themselves searching for a spiritual connection while floundering amid a sea of disempowering emotions. Tina Sacchi reveals her ONE formula to discover your authentic self and live a heartfelt spiritual, life with or without religion.

title: Living Between Lives with Richard Martini
body:
Take a step back in time, to a time a place before you were born. Do you remember what was there, what you saw, felt or experienced? Now, we have a tour guide to the afterlife that can reveal the nature of soul groups, reincarnation and life in the spiritual realms. Filmmaker, Richard Martini discusses Michael Newton’s work of using hypnotherapy to recover memories of living between lives in this captivating interview with George Noory.

After a dream vision of visiting his friend in the Great Beyond, author and award winning filmmaker Richard Martini went on a literary quest to discover the prevailing science and philosophical opinions on the afterlife. Eventually he was introduced to the work of author and hypnotherapist Dr. Michael Newton.  FlipSide: A Tourist's Guide to the Afterlife is his debut non-fiction book on a topic that's been haunting him since the death of a soul mate.
teaser: Take a step back in time, to a time a place before you were born. Do you remember what was there, what you saw, felt or experienced? Now, we have a tour guide to the afterlife that can reveal the nature of soul groups, reincarnation and life in the spiritual realms.

title: Disclosed Encounters with Paola Harris
body:
In the spring of 2013, representatives from 10 countries gathered in Washington D.C for the Citizen Hearing on Disclosure. The attendees gave five days of testimony confirming the existence of UFOs. Despite the efforts of the governments, these whistleblowers have come forth to reveal the evidence that has long been repressed. Investigative reporter, Paola Leopizzi was there and reports on the disclosed encounters by those in attendance and why the UFOs are here in this interview with George Noory.

An Italo-American photojournalist and investigative reporter in the field of extraterrestrial related phenomena research, Paola Leopizzi Harris is also a widely published free-lance writer and author of Exopolitics: Stargate to a New Reality. She has studied extraterrestrial related phenomena since 1979 and is on personal terms with many of the leading researchers in the field.
teaser: In the spring of 2013, representatives from 10 countries gathered in Washington D.C for the Citizen Hearing on Disclosure. Investigative reporter, Paola Leopizzi Harris was there and reports on the disclosed encounters by those in attendance and the lasting implications for the planet.

title: Prophecy & the Cosmic Code with Dr. Louis Turi
body:
The cosmic code may be a message hidden in ancient texts that anyone can learn. The Mayans knew the truth of this code, and the Illuminati struggles to keep it a secret. Dr. Louis Turi explains how cosmic consciousness may be the secret to prophescy with the power to transform the lives of everyone in the world in this interview with George Noory.
Dr. Turi is a personal counselor to many celebrities, a proficient author, and a captivating speaker. He speaks of celestial tools and a unique celestial identity, known as god. His notoriety skyrocketed after rekindling, practicing, and teaching Nostradamus’ Divine Astrology methodology, which he calls Astropsychology. Skeptics, have an open mind, and explore the cosmic wisdom of an astrophile.
teaser: The cosmic code may be a message hidden in ancient texts that anyone can learn. The Mayans knew of this code and the Illuminati struggles to keep it a secret.  Louis Turi explains how the cosmic code may be the secret to prophecy with the power to transform the lives of everyone in the world.

title: Health Freedom with Dr. Robin Falkov
body:
With advances in medical procedures, government regulations and changing insurance policies, even a routine medical procedure can be overwhelming for patients and doctors. It is good to know that you can have someone on your side that is familiar with the complexities of the medical industry. Dr. Robin Falkov, OMD and Homeopathic Physician, explains how a patient advocate can bring you peace of mind by helping you make informed choices for your health care in this interview with George Noory.

Dr. Robin Falkov’s is a Doctor of Oriental Medicine and Homeopathic Physician whose focus is informing patients of the multiple choices available to achieve optimal health. Through regular communication and continuing progress evaluation, Dr. Falkov encourages patients to take responsibility for their own well being as it is the only way to insure successful treatment results.

title: Draconian Legacy of the Annunaki with Michael Tellinger
body:
Artifacts reveal that Earth's first civilization had an advanced understanding of the energy fields that run through the earth. They used this energy to build stone circles and great monuments. They also used their technology to create the social and political structures that would enslave mankind for centuries. Michael Tellinger reveals his research into the Annunaki and explains how we can break free from their draconian legacy in this interview with George Noory.

Michael Tellinger, author, scientist, explorer, has become a real-life Indiana Jones, making groundbreaking discoveries about ancient vanished civilizations at the southern tip of Africa. His continued efforts and analytical scientific approach have produced stunning new evidence that will force us to rethink our origins and rewrite our history books.
teaser: Artifacts reveal that Earth's first civilization had an advanced technology which was used to build great stone circles as well as the political structures that would enslave mankind for centuries. Michael Tellinger reveals his research into the Annunaki and explains how we can break free from their draconian legacy.

title: Near Life Experiences with John St. Augustine
body:
It can be difficult for many of us to recognize the greatness we hold within and accept those moments in life when we are called upon to let our light shine through. After two Near Death Experiences and a long walking mediation, John St. Augustine came to understand that we all can choose to live fully by accepting responsibility for what goes through us. He shares these life-changing experiences and the wisdom he gained in this poignant interview with George Noory.

John St. Augustine, author of Every Moment Matters and Living an Uncommon Life, is considered to be one of the most influential voices on the radio. He is the voice of over 6,500 one-minute vignettes called, Powerthoughts!, and was the senior producer behind Dr. Mehmet Oz's, Jean Chatzky's, and Bob Greene's shows.
teaser: After two Near Death Experiences, which he calls Near Life Experiences, and a long walking mediation, John St. Augustine came to understand that we all can choose to live fully. He his transformative experiences and the wisdom he gained in this poignant interview with George Noory.

title: Secrets of Remote Viewing with Ed Dames
body:
You may have seen the movie, Men Who Stare at Goats, but did you know that it was based on real people? The U.S. Army developed a program, called remote viewing, which trained soldiers to be psychic spies. Major Ed Dames, who was an integral part of this program, reveals the ESP secrets of remote viewers and highlights many of its benefits in this interview with George Noory.
Author of Tell Me What You See, Edward A. Dames is the world's foremost remote viewing teacher and creator of Technical Remote Viewing. He is a decorated military intelligence officer and an original member of the U.S. Army prototype remote viewing training program. He served as both training and operations officer for the U.S. government's top-secret  psychic espionage unit, PSIINT. Discover the true story of Major Dames and the remote viewing team he led on behalf of the U.S. military.

Kelly Sullivan Walden, author of I had the Strangest Dream, It’s All in your Dreams, Dream Oracle Cards, and Dreaming Heaven is a certified clinical hypnotherapist, founder of Dream-Life Coach Training and host of The D-Spot, a weekly radio show. He teaches classes on psychic development, ghosts and hauntings, past lives and many other metaphysical topics at the Baker Hunt Art & Cultural Center in Covington, KY. Victor owned and operated the landmark New Age emporium Victory Books for over ten years.

title: UFO Explosion of ’73 with Lee Speigel
body:
In 1973, Lee Speigel set off to investigate an increased number of reports of UFO reports in the United States. The result was an audio documentary produced for CBS that marked the first time military personnel and scientists came together to disclose their personal encounters. Producer and writer Lee Speigel reflects upon his decades of researching strange events and reveals some of his most phenomenal encounters in this interview with George Noory.

Lee Speigel has researched and reported unexplained phenomena and paranormal events for decades. During the 1970s and 80s, Speigel produced, wrote and hosted nearly 1,500 programs on the unexplained for NBC Radio. He spent seven years with ABC News before moving on to AOL News and The Huffington Post, where he has written hundreds of articles. He's also the only person in history to have produced, in 1978, a milestone UFO presentation at the United Nations. To this day, Speigel is always on the lookout for unusual, out-of-this-world stories.
teaser: In 1973, Lee Speigel set off to investigate the increased number of reports of UFOs. The result was an audio documentary produced for CBS. Now, he reflects upon his decades of researching strange events and reveals some of his most phenomenal encounters.

After the experience of building and owning a successful company in telecommunications, Karen continues to teach about communication, but in a much different way. Now, she shares with others the positive benefits of using the Ouija as a communication tool that taps into unique possibilities within and uncovers personal empowerment.

Jerome Corsi has thoroughly studied the assassination of JFK and has discovered new evidence which answers these burning questions which he reveals in this interview with George Noory.

Dr. Jerome Corsi, author of Who Really Killed Kennedy, is a senior staff reporter for World Net Daily where he works as an investigative reporter. He received his Ph.D. in political science from Harvard University in 1972. For 25 years, he worked with banks all over the world to help them provide financial planning products and services to their retail customers.

body:

Whether we are faced with something missing from our diet or medical mistakes, there are things we can do to stay healthy. Dr. Joel Wallach explains the heath dangers we face in America today and helps us to make the right choices to stay healthy in this interview with George Noory. 


Dr. Wallach, an associate editor of Quantum Medicine, The Journal of the Association of Eclectic Physicians, has been involved in biomedical research and clinical medicine for more than 47 years. He offers naturopathic strategies for dealing with diseases and demonstrates the relationship between impoverished soils, mineral deficiencies in our diet and degenerative disease in his two alternative health books, Let’s Play Doctor and Rare Earths: Forbidden cures.

title: Untold Encounters with James Fox
body:
In September of 1994, roughly 200 school children in Ruwa, Zimbabwe, witnessed  multiple UFOs land on a field near their playground. Occupants exited the UFOs and interacted with the school children. 

On April 24th, 1964, a police officer  in Socorro New Mexico witnessed an egg shaped object land and two, "small people" standing next to it. Nearly 50 years later, evidence from the USAF own files is found - substantiating the officers claims.  Both cases involved several eyewitnesses, yet little new facts have been reported since. Documentary filmmaker James Fox discusses significant new evidence from two very compelling close encounters of the third kind in this interview with George Noory.


James was born in England and raised in New York and California. He began his journalism career early in life as an assistant to father/writer Charles Fox, a quadriplegic with Multiple Sclerosis. Together they traveled on many magazine assignments from Rolling Stone, Car & Driver to Sports Illustrated. James finished and sold his first documentary to Discovery by the time he was 28. He has since completed 5 films for the likes of Sci-Fi and History Channel and has made frequent appearances on the Larry King Show, Night Line, Dateline, Anderson Cooper and others. His latest film on UFOs, I Know What I Saw, is being distributed by A&E and Content Films International.
teaser: Documentary filmmaker James Fox reveals two of the most significant cases of UFO sightings that you may have never heard about: 1994, Ruwa, Zimbabwe, 62 school children saw something strange in the sky. In 1964, Socorro, New Mexico, several witnesses saw an egg-shaped object descend from the sky.

John McAfee is best known as the founder of McAfee Associates, a computer antivirus company. In February 2010, he started a new venture in the field of bacterial quorum sensing with, QuorumEx, which was working towards producing all natural antibiotics. As of January 2013 McAfee has been living in the United States working on several media projects including an autobiography and a feature film entitled, Running in the Background.

body:

As the author of the books Heavenly Bodies and Empire of Death, he has photographed over seventy sites containing human bones in nearly twenty countries.

In the summer of 1977, Rhettman A. Mullis Jr. saw his first Bigfoot swimming in the Puget Sound. That started his journey as a Bigfoot researcher. Over the next 36 years, he would continue to spend time studying accounts of Bigfoot. He currently heads, Bigfootology, which is a global team of scientists and field experts dedicated to the study of the global Bigfoot phenomenon using modern scientific technology, processes, and the multidisciplinary approach to research and problem solving.

title: Colonizing Mars with Robert Zubrin
body:
Just over the proverbial horizon, the first colony of human beings on Mars awaits. Before we can finally realize this dream, a great deal of research and hard work needs to be completed. However, the shadow of our planet’s energy crisis darkens the brilliance of visionary Martian projects. Every day, Robert Zubrin works to bring us closer to colonizing Mars and he details what we can expect as we finally broach this new horizon in this interview with George Noory.

Dr. Robert Zubrin is the founder and President of the Mars Society, as well as a member of the organization's Board of Directors. Formerly a Staff Engineer at Lockheed Martin Astronautics in Denver, he holds a Masters degree in Aeronautics and Astronautics and a Ph.D. in Nuclear Engineering from the University of Washington. He has authored over 100 published technical and non-technical papers in the field, as well as written several books.
teaser: Just over the proverbial horizon, the first colony of human beings on Mars awaits. Every day, Robert Zubrin works to bring us closer to colonizing Mars and he details what we can expect as we finally broach this new horizon.

title: Personality, Destiny and Astrology with Sandra-Leigh
body:
Your personality is directly connected with your character and your character is what leads you to your destiny. Astrology, as a study of personality, really is a means of determining your destiny based upon the planetary patterns present at the moment of your birth. Sandra-Leigh explores the connection between personality, destiny and astrology by examining the charts of several famous people including Robin Williams, Elvis Presley and George Noory in this interview with George Noory.

Sandra-Leigh, President of the Rocky Mountain Astrologers (ROMA) in Boulder, Co, is a professional astrologer with a Master's Degree in Psychology. She has over 25 years experience with astrology and has worked with thousands of clients from all over the United States. Sandra-Leigh teaches, lectures, and makes media appearances and is certified by ISAR and AFA as a professional astrologer.
teaser: Astrology, as a study of personality, is a means of determining your destiny based upon the planetary patterns present at the moment of your birth. Sandra-Leigh explores the connection between personality, destiny and astrology by examining the charts of several famous people.

title: Not by Fire, but by Ice with Robert Felix
body:
Every 11,500 years the Earth undergoes a dramatic change: weather patterns become erratic, global temperatures cool, sea levels drop, and magnetic poles reverse as an ice age is born. While the cause of climate change continues to be a hot-button topic, few would deny the increasing prevalence of strange weather across the planet. Robert Felix explains that our climate changing is just the precursor to the dawning of a new ice age in this interview with George Noory.

Robert W. Felix attended the University Of Minnesota School Of Architecture in the mid-1960s, but by the early 1990s, he was drawn by a different passion. He spent the next eight years, full-time, researching and writing about the coming ice age. Today, Felix continues his research, and is more firmly convinced than ever that the next ice age could begin any day. In fact, he believes it has already begun.
teaser: Every 11,500 years the Earth undergoes a dramatic change: weather patterns become erratic, global temperatures cool, sea levels drop, and magnetic poles reverse as an ice age is born. Robert Felix explains that our climate changing is just the precursor to the dawning of a new ice age.

title: Why We Haven’t Made Contact with Micah Hanks
body:
Astronomers estimate that our galaxy is home to billions of habitable planets capable of supporting intelligent life. Despite decades of diligent searching, they have only found a great silence cast across the vast cosmos. Are we truly alone? Micah Hanks espouses that we are not alone and that it is only a matter of time before we breach the technological singularity and finally become capable of contacting a myriad of advanced extraterrestrial civilizations in this interview with George Noory .

A self proclaimed (but not self-righteous) skeptic, Micah Hanks works as a writer, a researcher, and as a radio personality who addresses a variety of unexplained phenomena. Over the last decade, his research has taken him into studies of the more esoteric realms of the strange and unusual, as well as cultural phenomena, human history, and the prospects of our technological future as a species as influenced by science.
teaser: Micah Hanks espouses that we are not alone in this universe and that it is only a matter of time before scientists breach the technological singularity. Then we will finally become capable of contacting a myriad of advanced extraterrestrial civilizations.

title: When Children Remember Past Lives with Susan Masino
body:
As a rock historian and journalist, Susan Masino had seen many strange things. But nothing could have prepared her for her son recalling vivid details of a past life on board the ill-fated Titanic. Susan Masino recounts her son’s turbulent journey of discovering who he once was, and she offers advice for parents whose children may be re-experiencing events from their own past lives in this interview with George Noory.

Susan Masino, a rock journalist for over thirty years, has written six books and produced eight local music compilation CDs. Since age five, she has had a strong interest in the paranormal. In her latest book, The Secrets of the Universe-Universal Laws, Past Lives, Ghost Adventures and More, she dives into her lifelong passion of the spiritual and paranormal side of life. Watch for her new book, AC/DC FAQ All That's Left To Know About the World's True Rock and Roll Band, which will be available on March 31, 2015. This book also contains some paranormal encounters involving the band, AC/DC.
teaser: Nothing could have prepared Susan Masino for her son recalling vivid details of a past life on board the ill-fated Titanic. She recounts her son’s turbulent journey of discovering who he once was and offers advice for parents whose children may be re-experiencing events from their own past lives.

title: Clearing Karma for Ascension with David Wilcock
body:
Every bit of stress, frustration and anxiety we experience is all part of a divinely orchestrated plan. Without this turmoil we would never find the motivation to crack open the shells of our comfort zones and open our hearts in order to become more loving. David Wilcock explains how different types of stress actually help us to pay off karma so we can progress to the next level of ascension in this interview with George Noory.

David Wilcock is a professional lecturer, filmmaker and researcher of ancient civilizations, consciousness science, and new paradigms of matter and energy. His upcoming Hollywood film, CONVERGENCE, unveils the proof that all life on Earth is united in a field of consciousness, which affects our minds in fascinating ways.
teaser: Every bit of stress, frustration and anxiety we experience is all part of a divinely orchestrated plan. David Wilcock explains how different types of stress actually help us to pay off karma so we can progress to the next level of ascension.

body:
At the moment of your birth, the heavens aligned in such a way as to define who and what you would become. However, this astrological alignment is only one small component of your life. Your destiny may have once been written in the stars, but you have the freedom and power to change what your future will become. Sandra-Leigh explains how the science of the stars merges with personal freewill to create unique expressions of destiny in this interview with George Noory.

Sandra-Leigh, President of the Rocky Mountain Astrologers (ROMA) in Boulder, Co, is a professional astrologer with a Master's Degree in Psychology. She has over 25 years experience with astrology and has worked with thousands of clients from all over the United States. title: Secret History of Pearl Harbor Unraveled with Douglas Dietrich
body:
December 7, 1941 is a day said to live in infamy – but even more infamous is the history that we have not been told. While this information is not hidden from the American public, it is not freely disclosed or openly discussed as part of the official history. In his analysis of the attack on Pearl Harbor, Douglas Dietrich discloses details that cast an entirely different light upon the U.S. and Japan’s involvement in World War II in this special interview with George Noory.

Douglas Dietrich was a Department of Defense research librarian for almost a decade. He was responsible for incinerating highly classified materials on critical historical topics such as Pearl Harbor, Roswell, Viêt-Nam, and the different ethnic holocausts. His background in military reference and experiences in mercenary/security enforcement exposed him to startling insights into geopolitics, the current demographic apocalypse, and the medical-industrial complex thanatizing our future.
teaser: December 7, 1941 is a day said to live in infamy – but even more infamous is the history that we have not been told. In his analysis of the attack on Pearl Harbor, Douglas Dietrich discloses details that cast an entirely different light upon the U.S. and Japan’s involvement in World War II.

title: Analyzing ISIS with Chris Geo
body:
All major news media outlets are being flooded with reports on the Islamic militant group known as ISIS – a group reportedly so vile that even Al Qaeda wants nothing to do with them. But is this information overload really part of a plan to bury deep dark secrets concerning the continuous political unrest in the Middle East?  Chris Geo, an independent journalist, discusses the influential role ISIS takes as the world’s antagonist du jour in this interview with George Noory. 

Chris Geo is a veteran broadcaster and independent journalist who has been researching geo-politics, ancient texts, hidden agendas, and deciphering the big picture for over a decade. He is the program director of Truth Frequency Radio, the host of The Chris Geo Show syndicated by the Genesis Communications Network, and also works full time as the Communications Director for My Patriot Supply.
teaser: All major news media outlets are being flooded with reports on the Islamic militant group known as ISIS – a group reportedly so vile that even Al Qaeda wants nothing to do with them. Chris Geo, an independent journalist, discusses the influential role ISIS takes as the world’s antagonist du jour.

title: The Other Side with Laura Lee
body:
At a very young age, Laura Lee discovered that the afterlife is for real. After years of struggle and loss, she was finally able to accept her psychic abilities. Now she uses her gifts to help others find peace and joy in their lives. Laura Lee recounts her life experiences, explains what life is like on the other side and helps a guest reconnect with loved ones who have died in this interview with George Noory.

Born in the small mid-western town, Laura Lee’s life was anything but normal. Starting at the early age of 3, she began having mystical experiences with spirits and angels. After a near death experience in her teens, Laura’s life dramatically shifted when she fully embraced her gift as a medium. After leaving behind a successful communications career, she began a life of helping others in their search for higher meaning in our world.
teaser: At a very young age, Laura Lee discovered that the afterlife is for real. After years of struggle and loss, she was finally able to accept her psychic abilities. Now she uses her gifts to help others find peace and joy in their lives.

body:
Whether we know it or not, ethereal beings of light play an integral part in all of our lives. Some people see them as angels, others as benevolent aliens. No matter what form they take, these entities are here to help guide us through our most difficult ordeals. Laura Lee explains how we can request and receive guidance from the angelic realm before performing an angel reading for a guest in this interview with George Noory. 

Born in the small mid-western town, Laura Lee’s life was anything but normal. Starting at the early age of 3, she began having mystical experiences with spirits and angels. title: What You Need to Know about Ebola with Dr. Gary Ridenour
body:
We dwell within a world awash with myriad strains of viruses and bacteria. Some are beneficial and vital for human life, others are detrimental and deadly. Occasionally, one of these strains catches the attention of the media and a new threat of a pending worldwide pandemic is born. Such is the case with Ebola. Dr. Gary Ridenour dissects the Ebola virus, explaining what it does, where it came from and how it spreads in this interview with George Noory.

Dr. Gary C. Ridenour has been practicing medicine for 39 years after graduating from the Universidad Autónoma de Guadalajara, Guadalajara, Jalisco, Mexico in 1975. He practices medicine in Fallon, NV and specializes in General Practice and Internal Medicine. Dr. Ridenour speaks English and Spanish.
teaser: We dwell within a world awash with myriad strains of viruses and bacteria. Some are beneficial and vital for human life, others are detrimental and deadly. Occasionally, one of these strains catches the attention of the media and a new threat of a pending worldwide pandemic is born. Such is the case with Ebola. title: Prepping for Survival with Chris Geo
body:
With a changing climate and increasing instability of infrastructure, disaster may be looming uncomfortably near.  If a calamity were to befall your community, could you count upon government services to come to your aid? If not, how long would you last on your own? Prepping is actually easier than you may think. Chris Geo guides us through the process of preparing our homes, vehicles and lives lest the unthinkable becomes reality in this interview with George Noory.

Chris Geo is a veteran broadcaster and independent journalist who has been researching geo-politics, ancient texts, hidden agendas, and deciphering the big picture for over a decade. He is the program director of Truth Frequency Radio, the host of The Chris Geo Show syndicated by the Genesis Communications Network, and also works full time as the Communications Director for My Patriot Supply.

body:
Climate change is inevitable as our planet’s atmosphere has always been in a state of flux. As we are now perched upon the precipice of another major change, the latest scientists are making some unexpected discoveries as to the cause of our current climate calamity. Robert Felix explains how the normal rise and fall of various natural cycles are converging to create a new ice age in this interview with George Noory.

Robert W. Felix attended the University Of Minnesota School Of Architecture in the mid-1960s, but by the early 1990s, he was drawn by a different passion. He spent the next eight years, full-time, researching and writing about the coming ice age. title: Ghost Rockets in the Sky with Micah Hanks
body:
Streaking across the sky, strange rocket-like projectiles seem to appear out of nowhere, only to vanish just as mysteriously. In the wake of these startling encounters, witnesses and experts alike remain baffled. Micah Hanks recounts tales from those who have encountered these ghost rockets and speculates about their mysterious origin in this interview with George Noory.

A self proclaimed (but not self-righteous) skeptic, Micah Hanks works as a writer, a researcher, and as a radio personality who addresses a variety of unexplained phenomena. Over the last decade, his research has taken him into studies of the more esoteric realms of the strange and unusual, as well as cultural phenomena, human history, and the prospects of our technological future as a species as influenced by science.

title: Ebola, another Potential Pandemic? with Gary Ridenour
body:
SARS and the Avian Flu were touted as pandemics with the potential to collapse our way of life. That is, until politics and economics got involved. Now, as reports of Ebola begin to wane from news reports, our suspicions are renewed as to the actual danger posed by this potential pandemic. Gary Ridenour discusses the extent of the current Ebola outbreak, what the U.S. government is doing about it and what it would take to halt the spread of infection in this interview with George Noory.

Dr. Gary C. Ridenour has been practicing medicine for 39 years after graduating from the Universidad Autónoma de Guadalajara, Guadalajara, Jalisco, Mexico in 1975. He practices medicine in Fallon, NV and specializes in General Practice and Internal Medicine. Dr. Ridenour speaks English and Spanish.

title: Face to Face with the Paranormal with Susan Masino
body:
Ghostly encounters, while strange and mysterious to some, are commonplace but never ordinary to others. Still, there are those who vehemently refuse to believe in the existence of the paranormal; until they have their own strange and mysterious experience. Susan Masino shares some of her personal experiences with haunted locales and offers advice for anyone who may come face to face with the paranormal in this interview with George Noory.

Susan Masino, a rock journalist for over thirty years, has written six books and produced eight local music compilation CDs. Since age five, she has had a strong interest in the paranormal. In her latest book, The Secrets of the Universe-Universal Laws, Past Lives, Ghost Adventures and More, she dives into her lifelong passion of the spiritual and paranormal side of life. Watch for her new book, AC/DC FAQ All That's Left To Know About the World's True Rock and Roll Band. This book also contains some paranormal encounters involving the band, AC/DC.
teaser: There are those who vehemently refuse to believe in the existence of the paranormal; until they have their own strange and mysterious experience. Susan Masino shares some of her personal experiences with haunted locales and offers advice for anyone who may come face to face with the paranormal.

title: The End of Times and Ascension
body:
The end is nigh…maybe. Many ancient traditions have prophesized various courses of events that lead to the end of humanity as we know it. Numerous scholars have examined these predictions in detail; each has come to their own interpretation of these events. A definitive answer may be found in a comprehensive survey of ancient literature called, Hamlet’s Mill. David Wilcock explains what the end times’ prophecies are really about and cautions that they have already begun in this interview with George Noory.

David Wilcock is a professional lecturer, filmmaker and researcher of ancient civilizations, consciousness science, and new paradigms of matter and energy. His upcoming Hollywood film, CONVERGENCE, unveils the proof that all life on Earth is united in a field of consciousness, which affects our minds in fascinating ways.
teaser: The end is nigh…maybe. Many ancient traditions have prophesized various courses of events that lead to the end of humanity as we know it. David Wilcock explains what the end times’ prophecies are really about and cautions that they have already begun.

title: We Don’t Die with Sandra Champlain
body:
Not everyone believes in life after death. But what does it take to make a believer out of a skeptic? Though it is not as profound as a direct near-death experience, coming to terms with life after death is also a life-changing experience. Such is the case with Sandra Champlain who explains how she discovered that we don’t die in this interview with George Noory.

The fear of dying led Sandra Champlain on a 15-year journey to find evidence of the afterlife. Her fears were laid to rest, after years of private study in many spiritual modalities, when she finally determined that there is sufficient proof that we don't die. These findings were published in her book titled, We Don't Die: A Skeptic's Discovery of Life After Death, now a #1 international bestseller.
teaser: Not everyone believes in life after death. But what does it take to make a believer out of a skeptic? This is what happened with Sandra Champlain who explains how she discovered that we don’t die.

title: Cancer: Step Outside the Box with Ty Bollinger
body:
We need a new way to think about cancer. Despite the overwhelming feelings of hopelessness and loss that accompany this devastating disease, one is not entirely defenseless against its ravages. Ty Bolliger, espouses looking beyond established medical practices by exploring the benefits of natural foods, nutritional supplements and positive thinking as ways to stay healthy in hopes of staving off cancer in this interview with George Noory.

After losing several family members to cancer, Ty Bollinger refused to accept the notion that chemotherapy, radiation, and surgery were the most effective treatments available for cancer patients. He began a quest to learn all he possibly could about alternative cancer treatments and the medical industry. What he uncovered was shocking. Now he has made it his life’s mission to share the most remarkable discovery he made on his quest.
teaser: Ty Bolliger, espouses looking beyond established medical practices by exploring the benefits of natural foods, nutritional supplements and positive thinking as ways to stay healthy in hopes of staving off cancer.

title: Strange Creatures from Beyond with Chad Lewis
body:
Our reality may indeed be stranger than we can ever imagine. Since the dawn of time, human beings have reported encounters with strange creatures that continue to defy logical explanation. Despite the lack of physical evidence, the sheer volume of eyewitness accounts should give us pause to reconsider the boundaries of what we call reality. Chad Lewis shares various encounters with lesser-known creatures, including duendes, thunderbirds and hell hounds in this interview with George Noory.

Chad Lewis has over 14 years of experience as a paranormal researcher, now with Unexplained Research L.L.C. He is the author of the Hidden Headlines series and co-author of the Road Guide to Haunted Locations book series. Chad has trekked across the world in search of vampires in Transylvania, the Chupacabras in Puerto Rico, the elusive monster in Loch Ness, and ghosts in Ireland's castles. He brings over 14 years of experience to his research.
teaser: Our reality may indeed be stranger than we can ever imagine. Since the dawn of time, human beings have reported encounters with strange creatures that continue to defy logical explanation. Chad Lewis shares various encounters with lesser known creatures, including duendes, thunder birds and hell hounds.

title: Unraveling the Greatest Mysteries with Gregg Braden
body:
Who are we and how we got here are two of the biggest existential questions that continue to elude even the most brilliant of thinkers.  There will come a time in the future when we finally understand our place in the universe. In the meantime, the answers eluding us may be glaringly obvious when we turn a wide eye upon our past. Gregg Braden explains the importance of crossing science with ancient teachings in order to truly unravel our greatest existential mysteries in this interview with George Noory.

Gregg Braden is a New York Times best-selling author whose pioneering work bridges science and spirituality. A 2015 Templeton Award Nominee, he has explored high mountain villages, remote monasteries, and forgotten texts in order to merge their timeless secrets with the best science of today. His latest book, The Turning Point: Creating Resilience in a Time of Extremes, calls us to recognize that every crisis can become a moment of transformation.
teaser: Who are we and how we got here are two of the biggest existential questions that continue to elude even the most brilliant of thinkers. Gregg Braden explains the importance of crossing science with ancient teachings in order to truly unravel our greatest existential mysteries.

title: Cyber-Warriors with Charles R. Smith
body:
With the omnipresence of computers connected to the internet, troves of security personnel strive to keep our personal information safe and secure. Matching them move for move, a myriad of loosely organized hackers pose a growing threat to our personal and financial information. Charles R. Smith lays out the hidden battlefield of computer security and describes the motivations behind various factions of cyber-warriors in this interview with George Noory.

Charles R. Smith, President and CEO of SOFTWAR,  is one of America's leading experts on cyber technology and its implications for war, terrorism, privacy and every way technology interacts with our lives. He received a U.S. government Top Secret clearance as a top-level computer engineer for EDS. There he was assigned to work with the U.S. Army on logistic projects during the Cold War. Smith has also become a noted investigative journalist.
teaser: With the omnipresence of computers connected to the internet, troves of security personnel strive to keep our personal information safe and secure. Charles R. Smith lays out the hidden battlefield of computer security and describes the motivations behind various factions of cyber-warriors.

title: Understanding the Basics of Astrology with Heather Arielle
body:
The art and science of Astrology takes years to attain mastery. However, beginning to understand the basics is easier than you may think. It all starts with becoming familiar with the various parts of the chart and how to interpret them. Heather Arielle guides us through the basic components of an astrological chart and uses George’s natal chart to show us how she interprets them in this interview with George Noory.

Heather Arielle is the founder and CEO of Arielle’s Astrology. She received her M.F.A. from Columbia University where she was a Presidential Scholar. Her readings focus on personal, practical, and powerful ways astrology can improve your daily life. Heather is also a Drama Desk nominated and published playwright; her plays have been performed at numerous theaters across the country, as well as abroad. In addition to her astrological readings and presentations, Heather currently teaches songwriting for Lincoln Center Theater and is a member of the BMI Musical Theater Workshop.
teaser: The art and science of Astrology takes years to attain mastery. However, beginning to understand the basics is easier than you may think. Heather Arielle guides us through the basic components of an astrological chart and uses George’s natal chart to show us how she interprets them.

title: The Energy of Real Change with Bob Glotzhober
body:
From the stars glistening in the night sky to the cells living in our bodies, everything in our universe is energy. Even every situation we face in our lives is nothing more than energy. Therefore, it is possible to create real change in your life by learning how to manage the energy of your life. Coach Bob Glotzhober explains how we can make conscious choices in how we use the energy in our lives to enact real life changes in this interview with George Noory.

40 years ago, when Bob (Coach Bob) Glotzhober studied and work under the great pioneering psychologist Dr. William Hall, he began to understand human talent and how to identify it. Since then, Bob has worked to combine the latest insights in biology and neuroscience into his Realchange process, which is producing a simple, effective and affordable method of handling life’s important situations for individuals as well as organizations.

Coach Bob Glotzhober explains how we can make conscious choices in how we use the energy in our lives to enact real life changes.

title: On the Trail of the Nephilim L.A. Marzulli
body:
Before the dawn of time, an ancient race of beings descended from the heavens and declared our world their own. Over time, they intermingled with human beings, creating a hybrid species cited in ancient texts as the Nephilim. Centuries later, scant traces of evidence proving their existence are silently swept out of sight by mainstream scientists. L.A. Marzulli, who is on the trail of the Nephilim, cites evidence supporting his case that we share this world with the progeny of fallen angels in this interview with George Noory. 

L. A. Marzulli is the author of eight books including The Nephilim Trilogy and On the Trail of the Nephilim 1 & 2. His books uncover startling evidence that there has been a massive cover up of what he believes is the remains of the Nephilim. Marzulli is a frank super-naturalist who has lectured on the subjects of UFOs, The Nephilim, and ancient prophetic texts. He has presented his exhaustive research at conferences and churches, as well as appearances and interviews on numerous national and international radio and television programs. Marzulli teamed up with film producer Richard Shaw and  together have made 8 films called the Watchers Series.
teaser: Before the dawn of time, an ancient race of beings descended from the heavens and declared our world and its inhabitants their own. L.A. Marzulli, who is on the trail of these beings, called the Nephilim, cites evidence supporting his case that we share this world with the progeny of fallen angels.

title: The Downing of Flight 800 with Jim Sanders
body:
July 1996, TWA Flight 800 took off from JFK International Airport in New York. Twelve minutes later it plunged into the Atlantic Ocean as flaming wreckage. Eyewitness reports of a missile striking the airliner matched the investigators’ initial speculation of terrorist involvement. However, a deeper analysis reveals a horrific comedy of errors and a major cover-up operation. Jim Sanders has studied every detail of this tragedy and presents his explanation for the downing of Flight 800 in this interview with George Noory. 

James Sanders, a police officer turned investigative reporter. He is the author of The Downing of TWA Flight 800, Altered Evidence, and First Strike with Jack Cashill.  In December of 1997, after receiving material from a whistleblower within the Flight 800 investigation James and his wife were arrested for conspiracy to obtain forensic evidence of a solid fuel missile strike and have it tested.
teaser: July 1996, TWA Flight 800 took off from JFK International Airport in New York. Twelve minutes later it plunged into the Atlantic Ocean as flaming wreckage. Jim Sanders has studied every detail of this tragedy and presents his explanation for the downing of Flight 800.

title: The Illusion of Death with Sandra Champlain
body:
Many people are convinced that we are nothing more than physical bodies that wither and die. Others believe that at the moment of death, the essence of our true self takes an ethereal form that can live forever. Sandra Champlain shares anecdotal accounts from her research that suggests that death is merely an illusion in this interview with George Noory. 

The fear of dying led Sandra Champlain on a 15 year journey to find evidence of the afterlife. Her fears were laid to rest, after years of private study in many spiritual modalities, when she finally determined that there is sufficient proof that we don't die. teaser: Many people are convinced that we are nothing more than physical bodies that wither and die. Others believe that at the moment of death, the essence of our true self takes an ethereal form that can live forever. Sandra Champlain suggests that death is merely an illusion.
