The stability of our normal, mundane reality becomes disrupted when something that should not happen, does. Fundamentally, this is what a paranormal encounter is. Such phenomena can take the form of hauntings, curses or possessions, just to name a few. Chad Lewis has traversed the world seeking the truth behind the paranormal nature of our reality and he has come to share what he has learned in this interview with George Noory. 

Chad Lewis has over 14 years of experience as a paranormal researcher, now with Unexplained Research L.L.C. He is the author of the Hidden Headlines series and co-author of the Road Guide to Haunted Locations book series. Chad has trekked across the world in search of vampires in Transylvania, the Chupacabras in Puerto Rico, the elusive monster in Loch Ness, and ghosts in Ireland's castles. He brings over 14 years of experience to his research.
teaser: The stability of our normal, mundane reality becomes disrupted when something that should not happen, does. Chad Lewis has traversed the world seeking the truth behind the paranormal nature of our reality and he has come to share what he has learned.

title: Ancient Secrets in DNA with Gregg Braden
body:
Could it be true that all of the strife, conflict and wars that have ravaged humanity stem from an illusion that we are all separate beings struggling to survive in a hostile world? The truth of our reality, and our unity, may be concealed in the most unlikely of places. Gregg Braden believes he has found a connection between ancient languages and our DNA that may be the secret to dispelling the illusion of separateness in this interview with George Noory. 

Gregg Braden is a New York Times best-selling author whose pioneering work bridges science and spirituality. A 2015 Templeton Award Nominee, he has explored high mountain villages, remote monasteries, and forgotten texts in order to merge their timeless secrets with the best science of today. His latest book, The Turning Point: Creating Resilience in a Time of Extremes, calls us to recognize that every crisis can become a moment of transformation.
teaser: The truth of our reality, and our unity, may be concealed in the most unlikely of places. Gregg Braden believes he has found a connection between ancient languages and our DNA that may be the secret to dispelling the illusion of separateness.

title: Financial Tyrants of the World with John Curtis
body:
There is little doubt that the world’s financial sectors hold a high degree of power and control. Two of the most powerful of these institutions, the US Federal Reserve and Wall Street, are often in the news but little is revealed of their inner workings. John Curtis reveals the ins and outs of how financial tyrants of the world benefit from the ups and downs that they create in this interview with George Noory.

John M. Curtis, Ph.D. is editor of OnlineColumnist.com and columnist for Yahoo.com.  His articles can be found on opedguy.tumblr.com.  He directs a Los Angeles think tank specializing in political and corporate consulting.  His nonpartisan commentaries appear in foreign and domestic newspapers.  Dr. Curtis is considered the nation's leading authority on spin in the news.

title: California’s Lemurian Legacy with Olav Phillips
body:
As the legendary land of Lemuria sank beneath the waves, its inhabitants scatted themselves throughout the rim of the Pacific Ocean. Many made their way to parts of Asia and Africa, others settled along the coastlines of the Americas. Some of these civilizations flourished and became new legendary lands, while others floundered into obscurity. Olav Phillips shares his findings of little known and rarely discussed, archeological evidence of prehistoric civilizations in and around California in this interview with George Noory.

Olav Phillips has over twenty four years of experience in UFO research and is the founder of the Anomalies Network, the largest UFO and paranormal information source on the Internet. Olav's self-proclaimed passion is serving as archivist for the UFO and paranormal community with a specialization in the application of the latest technology to the field of ufology. Phillips uses technology to derive new sets of information, compile and analyze data in new ways, and develop new theories.

title: Where is Flight MH370? with Jim Sanders
body:
March 8, 2014, flight MH370 departed from Kuala Lumpur en route to Beijing, China. Less than two hours later, it disappeared never to return. The media was soon abuzz with a frenzy of changing stories and countless theories with no resolution. Jim Sanders addresses various theories put forth concerning the disappearance of Flight MH370 and offers what he considers to be the most likely scenario in this interview with George Noory.

James Sanders, a police officer turned investigative reporter. He is the author of The Downing of TWA Flight 800, Altered Evidence, and First Strike with Jack Cashill.  In December of 1997, after receiving material from a whistleblower within the Flight 800 investigation James and his wife were arrested for conspiracy to obtain forensic evidence of a solid fuel missile strike and have it tested.

Smith relays the impact that global cyber warfare would have upon the wellbeing of our modern civilization in this interview with George Noory.

Charles R. Smith, President and CEO of SOFTWAR, is one of America's leading experts on cyber technology and its implications for war, terrorism, privacy and every way technology interacts with our lives. He received a U.S. government Top Secret clearance as a top-level computer engineer for EDS. There he was assigned to work with the U.S. Army on logistic projects during the Cold War. Smith has also become a noted investigative journalist.

From a very young age Frank Joseph Hoff became very interested in the sciences, ancient mysteries, lost civilizations and the unknown. In 1996, Mr. Hoff met up with Richard Hoagland at a Mars conference in Seattle and started doing some pro bono research for him on his off hours. It is while doing research for Mr. Hoagland that he came across the unusual work of a Brazilian professor by the name of Prof. Arysio Nunes dos Santos Ph.D. on his website, Atlantis - The Lost Continent Finally Found.

This may be the same planetary body many people call Planet X or Nibiru whose return has been predicted in ancient prophecy. 

Marshall Masters is a former CNN Science Features news producer, freelance writer, television analyst and the publisher of YOWUSA.COM. Since 1999, he has been researching earth changes and Nibiru flyby-related topics including: sustainable survival communities, catastrophic crop circles, impact events and future technologies. Like many others, Marshall sees a dark cloud coming. What makes him different is that he also sees a silver lining - a noble and inspiring Star Trek future.

Dave Paulides spent over twenty years in law enforcement and senior executive positions in the technology sector. body:

As unofficially sanctioned investigations into the composition and function of the pyramids continue, the evidence profiles a vastly different history than what is accepted by orthodox Egyptology. This interview with George Noory.


After many years of silence, Larry Dean Hunter, has been asked to share some of his private and interesting revealing research regarding Egypt's buried and forgotten technology and our ancient and esoteric past. Larry acquired the astronomical skills necessary to understand the celestial connection between the ruins of Egypt and the stars while serving in the United States Navy as a quartermaster 1st class/leading navigator.

Dianne Arcangel is a former hospice chaplain, psychiatric hospital therapist, and Director of the Elisabeth Kubler-Ross Center of Houston. She served on the board of directors at the Rhine Research Center and the National Institute for Discovery Science, where she also led trainings and conducted research. She has also conducted survival research with the University of Virginia.  She is the author of Afterlife Encounters: Ordinary People, Extraordinary Experiences, and Life After Loss.

Karol has used his brain training techniques to help wounded soldiers, autistic children and struggling high school students. He recently was appointed the celebrity spokesperson for the International Brain Research Foundation and was voted the World’s Greatest Mentalist at the World Magic Awards.
teaser: It may seem like magic to many, and sometimes it is, but the true power of the human brain is unfathomable. From controlling pain to miraculous healings, Jim Karol demonstrates that the potential of the human mind is as limitless as the number of stars in the universe.

title: Let's Talk about Death with Gail Rubin
body:
In this interview with George Noory, Gail Rubin, a certified Thanatologist, talks about what you need to know before you go. A common superstition, even into the 21st century, is to not discuss death and dying lest you bring about the end of a loved one or yourself. This leaves many people woefully unprepared for the complexities of the road that lies before them when death touches their family. Fortunately, there are individuals who are adept in helping people to plan a good goodbye and easing the burdens of their passing. 

Gail Rubin became the Doyenne of Death® in 2011, after the publication of her award-winning book, A Good Goodbye. She is certified in Thanatology: Death, Dying and Bereavement which is a fancy name for a death educator. Rubin has more than 30 years of experience creating many memorable life cycle events and helping to get end-of-life and funeral planning conversations started with a light touch for such a serious subject
teaser: Many people are woefully unprepared for the complexities of the road that lies before them when death touches their family. Fortunately, there are individuals who are adept in helping people to plan a good goodbye and easing the burdens of their passing.

title: Unlocking your Potential for Remote Viewing with Lyn Buchanan
body:
In this interview with George Noory, Lyn Buchanan discusses various uses for Remote Viewing, including military applications and day-to-day uses. While not everyone may have been born with a proclivity for psychic abilities, the protocols used for Controlled Remote Viewing are easy enough that anyone can learn them. All it takes is diligent practice to unlock your potential for Remote Viewing. 

Lyn Buchanan, author of The Seventh Sense, was one of the U.S. Military's Controlled Remote Viewers from 1984 through 1992. When the CIA declassified the existence of the military's remote viewing effort in 1994, it became public knowledge that Lyn had been the unit's trainer, and he was quickly overwhelmed with applications for training. About this time, he started the Assigned Witness Program, which uses trained and experienced Controlled Remote Viewers to do pro bono remote viewing work for police and other public service organizations.
teaser: While not everyone may have been born with a proclivity for psychic abilities, the protocols used for Controlled Remote Viewing are easy enough that anyone can learn them. All it takes is diligent practice to unlock your potential for Remote Viewing.

title: Who is Killing Holistic Healers? with Erin Elizabeth
body:
In this interview with George Noory, Erin Elizabeth discusses the terrifying proposition that holistic healers are being purposefully targeted for assassination. Over the past several months reports of notable alternative healers meeting untimely and mysterious deaths have dotted the headlines. One may assume that these are simply random acts of violence perpetrated against hapless victims. But a deeper examination of the details reveals that these cases may indeed share a common thread. 

As a long time “health nut,” author and public speaker, Erin Elizabeth has had a passion for the healing arts for nearly 25 years. In her teens she started working for a green non-profit organization.  Later, she trained with Bikram (of Bikram Yoga) while living in Los Angeles, but gave up the hot classes for Pilates which she’s been doing now for 20 years. She is also an author, raw foods chef, and investigative journalist.
teaser: Over the past several months many alternative healers have met untimely and mysterious deaths. One may assume that these are simply random acts of violence perpetrated against hapless victims. But a deeper examination of the details reveals that these cases may indeed share a common thread.

title: Spontaneous Human Combustion with Larry Arnold
body:
If you ever needed proof that one’s life can be gone in a flash, look no further than spontaneous human combustion. Larry Arnold has diligently investigated S.H.C. since 1973 and he shares, with us, just how bizarre this phenomena is in this interview with George Noory. Whilst elucidating details from some of his strangest cases, he postulates various hypotheses as to how a human being can suddenly burst into flames. 

As director of ParaScienceInternational, Larry E. Arnold has studied and researched phenomena which challenge orthodoxy, none more so than the subject of spontaneous human combustion. His background in mechanical and electrical engineering has been redirected to explore the unconventional. He writes for many magazines and journals, and lectures internationally at colleges and universities.
teaser: If you ever needed proof that one’s life can be gone in a flash, look no further than spontaneous human combustion. Larry Arnold has diligently investigated S.H.C. since 1973 and he shares, with us, just how bizarre this phenomena is.

title: Building Coral Castle with Brad Olsen
body:
In this interview with George Noory, Brad Olsen discusses a little understood technique for moving large stones by utilizing the power of sound. The technology needed to build gigantic megalithic monuments still escapes the most adept of modern engineers. But, Edward Leedskalnin claimed to have discovered the long lost techniques used by the ancient Egyptian builders and proved it by building the Coral Castle. Unfortunately, he took his secret technology to the grave. 

Brad Olsen’s passion for writing goes far beyond his book publishing business or the online content he produces. His books have reached a wide audience across the country and have won numerous awards. Wearing his publisher’s hat, he makes the stated goal of only releasing only the kinds of books he would value owning himself, which incorporates thought-provoking and critical content, and with a wide appeal to readers. His book publishing business CCC Publishing is distributed by Independent Publishers Group.
teaser: Edward Leedskalnin claimed to have discovered the long lost techniques used by the ancient Egyptian builders and proved it by building the Coral Castle. Unfortunately, he took his secret technology to the grave.

title: Dawning of UFO Secrecy with Kevin Randle
body:
In this interview with George Noory, Kevin Randle conveys the history surrounding government programs to investigate UFO activity. During the 1940’s, eyewitness accounts of strange sightings sparked a buzz in the hearts and minds of the general public. The U.S Government also became very interested in these reports. Thus began the first official government organizations charged with collecting and concealing all information concerning UFO sightings. Though they have gone through various name changes, these groups have diligently pursued their charge since inception. 

Kevin Randle has studied the UFO phenomena for more than forty-five years. His training by the Army and the Air Force provides him with a keen insight into the operations and protocols of the military, their investigations into UFOs and the phenomena that has puzzled people for more than a century. During his investigations, Randle has traveled the United States to interview hundreds of witnesses who were involved in everything from the Roswell, New Mexico crash of 1947 to the latest of the abduction cases.
teaser: During the 1940’s, eyewitness accounts of strange sightings sparked a buzz in the hearts and minds of the general public. The U.S Government also became very interested in these reports. Thus began the first official government organizations charged with collecting and concealing all information concerning UFO sightings.

title: The Fun of Dying with Roberta Grimes
body:
The road that leads to our final destination bears no pleasantries for anyone. But the final few steps, so says Roberta Grimes, may be the most fun anyone has in their entire existence. This is not a call for anyone to willingly endure the inevitable. Rather it is a rallying cry to live your life to the fullest. When you no longer fear death, you can finally learn to live fully as discussed in this interview with George Noory.

Roberta Grimes is a business attorney who has spent decades studying nearly 200 years of abundant and consistent communications from the dead, quantum mechanics, and the nature of consciousness in order to learn, in detail, what happens during and after death. She shares her discoveries in her books, The Fun of Dying – Find Out What Really Happens Next, and the sequel, The Fun of Staying in Touch.
teaser: The road that leads to our final destination bears no pleasantries for anyone. But the final few steps, so says Roberta Grimes, may be the most fun anyone has in their entire existence.

title: Search for Lost Giants with Jim Vieira
body:
With Jim Vieira, the race is on to bring proof of giants in ancient America to the public before it is forever secreted away in hidden museum vaults. Legends of old told of human-like beings, great and small. As time passed, legends became quaint tales, and belief in such peoples gave way to established orders of logic and reason. New evidence substantiates this ancient lore and can rewrite the accepted doctrine of human origins as discussed in this interview with George Noory.

After joining his brother’s stonework company, Jim Vieira spent many hours researching local stone structures, with particular focus on unusual New England stoneworks that he believed to be built by a lost Native American civilization. His research eventually led Jim to the mystery of giants when he stumbled across an account of a giant skeleton being unearthed in the neighboring town of Deerfield. His giant quest has made him something of a local celebrity and he is often called on to give talks on the subject.
teaser: Ancient legends of human-like beings, great and small, became quaint tales. New evidence now substantiates this ancient lore and can rewrite the accepted doctrine of human origins.

title: Mystery of the Black Eyed Children with David Weatherly
body:
It begins with a strange rapping upon the door, only to reveal creepy-looking children bearing unholy terror. Are they inter-dimensional beings who cannot fully shape themselves into human form? David Weatherly recounts eyewitness accounts of these black-eyed children and explains what you can do should you encounter one standing at the threshold of your home in this interview with George Noory.

David Weatherly, paranormal investigator and author, has explored the world of the strange, investigating cases around the world for over 35 years. He has written and lectured on a diverse range of topics including cryptozoology, ufology and hauntings. He is a writer for Intrepid Magazine and is the author of, The Black Eyed Children.
teaser: It begins with a strange rapping upon the door, only to reveal creepy-looking children bearing unholy terror. Are they interdimensional beings who cannot fully shape themselves into human form?

title: Natural Pharmaceuticals with Ben Fuchs
body:
In this interview with George Noory, Natural Pharmacist Ben Fuchs delves into the mysteries of protecting yourself against disease with natural pharmaceuticals. We may dream of having a long and productive life, but no one wants that long life to be filled with disease and pain. By looking into the medicinal value of foods and supplements, we can better ensure that we are making the right decisions for promoting a healthy long life. 

Natural Pharmacist Benjamin Fuchs is a registered pharmacist, nutritionist and cosmetic chemist from Boulder Colorado who specializes in using nutritional supplements instead of the toxic pharmaceutical drugs used by other healthcare practitioners. This is because he looks at the human body as a healing and regenerating system, designed divinely to heal and renew itself on a moment to moment basis.
teaser: Ben Fuchs delves into the mysteries of protecting yourself against disease with the medicinal value of foods and supplement. We can better ensure that we are making the right decisions for promoting a healthy long life.

title: Pyramids and the Remnants of Atlantis with Carmen Boulter
body:
Advanced civilizations, such as Atlantis, were not felled within a night. Carmen Boulter tells of three catastrophes which shattered the ancient Golden Age of humanity and ushered in the Iron Age. Remnants of this bygone era, as unearthed from the great pyramids, offer us a clearer picture of who these Golden Age people were and how they constructed their marvelous structures as discussed in this interview with George Noory.

Click here to watch The Pyramid Code with Carmen Boulter

Creator of The Pyramid Code series and author of Angels and Archetypes: An Evolutionary Map of Feminine Consciousness, Dr. Carmen Boulter has done extensive research in the archives of the Egyptian Museum, gaining official access to the original field notes of excavations done around the pyramids in the early 1900s.
teaser: Carmen Boulter tells of three catastrophes which shattered the ancient Golden Age of humanity and ushered in the Iron Age. Tune in as she discusses Atlantis, Pyramids and more.﻿

title: Behind the Scenes of the Real Exorcist House with Jeff Lewis
body: Within a home, nestled in a quiet neighborhood of St. Louis, MO, from 1948-1949, a new horror was made manifest into the world. The events which took place in this home inspired the Hollywood movie, the Exorcist. Recently, filmmaker Jeff Lewis came to the exorcist house to film a movie inspired the actual events which transpired there, 70 years ago. What they caught on film, was not entirely in the script, as it seems something still lurks within the halls of this home as discussed in this interview with George Noory.
teaser: Within a home, nestled in a quiet neighborhood of St. Louis, MO, from 1948-1949, a new horror was made manifest into the world. Recently, filmmaker Jeff Lewis came to the exorcist house to film a movie inspired the actual events which transpired there, 70 years ago.

title: Unlocking Paranormal Abilities with Jeffrey Mishlove
body: Shifting paradigms within various scientific fields are finally bringing to light the hidden potential of human beings. This is nothing new for Jeffrey Mishlove, who is the sole holder of a Ph.D. in Parapsychology. His profound experiences bear witness to untapped human abilities essentially consigned solely to the esoteric and paranormal worlds are discussed in this interview with George Noory.
teaser: Shifting paradigms within various scientific fields are finally bringing to light the hidden potential of human beings. This is nothing new for Jeffrey Mishlove, who is the sole holder of a Ph.D. in Parapsychology.

title: Stranger in the Pentagon with Craig Campobasso
body:
Valiant Thor, an off-world visitor who came to the Pentagon in 1957, holds a higher perspective of humanity, as explained by filmmaker Craig Campobasso. Unlike many other extraterrestrials visiting our planet, Valiant Thor was very photogenic and not camera shy. It was what he had to offer that truly intrigued government officials who invited him to stay. Ultimately, the conditions of his proposal, which would benefit all of humanity, proved too much for the U.S Government to accept. For us, however, it is not too late as discussed in this interview with George Noory.

Fresh out of high school, Craig Campobasso found himself working behind the scenes on Frank Herbert’s Dune. Dino and Raffaella De Laurentiis, and director David Lynch became his filmmaking mentors. He has been casting movies and TV for more than three decades and was nominated for an Emmy for casting David E. Kelly’s Picket Fences. Craig directed, wrote & produced Stranger at the Pentagon, from the book by Frank Stranges about Valiant Thor. It just won Best Sci-Fi Short Film at the 2014 Burbank Int'l Film Festival.
teaser: Valiant Thor, an off-world visitor who came to the Pentagon in 1957, holds a higher perspectives of humanity, as explained by filmmaker Craig Campobasso. Unlike many other extraterrestrials visiting our planet, Valiant Thor was very photogenic and not camera shy.

title: From Corporate to Carefree with Susanne Wilson
body:
In this interview with George Noory, Susanne Wilson discusses the difficulties she faced as she secretly developed her psychic abilities while climbing the corporate ladder. But a near-death experience literally changed her mind about what was important for her life. Now she is the carefree medium with many famous clients, as well as helping people to develop their intuition. 

Susanne Wilson is a natural born medium who “hid in the psychic closet” for a long time while working as a corporate executive and university director. For over 20 years, she nurtured my gift in secret, until a near death experience changed her mind about what’s important in life. Now she lives and works from her own, private office in Carefree, Arizona. Her clients include celebrities as well as everyday people in countries all over the world.
teaser: Susanne Wilson discusses the difficulties she faced as she secretly developed her psychic abilities while climbing the corporate ladder. But a near death experience literally changed her mind about what was important for her life.

title: Atlantis Right before our Eyes with Frank Joseph Hoff
body:
In this interview with George Noory, Frank Joseph Hoff reveals that the greatest mystery of Atlantis is not the location of this arcane continent, but how the secrets of its location have been kept for over 11,600 years. Explorers have traversed the globe in search of new lands and lost civilizations and still, the most perplexing enigma is the whereabouts of Atlantis. Perhaps its location is not such a mystery after all. The question we should be asking is why the location of Atlantis has been kept such a great secret from the rest of humankind. 

From a very young age Frank Joseph Hoff became very interested in the sciences, ancient mysteries, lost civilizations and the unknown. In 1996, Mr. Hoff met up with Richard Hoagland at a Mars conference in Seattle and started doing some pro bono research for him on his off hours. It is while doing research for Mr. Hoagland that he came across the unusual work of a Brazilian professor by the name of Prof. Arysio Nunes dos Santos Ph.D. on his website, Atlantis - The Lost Continent Finally Found.
teaser: Frank Joseph Hoff reveals that the greatest mystery of Atlantis is not the location of this arcane continent, but how the secrets of its location have been kept for over 11,600 years. The question we should be asking is why the location of Atlantis has been kept such a great secret from the rest of humankind.

title: A Life without Regret with Vincent Genna
body: Vincent Genna’s first crack at life did not seem to set him up to become a psychic who helps to empower people to believe in themselves, but that is exactly what happened. Now he helps people reflect upon their childhood dreams to discover what they were meant to do and to rekindle the flame that was once lost. Make the changes now as discussed in this interview with George Noory.
teaser: Vincent Genna’s first crack at life did not seem to set him up to become a psychic who helps to empower people to believe in themselves, but that is exactly what happened. Now he helps people reflect upon their childhood dreams to discover what they were meant to do.

title: Let’s Talk Paranormal with Tracie Austin
body:
It is easy, sometimes, to turn a blind eye to all of the strange and unexplained events that take place in the world, every day. Then along comes someone like Tracie Austin whose passion it is to seek out and document paranormal occurrences from alien encounters to hauntings. What she brings to light reveals just how strange our world can be as discussed in this interview with George Noory.

Tracie is the Executive Producer and Host of her own cable TV talk show, originally produced in California, called "Let's Talk...Paranormal" which has become a success. She is also the author of, Welcome to Haunted Las Vegas, Nevada, and her new book, Alien Encounters in the Western United States. Her research into the UFO phenomena has been an on-going process since her first sighting in 1987, and she has investigated some highly strange UFO activity. Personal sightings of UFOs continue to date.
teaser: It is easy, sometimes, to turn a blind eye to all of the strange and unexplained events that take place in the world, every day. Then along comes someone like Tracie Austin whose passion it is to seek out and document paranormal occurrences from alien encounters to hauntings.

title: Contact with the Afterlife with Dianne Arcangel
body:
Death in inevitable for each and every one of us. But Dianne Arcangel has discovered, over the course of her career consoling the dying and the bereaved, that death does not have to be the end. There are ways of regaining the connection with our loved ones. She provides examples from the work of Dean Radin and Elizabeth Kubler-Ross which has born evidence of life after death and establishing contact in this interview with George Noory.

Dianne Arcangel is a former hospice chaplain, psychiatric hospital therapist, and Director of the Elisabeth Kubler-Ross Center of Houston. She served on the board of directors at the Rhine Research Center and the National Institute for Discovery Science, where she also led trainings and conducted research. She has also conducted survival research with the University of Virginia. She is the author of Afterlife Encounters: Ordinary People, Extraordinary Experiences, and Life After Loss.
teaser: Death in inevitable for each and every one of us. But Dianne Arcangel has discovered, over the course of her career consoling the dying and the bereaved, that death does not have to be the end. There are ways of regaining the connection with our loved ones.

title: Occult America with Mitch Horowitz
body:
In this interview with George Noory, Occult historian, Mitch Horowitz explains the role that esoterism and mysticism has played in shaping the culture of America. Since the dawn of the ages mankind has been fascinated by the unknown, the mysteries and the occult, the U.S. is no different. From Presidents consulting with astrologers to the strange symbols which embellish major institutions, the occult has always been a part of American History. 

Mitch Horowitz, author of Occult America, is a writer, publisher, and lecturer of many years’ experience with a lifelong interest in man’s search for meaning. He is vice-president and editor-in-chief at Tarcher/Penguin in New York. He has written on alternative spiritual topics for many popular publications and frequently speaks at universities, art spaces, spiritual centers, and public libraries
teaser: Occult historian, Mitch Horowitz explains the role that esoterism and mysticism has played in shaping the culture of America. Since the dawn of the ages mankind has been fascinated by the unknown, the mysteries and the occult, the U.S. is no different.

title: Exploring the Akashic Records with Bill Foss
body:
In another realm of being, a grand etheric library holds energetically imprinted records of every event that has happened and is yet to transpire. Bill Foss guides people on a journey through space and time to explore this ancient mystical realm, a place known as the Akashic Records. Here, an individual may learn about who they are on a soul level and what the patterns of their lives are all about, as well as understand karma, heal the self on multiple levels and many other benefits. You too may learn how to travel to this place and meet the Keepers of the Records who can open the chronicle of all of your lifetimes as discussed in this interview with George Noory.

Bill Foss is an internationally renowned author, speaker and teacher/facilitator of the Akashic Records and other related subjects. With over 20 yrs. experience of accessing the Akasha and 10 years’ experience in guiding, teaching and facilitating Akashic Records studies and access, Bill continues to work with individuals and groups around the globe as they Journey Into the Akashic Records.
teaser: In another realm of being, a grand library holds a record of every event that has happened and is yet to transpire. Bill Foss guides people on a journey to explore these arcane annals, a place known as the Akashic records.

title: Collapse of the Grid with Bobby Akart
body:
The delicate balance of our lives is cradled within the fragile arms of our electrical infrastructure. As Bobby Akart explains, the integrity of the electrical grid may be America’s greatest vulnerability. This leaves us open to the breakdown of society should any catastrophic event, such as a solar flare, EMP, or cyber-attack, occur. If we act now, we could prevent the collapse of the grid as discussed in this interview with George Noory. 

Bobby Akart, author of Prepping for Tomorrow, understands how the economy works and the profound effect politics has on the economy, as well. He received his Bachelor’s degree with a dual major in Economics and Political Science. As the founder of Freedom Preppers, he assists others become better prepared for the threats we face as Americans from catastrophic events, both natural and man-made.
teaser: Bobby Akart explains, the integrity of the electrical grid may be America’s greatest vulnerability. If we act now, we could prevent the collapse of the grid.

title: A Medium for the Living with Paul Selig
body:
As a clairaudient and empath, Paul Selig has the unique ability to channel the people his clients ask about. This is not about fixing problems or finding resolution. Rather it is about coming into an understanding of what is going on and uncovering the truth. Tune it to hear answers from the other side as Paul demonstrates his unique form of channeling in this interview with George Noory.

Paul Selig, author of the Book of Mastery, received his master’s degree from Yale and served on the faculty of New York University for over 25 years. During a spiritual experience in 1987, he discovered his clairvoyant abilities. Described as “a medium for the living,” Paul also has the unique ability to step-into and "become" the people his clients ask about. He is considered to be one of the foremost spiritual channels working today.
teaser: As a clairaudient and empath, Paul Selig has the unique ability to channel the people his clients ask about. This is not about fixing problems or finding resolution. Rather it is about coming into an understanding of what is going on and uncovering the truth.

title: Inner Workings of the Federal Reserve with G. Edward Griffin
body:
For many people, getting money from nothing would seem like an impossible dream. For a few private bankers, who hold a stake in the Federal Reserve, this is a dream come true. G. Edward Griffin peels away the layers of obscurity to expose the inner workings of America’s most secretive banking institution, the Federal Reserve. He also explains that we are not powerless before this financial tyrant in this interview with George Noory.

G. Edward Griffin is a writer and documentary film producer with many successful titles to his credit, including, The Creature from Jekyll Island and World Without Cancer. He has dealt with such diverse subjects as archaeology and ancient Earth history, the Federal Reserve System and international banking, terrorism, internal subversion, the history of taxation, U.S. foreign policy, the science and politics of cancer therapy, the Supreme Court, and the United Nations.
teaser: For many people, getting money from nothing would seem like an impossible dream. For a few private bankers, who hold a stake in the Federal Reserve, this is a dream come true. G. Edward Griffin peels away the layers of obscurity to expose the inner workings of the Federal Reserve.

title: Waging War Against Climate Science with Tim Ball
body:
The debate continues to rage as to the cause and solution to climate change. Tim Ball has come forward, openly rejecting the scientific consensus that the growing levels of carbon dioxide is dangerous. Rather he claims that climate science is a swindle, saying it is politically motivated propaganda aimed at controlling and reducing population as discussed in this interview with George Noory.

Dr. Tim Ball is a renowned environmental consultant and former professor of climatology at the University of Winnipeg. Dr. Ball's extensive science background in climatology, especially the reconstruction of past climates and the impact of climate change on human history and the human condition, make him the ideal head of NRSP (National Resources Stewardship Project).
teaser: The debate continues to rage as to the cause and solution to climate change. Tim Ball has come forward, openly rejecting the scientific consensus that the growing levels of carbon dioxide is dangerous.

title: Exploring the Afterlife without Dying with  Eben Alexander
body:
Things changed dramatically for Eben Alexander, a neurosurgeon once skeptical of the paranormal, when he had a near-death experience. This experience placed him in the unique position to pursue the scientific truth of what happens to us when we die. What he discovered is that consciousness is not produced by the brain; it stems from something much greater. He now shares how we can use our own consciousness to explore the afterlife, without having a near-death experience in this interview with George Noory.

Dr. Eben Alexander, author of Proof of Heaven, is a renowned academic neurosurgeon who spent 54 years honing his scientific worldview. Everything changed the day his life-threatening battle with a rare bacterial meningitis threw him into a seven-day coma. When he woke, the Near-Death Experience (NDE) he'd had--while his neocortex was completely shut down--challenged him to reconsider everything he thought he knew about consciousness and the brain. He has spent the last five years reconciling his rich spiritual experience with contemporary physics and cosmology.
teaser: Things changed dramatically for Eben Alexander, a neurosurgeon once skeptical of the paranormal, when he had a near death experience. This experience placed him in the unique position to pursue the scientific truth of what happens to us when we die.

title: Paranormal Tales with Jim Harold
body:
Jim Harold, a popular paranormal podcaster, has been privy to a plethora of personal anecdotes of paranormal encounters. He recounts a number of the strange tales he has heard. Many of these accounts do not fall into the category of simple ghost tales. Find out what happened at the Road House Saloon, what happens when the English Nurse pays you a visit, and much more in this interview with George Noory.

Jim Harold is America’s most popular paranormal podcast host. He holds a Master’s Degree in Applied Communication Theory and Methodology and is accredited as a Certified Digital Media Consultant by the Radio Advertising Bureau. His two free flagship programs, The Paranormal Podcast and Jim Harold’s Campfire has developed a loyal following that spans the globe.
teaser: Jim Harold, a popular paranormal podcaster, has been privy to a plethora of personal anecdotes of paranormal encounters. He recounts a number of the strange tales he has heard. Many of these accounts do not fall into the category of simple ghost tales.

title: Small Town Monsters with Seth Breedlove
body:
Documentary filmmaker, Seth Breedlove investigates accounts of small town monsters. From eyewitness accounts to amateur video, no stone is left unturned in search of these mysterious creatures. Not settled with the ordinary explanation of Bigfoot sightings, his investigation into the towns of Minerva and Whitehall uncovered strange creatures with glowing red eyes. This is only one of many different types of creatures he uncovers in this interview with George Noory.

Seth Breedlove is a freelance investigative journalist, film director, screenwriter, and podcast host. In 2013 Seth began working on the concept for a series titled Small Town Monsters. The first chapter in this series is the film, Minerva Monster. In 2015 Seth started Small Town Media. A small business marketing, cinematography and production company geared toward independent business owners and indie filmmakers. Their first official full-scale film release will be Beast of Whitehall in 2016.
teaser: Documentary filmmaker, Seth Breedlove investigates accounts of small town monsters. From eyewitness accounts to amateur video, no stone is left unturned in search of these mysterious creatures.

title: The Works of G. Edward Griffin
body:
Noted researcher and author G. Edward Griffin sheds light on three secrets and cover-ups that have shaped his career. He reveals details which provide scientific support for the great flood and Noah’s ark. Plus, he offers his unique insight into what really happened with the JFK assassination and why we do not yet have an official cure for cancer in this interview with George Noory.

G. Edward Griffin is a writer and documentary film producer with many successful titles to his credit, including, The Creature from Jekyll Island and World Without Cancer. He has dealt with such diverse subjects as archaeology and ancient Earth history, the Federal Reserve System and international banking, terrorism, internal subversion, the history of taxation, U.S. foreign policy, the science and politics of cancer therapy, the Supreme Court, and the United Nations.
teaser: G. Edward Griffin reveals details which provide scientific support for the great flood and Noah’s ark. Plus, he offers his unique insight into what really happened with the JFK assassination and why we do not yet have an official cure for cancer.

title: Following Plato to Atlantis with Mark Adams
body:
Since the dialogues of Plato, humanity has had an obsession with pinpointing the mythic lands of Atlantis. Mark Adams is no exception, but he takes a unique stance in his search for this ancient land. Using Plato’s words as the authoritative source, he has uncovered fifty one geographic clues which may identify the exact location of Atlantis. Now he is ready to reveal four real-life locations which may have once been the site of this ancient civilization as discussed in this interview with George Noory.

Mark Adams, author of Meet Me in Atlantis, has been fascinated with lost cities and sacred ruins since age 12. Mark has explored and gathered information concerning Atlantis as part of his life's work. He has written for publications ranging from National Geographic Adventure to GQ to Rolling Stone, and is currently researching the lost city of Atlantis.
teaser: Since the dialogues of Plato, humanity has had an obsession with pinpointing the mythic lands of Atlantis. Mark Adams is no exception, but he takes a unique stance in his search for this ancient land, using Plato’s words as the authoritative source.

title: Remote Viewing and Collective Consciousness with Marty Rosenblatt
body:
Since the methods of Remote Viewing were made available to the public, advances in techniques and technology have made dramatic improvements in accuracy. Marty Rosenblatt's advances have been made utilizing his background in physics and understanding the role of precognition and empathy. He explains the role of consciousness in continuously shaping our reality and how humanity’s collective mind can communicate across time in this interview with George Noory.

Marty Rosenblatt received his M.S. in Physics from UCLA and is one of the Original co-Founders of the Applied Precognition Project.  He is the Group Manager for several APP precognition groups, an Associative Remote Viewer and Analyst/Judge applying the ARV Winning Entanglements protocol. Marty is also President of Physics Intuition Applications, which he founded in 1998 to apply Remote Viewing to predicting stock market and sporting event outcomes.
teaser: Marty Rosenblatt's advances in Remote Viewing have been made utilizing his background in physics and understanding the role of precognition and empathy. He explains the role of consciousness in continuously shaping our reality and how humanity’s collective mind can communicate across time.

title: The Dead Sea Scrolls Revealed with Ken Hanson
body:
In 1947, the discovery of ancient documents hidden in a cave for over a thousand years would rattle the foundations of Christianity. Ken Hanson has studied these documents and has made it his mission to breathe new life into the Dead Sea Scrolls. These scrolls give us insights into the beliefs of the people who were alive before the New Testament was written. The War Scroll, in particular, has been his primary focus, which may predict a series of seven wars that portend the end times as discussed in this interview with George Noory. 

Dr. Ken Hanson, author, lecturer, is devoted to disseminating knowledge of the Biblical and classical world. He has dug on archaeological sites in the Middle East, lived in a politically volatile region of northern Galilee, and taught Hebrew on an Israeli agricultural settlement. He has also worked with a television news-gathering operation in a war zone in southern Lebanon, at the height of the civil war that left the jewel of the Mediterranean in ruins.
teaser: In 1947, the discovery of ancient documents hidden in a cave for over a thousand years would rattle the foundations of Christianity. Ken Hanson has studied these documents and has made it his mission to breathe new life into the Dead Sea Scrolls.

title: America’s Financial Reckoning Day with Chuck Coppes
body:
In 2008 a financial crisis struck the United States from which we still have not fully recovered. Chuck Coppes expounds upon the history of money and central banking, which lay at the heart of this continuing crunch. The problem, he explains, is not limited to America. Rather, it is perpetuated by the rampant propagation of central banking around the world and the few individuals who are in control of these financial institutions as discussed in this interview with George Noory.

Charles H. (Chuck) Coppes, author of America’s Financial Reckoning Day, is the founder and president of IDP Consulting Group, LLC, an independent precious metals and consulting firm that assists clients with pension fund rollovers, commercial storage and physical delivery of precious metals.  With a business background in sales and marketing for almost forty years, he has been a licensed securities broker and a featured guest on local and national radio programs.
teaser: In 2008 a financial crisis struck the United States from which we still have not fully recovered. Chuck Coppes expounds upon the history of money and central banking, which lay at the heart of this continuing crunch.

title: Get Smarter with Dan Hurley
body:
When you sharpen your brain, you sharpen every aspect of your life. Many of us assume that intelligence is something that we are born with and that the IQ score is the limit of our mental capacity. Dan Hurley has investigated many different ways of improving brain power and has found that reality does not always follow our preconceptions. Every minute of every day, we are training our brain and we have always had the capability to get smarter as discussed in this interview with George Noory.

Award-winning science journalist, Dan Hurley has written on the science of increasing intelligence for the Washington Post and Neurology Today. He is author of, Smarter and was featured in the 2013 PBS documentary feature, Smarter Brains. His previous book, Diabetes Rising, was excerpted in Discover and Wired. He has written nearly two dozen articles for the New York Times since 2005.
teaser: Many of us assume that intelligence is something that we are born with and that the IQ score is the limit of our mental capacity. But we have always had the capability to get smarter.

title: Psychotronic Weapons with Dr. John R. Hall
body:
What if that nagging little voice in the back of your head is not always your own? Are you going crazy, or are you the victim of a new form of electronic harassment? New reports are coming to light of advanced mind-control technology, using satellites, which has been placed in the hands of unscrupulous government organizations who are targeting vast swaths of the civilian population. Dr. John R. Hall helps victims of this technology overcome the adverse effects of these Psychotronic weapons and return to living a normal peaceful life as discussed in this interview with George Noory.

Dr. John R. Hall, author of A New Breed: Satellite Terrorism in America, is Board Certified in Anesthesiology and was born and raised in San Antonio, Texas. He is an active member of the Mind Science Foundation, dedicated to the study of human consciousness and sits on the medical committee of the human rights organization, Freedom from Covert Harassment and Surveillance.
teaser: In this show, Dr. John R. Hall describes how to overcome the adverse effects of Psychotronic weapons, like satellite-powered mind-control technology.

title: At the Financial Core of Power with Dr. Peter Phillips
body:
Why is it that those with money and power continuously work to expand their control over others? Peter Phillips has intensely studied the intricate working of the top financial elite and has gained a unique perspective of what caused the great wealth inequality which has beset the world’s economies. He found that the core of these trans-nationalist capitalists consists of only thirteen firms who maintain their control through propaganda, wars and legislation as discussed in this interview with George Noory.

Dr. Peter Phillips is a Professor of Sociology at Sonoma State University and former Director of Project Censored. He teaches classes in Media Censorship, Investigative Sociology, Sociology of Power, Political Sociology, and Sociology of Media. He has published eleven editions of Censored: Media Democracy in Acton from Seven Stories Press. Also fromSeven Stories Press is Impeach the President: The Case Against Bush and Cheney (2006) and Project Censored Guide to Independent Media and Activism (2003).

title: Alien Disarmament with Robert Hastings
body:
Many men and women who have served in the U.S Military's nuclear silos, claim that extraterrestrials are real and it seems that they do not want us to have nuclear weapons. Robert Hastings, a documentary film maker, has interviewed over 160 military veterans and civilians who all have reported repeated visitations by unidentified aircraft which have interfered with the operation of nuclear missiles. This phenomena is not limited to the U.S. as recently released documents reveal that Russians have also encountered the same problems with UFOs disabling their nuclear arsenal as discussed in this interview with George Noory.

For more than 40 years, noted researcher Robert Hastings has sought out and interviewed former and retired U.S. Air Force personnel regarding their direct or indirect involvement in nuclear weapons-related UFO incidents.  To date, Hastings has interviewed more than 150 military veterans who were involved in various UFO-related incidents at U.S. missile sites, weapons storage facilities, and nuclear bomb test ranges. Since 1981, Hastings has presented his research findings at more than 500 colleges and universities nationwide, and possesses hundreds of highly favorable letters of recommendation from sponsors.
teaser: Robert Hastings, a documentary film maker, has interviewed over 160 military veterans and civilians who all have reported repeated visitations by unidentified aircraft which have interfered with the operation of nuclear missiles.

title: When Technology Fails with Matthew Stein
body:
Are we so dependent upon our technology that we would fail to survive should a major natural disaster strike? Matthew Stein believes that this is true. To that effect, he details six possible scenarios which could lead to the downfall of civilization as we know it. But there is still hope, as he offers suggestions which could mitigate or prevent a potential disaster that could lead to planetary collapse as discussed in this interview with George Noory.

Matthew Stein is an engineer, author and building contractor who holds a Bachelor of Science in Mechanical Engineering from MIT. He is an engineer, author and building contractor. The engineer, carpenter, and backwoodsman sides of Mat found peace, harmony, and synergy through renewable energy, green building, and self-reliance. Today, Mat owns and operates Stein Design and Construction, providing product design services, engineering analysis, and green building.
teaser: Are we so dependent upon our technology that we would fail to survive should a major natural disaster strike? Matthew Stein believes that this is true. To that effect, he details six possible scenarios which could lead to the downfall of civilization and offers suggestions which could prevent a potential disaster.

title: Besieged by Bigfoot with Christine Parker
body:
A strange howl in the dead of night changed one family’s life, forever. From that moment on, the Parker family has been besieged by Bigfoot-type creatures living near their home. In this interview with George Noory, Christine Parker recounts many terrifying encounters she and her family have endured since Bigfoot moved in. 

Christine D. Parker is the author of the, 100 Bigfoot Nights, series of books. She lives in a residential neighborhood, where across the street from her house is an old, creepy forest where Bigfoot and the unknown lurk. Her family has been tormented by the creatures and according to the Bigfoot investigator they contacted, they aren’t going anywhere.
teaser: A strange howl in the dead of night changed one family’s life, forever. From that moment on, the Parker family has been besieged by Bigfoot-type creatures living near their home.

title: Future Technology, Today with Charles Ostman
body:
The technology of the future may be closer than you think and we may need it to ensure the continuity of our species. We are crossing an evolutionary threshold where the boundary between science fiction and science fact is blurring. Cautionary tales of a dystopian future paint a picture where humanity is oppressed by technological overlords. However, Charles Ostmann sees a different future where nanotechnology, artificial telepathy and artificial intelligence may be essential to surviving an imminent planetary catastrophe as discussed in this interview with George Noory.
  
Charles Ostman is a senior fellow at the Institute for Global Futures and serves with the management team of Fourth Venture. He is also chair of the NanoElectronics and Photonics Forum of NanoSig., senior consultant with Silicon Valley Nano Ventures, and serves on the scientific advisory board of Legendary Pharmaceuticals. . Charles has 25+ years experience in the fields of electronics, materials science, computing and artificial intelligence, including eight years at Lawrence Berkeley Laboratory at the University of California, Berkeley, and Los Alamos National Laboratory.
teaser: Charles Ostmann sees a future where nanotechnology, artificial telepathy and artificial intelligence may be essential to surviving an imminent planetary catastrophe.

title: Resolving Past Life Issues with Ann Barham
body:
There is more to a past life regression than simply learning who you were in another lifetime. Throughout our various incarnations, each one of use was born with gifts which can be of benefit across lifetimes. In addition we have encountered hardships which affect the behaviors and experiences in the present life. Ann Barham helps her clients discover these gifts and challenges, and guides them in overcoming the unprocessed emotions which may still be causing problems within this lifetime as discussed in this interview with George Noory.

Ann Barham is a certified regression therapist with training in transpersonal psychology, hypnosis, therapeutic imagery, and trauma release modalities. Throughout her nearly twenty year career, her practice has evolved to merge her interest in spirituality with her counseling work. Now she is focusing almost exclusively on past life regression therapy, which she believes has the greatest healing impact for her clients in the shortest amount of time.
teaser: There is more to a past life regression than simply learning who you were in another lifetime. Ann Barham helps her clients discover these gifts and challenges, and guides them in overcoming the unprocessed emotions which may still be causing problems within this lifetime.

title: Intercepting UFO Reports with Erica Lukes
body:
January 14, 2016, ham radio operator Pat Daniels intercepted a radio transmission from American Airlines flight 434 reporting an encounter with a strange flying object near Nephi, Utah. The pilot described the object as a bright-glowing orange square nearly a mile wide. As soon as Erica Lukes got wind of this transmission, MUFON was on the case submitting FOIA requests to the FAA for all radar reports and audio recordings related to this event. The materials that they received confirmed the radio operator’s story and raised more questions about what really happened that day as discussed in this interview with George Noory.

When she picked up her first book on UFOs at the age of 6, Erica Lukes became interested in the subject. She joined MUFON after several unexplained sightings in the Salt Lake valley and believes, with the NSA and Dugway proving ground in her backyard, there is lot of unexplained phenomenon that must be documented and shared with the world. As State Director of Utah, her goal is to put Utah back on the MUFON radar.
teaser: January 14, 2016, ham radio operator Pat Daniels intercepted a radio transmission from American Airlines flight 434 reporting an encounter with a strange flying object. As soon as Erica Lukes got wind of this transmission, MUFON was on the case submitting FOIA requests.

title: Ending the Lunar Landing Debate? with Ken Johnston
body:
Skeptics and believers alike continue to debate whether or not humans have actually set foot upon the moon. But one man may hold the evidence needed to end the lunar landing debate, Ken Johnston. After refusing to follow orders to destroy original photographs from the Apollo missions, he has amassed a collection of images which can prove that the lunar landings were not faked. What’s more, his collection of images also show what appears to be the presence of extraterrestrial bases on the moon as discussed in this interview with George Noory.

Ken Johnston was one of the five original pilots who tested all of the Apollo equipment including the lunar module. He spent 23 years at NASA working with numerous space programs as well as the astronauts who manned those missions. He is familiar with the processes of checks and balances used within NASA to secure the safety of a mission.
teaser: Skeptics and believers alike continue to debate whether or not humans have actually set foot upon the moon. After refusing to follow orders to destroy original photographs from the Apollo missions, Ken Johnston has amassed a collection of images which may end the lunar landing debate.

title: Exposing the FOIA with John Greenewald
body:
The Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) was designed to give us the right to access otherwise inaccessible information from the federal government. Some information is readily available and some may be difficult to retrieve. But certain types of information have proven to be irretrievably lost by accident or by design. After more than 20 years of filing requests, John Greenwald still has difficulty navigating the complexities of the FOIA process. That has proved little hindrance in his acquisition of more than a 1.5 million pages documents exposing secrets concerning UFOs and the true story of Operation High Jump as discussed in this interview with George Noory.

John Greenewald, Jr. began researching the secret inner workings of the U.S. Government at the young age of fifteen. Since then, he has accumulated an astonishing number of documents on topics related to UFOs, the JFK Assassination, chemical, biological, and nuclear weapons, and top secret aircraft. Greenewald's online archive became known globally as "The Black Vault." His teenage project turned into the largest private online collection anywhere in the world, totaling nearly 1.5 million pages of material.
teaser: After more than 20 years of filing requests John Greenwald has acquired more than a 1.5 million pages documents exposing secrets concerning UFOs and the true story of Operation High Jump.

title: Debunking the Paranormal with Joe Nickell
body:
Many people have claimed to have had terrifying encounters with poltergeists and other supernatural beings. Some of these experiences have become the subject of popular Hollywood movies. But Joe Nickell, a professional paranormal investigator and sceptic, is having none of it. He has explored the stories behind films such as The Exorcist, Amityville Horror and the Conjuring and he offers his take on what is really going on in this interview with George Noory.

Joe Nickell was a professional stage magician and private investigator for a world-famous detective agency. Now he is an investigative columnist for Skeptical Inquirer magazine and Senior Research Fellow of the Committee for the Scientific Investigation of Claims of the Paranormal. Utilizing his varied background, Nickell has become widely known as an investigator of myths and mysteries, frauds, forgeries, and hoaxes.
teaser: Join George Noory and Joe Nickell in this new episode of Beyond Belief as they explore the stories behind films such as The Exorcist, Amityville Horror and the Conjuring and he offers his take on what is really going on.

We have heard much about the presence of extraterrestrials on Earth and the few people who have made contact with them. Many others have tried to engage with such beings and have had little to no success. Now there is hope for everyone. Rebecca Hardcastle, founder of the Institute for Exoconsciousness, teaches people how to reach out with their minds and successfully initiate communication with benevolent extraterrestrial entities as discussed in this interview with George Noory.

Rebecca Hardcastle Wright, PhD, founded the Institute for Exoconsciousness to research and apply the abilities of human consciousness sourced in extraterrestrial contact. The concept of Exoconsciousness is used to study of the extraterrestrial origins, dimensions and abilities of human consciousness. At its heart, it is a social, cultural movement that joins with consciousness scientists, energy healers, spiritual beings, paranormal researchers and near death experiencers to transform how we know ourselves.

David Wilcock returns to explain what we can do to tip the balance of power in favor of disclosure and secure the continued ascension of humanity.

body:
Tales of Noah, his mighty ark and the horde of animals surviving a worldwide flood have been woven into the fabric of western culture. But new information comes to light which may offer a completely different arc to this pivotal moment in human history. After poring through ancient documents and cross referencing modern scientific theory, investigative researcher Mark Combs suggests a new approach to understanding the great deluge and tales of Noah’s ark in this interview with George Noory.

Critical investigative researcher Mark Combs is fascinated by ancient mysteries, biblical history and the origins of man. He cross references historical texts from a number of ancient civilizations with modern day scientific theory and pieces together the backstory of life before Noah’s Flood. In 2013, Mark began to focus more of his attention on motivational writing and speaking.
teaser: Tales of Noah, his mighty ark and the horde of animals surviving a worldwide flood have been woven into the fabric of western culture. But new information comes to light which may offer a completely different arc to this pivotal moment in human history.

title: Illuminating Cosmic Treasures with Robert Nemiroff
body:
A vast treasure trove of undiscovered delights await the ardent seeker, tucked away in the darkest depths of deep space. With the advent of the Hubble Deep Field projects and the imminent launch of new satellite observatories, the universe may be getting a little smaller. Robert Nemiroff brings to light many of the brilliant wonders lurking, in what appear to us, as the darkest regions of the night sky in this episode with George Noory.

Robert Nemiroff worked at NASA's Goddard Space Flight Center in Maryland, USA before coming to Michigan Tech. He led a group that developed and deployed the first online fisheye night sky monitor, called CONCAMs, deploying later models to most major astronomical observatories. His current research interests include trying to limit attributes of our universe with distant gamma-ray bursts, and investigating the use of relativistic illumination fronts to orient astronomical nebulae. In 1995, he co-created the Astronomy Picture of the Day (APOD) with the main NASA website.
teaser: A vast treasure trove of undiscovered delights await the ardent seeker, tucked away in the darkest depths of deep space. Robert Nemiroff brings to light many of the brilliant wonders lurking, in what appear to us, as the darkest regions of the night sky.

Sonja Grace has been offering her clients immediate stability, clarity, and guidance for over thirty years. Marshall Masters is a former CNN Science Features news producer, freelance writer, television analyst and the publisher of YOWUSA.COM. Lamar Waldron holds a Master’s degree in Counseling and Psychology from Georgia State University and had a successful career in that field before devoting himself to the JFK field in 1989. Waldron wrote two books about the JFK assassination: Ultimate Sacrifice and, Legacy of Secrecy.For his latest book, Watergate: The Hidden History--Nixon, the Mafia, and the CIA, Waldron obtained, from the National Archives, the first files officially linking the Mafia to Watergate, and showing what the Watergate burglars were really after.

Carmen Boulter has pieced together many fragmented tales of Atlantis inherited by its progeny, in ancient Egypt, and offers a new perspective of this ancient advanced civilization. title: The Life of Aleister Crowley: From Diabolical to Divine with Lon Milo DuQuette
body:
Dubbed as the wickedest man in the world, the public life and spiritual practice of Aleister Crowley has been the subject of many dubious debates. However, an authentic inspection of who he really was and what he was trying to accomplish paints a different portrait of this influential esoteric teacher. Lon Milo DuQuette explores the life and times of Aleister Crowley to reveal why he got such a bum rap, despite having the same motives as every holy man who has tried to raise the consciousness of the planet in this interview with George Noory.

In 1972, Lon Milo DuQuette quit the music business and pursued his interest in mysticism, particularly the work of Aleister Crowley. He began writing professionally in 1988 and has since published 16 books (translated into 12 languages).
teaser: Dubbed as the wickedest man in the world, the public life and spiritual practice of Aleister Crowley has been the subject of many dubious debates. However, an authentic inspection of who he really was and what he was trying to accomplish paints a different portrait of this influential esoteric teacher.

body:

Far beyond the limits of our corporeal reality a strange holographic projector transmits information that we perceive as physical reality. An increasing number of scientists are accepting the idea that our reality is a holographic projection and new data comes to light which suggests that this projection is artificial in nature. Despite these controversial revelations, our spiritual mission of conscious evolution remains fully intact. 

Linda Moulton Howe is an American investigative journalist and documentary producer-writer-director-editor who is currently based in Albuquerque, New Mexico. She reports her findings on Earth Files.

Here, an individual may learn about who they are, on a soul level, and what the patterns of their lives are all about, as well as understand karma, heal the self on multiple levels and many other benefits. You too may learn how to travel to this place and meet the Keepers of the Records who can open the chronicle of all of your lifetimes. Learn more in this interview with George Noory.

Bill Foss is an internationally renowned author, speaker and teacher/facilitator of the Akashic Records and other related subjects. With over 20 yrs. experience of accessing the Akasha and 10 years’ experience in guiding, teaching and facilitating Akashic Records studies and access, Bill continues to work with individuals and groups around the globe as they Journey Into the Akashic Records.

body:

body: In this interview with George Noory, Ron Felber recounts the tale of a young couple vacationing deep in the Mojave desert where they endured psychological torment at the hands of extraterrestrial captors. Breaking the darkness of the night sky, strange lights suddenly appeared overhead. Soon they would succumb to a strange telepathic power which forced them to relive traumatic situations from their lives, over and over. After the torment, they were given a strange and dire warning about the end of our universe.

title: Bringing Disclosure to the World
body: Government agencies, the world over, have long sidestepped admitting the extent of alien activity and Richard Dolan has uncovered the motivations underlying this perpetual suppression of information. There may never be a time when disclosure is voluntarily released, unless something happens in which the extraterrestrial presence can no longer be denied. Until that time, the nature of the political reality holds firm to a policy of secrecy that maintains power and profitability for a select few. But this secrecy has been destructive to our society for so long, that the populace may demand disclosure sooner than the power-elite are willing to provide it. body: Among the many projects that Daniel Sheehan has engaged, perhaps his most passionate fight is to reduce humanity’s contribution to climate change. This is something to which even the Vatican has commented on and Daniel works to forward the educated-opinion of the pope to the energy companies at the heart of the debate. He cites that among his greatest rivals are the public relations firms hired by oil and gas corporations which work to skew public opinion in their favor, against what may be best for the planet and all its inhabitants in this interview with George Noory.

title: Disclosure: The U.S. Government’s Role with Grant Cameron
body:
In this interview with George Noory, Grant Cameron discusses the U.S. government’s role in keeping full disclosure from the public and how certain organizations are releasing slow drips of information from the inside. Through indirect means, we are getting disclosure, piece by piece. It may be a convenient illusion to believe that the presidents of the United States have little to no insight into the E.T. presence on Earth. But they may know more than they let on. Grant also discusses the connection between consciousness and the physics of faster than light travel which has been confirmed by scientists working on such secret projects. 

Grant Cameron became involved in Ufology in 1975. In the past few years he has turned his research interests to the involvement and actions of the President of the United States in the UFO problem.

body: John Greenewald has perfected a strategy for forcing details of disclosure from the government’s hand, using the legal maneuvering afforded by the Freedom of Information Act. As the U.S. government continues to deny alien activity on Earth, documents detailing extraterrestrial activity and the development of secret technologies strongly dispute the official position. Many files still remain locked away from public view, until recalled via FOIA requests and even then, important information can still be redacted. But perhaps the biggest threat facing the U.S. government is not what they know, but what they do not know. Learn more in this interview with George Noory.

title: Roswell Anniversary: The Disclosure Continues with Don Schmitt
body: For the 70th anniversary of the Roswell Crash, UFO Investigator Don Schmitt explores the continuing cover-up of the world’s most famous flying saucer crash. On the night of July 8, 1947, between the thunderclaps of a particularly violent storm, a strange explosive sound echoed across the farmlands of Roswell, NM.  The next morning fields were strewn with debris of a mysterious material bedecked with strange symbols. The military quickly swooped in to collect the wreckage and inadvertently told the world what they found. Upon the very next morning an intensive cover-up and disinformation campaign began, which remains intact to this day. Learn more in this interview with George Noory.
teaser: For the 70th anniversary of the Roswell Crash, UFO Investigator Don Schmitt explores the continuing cover-up of the world’s most famous flying saucer crash.

title: Redfern's Alternative Roswell with Nick Redfern
body:
What if the crash at Roswell was not a flying saucer with alien bodies? Nick Redfern has extensively researched Roswell and has come away with a new theory that is even more controversial than extraterrestrial visitation. A new investigation was opened in 1993 which disclosed details suggesting that the wreckage was from a classified weaponized-balloon program. At the time, the U.S. and Japan both actively tested high altitude balloons for military applications. Sometimes they were fitted with explosives, other tests used animal subjects or humans. No matter the outcome, alien or human in origin, Roswell will always be an important case for UFOlogy. Learn more in this interview with George Noory.

Nick Redfern’s main area of research centers around determining what has been learned about the UFO subject at an official level in Britain. At the Public Record Office in London, he has uncovered thousands of pages of previously-classified Royal Air Force, Air Ministry and Ministry of Defense files on UFOs dating from the Second World War.
teaser: Nick Redfern has extensively researched Roswell and has come away with a new theory that is even more controversial than extraterrestrial visitation. No matter the outcome, alien or human in origin, Roswell will always be an important case for UFOlogy.

body:
Hidden details within the many photos NASA releases to the public may be all the proof we need of extraterrestrial civilizations in our solar system. Billy Carson heads a team of anomaly hunters who tirelessly pore over every feature in these photos in the pursuit to uncover out of place artifacts strewn about the solar system. What they have found on Venus, Mars and from the ISS not only suggests the active presence of extraterrestrials, but the expansion of a human-based secret space program and breakaway civilizations. As we continue to push the limits of disclosure, a number of credible sources are now willing to come forward to confirm what has been discovered in the data released by NASA.  Learn more in this interview with George Noory.

Billy Carson is an avid blogger and social media manager of over a dozen social media accounts with followers totaling over 1 million. He is the founder of 4biddenknowledge on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter and Tumblr. Topics discussed range from ancient suppressed knowledge to current day events.
teaser: Hidden details within the many photos NASA releases to the public may be all the proof we need of extraterrestrial civilizations in our solar system. Billy Carson heads a team of anomaly hunters who tirelessly pore over every photo to uncover out of place artifacts.

Understanding sentience as it pertains to precognition, Remote Viewing and UFO phenomena can be tricky, because the moment you think you have the answers, a whole new dimension of complexity opens up. Learn more in this interview with George Noory.

teaser: John Alexander has discovered a broad range of phenomena, connecting UFOs with consciousness, during his years of research into field of UFOlogy. Understanding sentience as it pertains to such phenomena can be tricky.

body:

The brain and its function, have been the subject of intense study, throughout many fields of science for decades. As more is discovered, the mystery of the mind deepens. From the effect of music on learning to reprogramming fear responses, we can consciously influence how our brain affects the way we behave. He offers tips and tricks for making the most of your mind in this interview with George Noory.

Neil Slade is the author of Tickle Your Amygdala, The Frontal Lobes Supercharge,Brain Tuning, Secret of The Dormant Brain Lab and The Book of Wands, and Brain Magic 2/Creativity From Another Dimension. He is also a lifelong musical composer, seasoned concert performer, and teacher.
Neil Slade is the author of Tickle Your Amygdala, The Frontal Lobes Supercharge,Brain Tuning, Secret of The Dormant Brain Lab and The Book of Wands, and Brain Magic 2/Creativity From Another Dimension. He is also a lifelong musical composer, seasoned concert performer, and teacher.

The biggest deterrent upon this path may be the technological revolution which promises to connect the human brain to an illusory greater collective. We learn that much of the technology which we take for granted came from studying the wreckage of Roswell and other crashes. More importantly, we learn of the technology still being withheld, due to the psychological and economic implication for the whole planet. As history progresses, humanity must change and with our sociological progress, dialog with extraterrestrials will finally be open for the whole of humanity. In his pursuit to inform the public, he leaves no stone unturned in bringing to light the most recent results, addressing the concerns of the critics and openly baring outstanding questions just begging to be answered in this interview with George Noory.

Learn how Marla uses her abilities to help law enforcement, her explorations of consciousness through the Monroe Institute, her training in remote viewing, and much more in this interview with George Noory.

Despite the slow trickle of information, with enough people pursuing the truth, one day we will get the answers we have all been seeking.
