body:
From his own personal experience, Dr. Eben Alexander has found that life goes on beyond the moment of death. His adventure to the other side not only helped him to heal himself, but brought him a deep understanding of the connection between emotional and spiritual health. Now, he uses vibration and frequency, through special music, to help others access states of consciousness where their minds access the many layers of the spiritual realms, without an NDE. This leads to the realization that we co-create the universe with the great infinite creator. The more aligned we are to that, the more we can escape the boundaries of self and the woes of our world. Learn more in this interview with George Noory.

Dr. Eben Alexander, author of Proof of Heaven, is a renowned academic neurosurgeon who spent 54 years honing his scientific worldview. Everything changed the day his life-threatening battle with a rare bacterial meningitis threw him into a seven-day coma. When he woke, the Near-Death Experience (NDE) he'd had--while his neocortex was completely shut down--challenged him to reconsider everything he thought he knew about consciousness and the brain.

body:
Habitable life on this planet is far older than scientific credit is given and the research of Brad Olsen reveals that hominid life is far more diverse than anyone could have ever imagined. But to protect the accepted narrative of mainstream science, these findings have been quickly swept away and kept out of the inquisitive eye of the public. Brad Olsen is the author of nine books, including two in his Esoteric Series: “Modern Esoteric” and “Future Esoteric.” An award-winning author, public speaker, radio show host of “The Esoteric Circle,” book publisher and event producer, his keynote presentations and interviews have enlightened audiences at convention all over the world.

body:

Patrick Wood sounds the clarion call announcing the shift of power from the hands of the elite into a new world run by technology. It is a world where paradigms of efficiency are enforced by a new ruling class of scientists and engineers who use technology to wield power. He is the author of Technocracy Rising: The Trojan Horse of Global Transformation (2015) and co-author of Trilaterals Over Washington, Volumes I and II (1978-1980) with the late Antony C. Sutton.

body:
A former FBI special agent, John Desouza, may have been the real X-Files guy. Even though he pushed to get to the heart of these happenings, he was met with an ever-strengthening shroud of secrecy, obscuring his work and discrediting witnesses. He explains key tactics used as part of this cover-up operation, which are used in mainstream and social media whenever news of unusual events leak to the public. John DeSouza was an FBI Special Agent who maintained a Top Secret security clearance for over 25 years as he investigated paranormal experiences. During that time, he collected what he calls, the real-life X-FILES.
teaser: A former FBI special agent, John Desouza, may have been the real X-Files guy. He comes forward to reveal results from his investigations into paranormal phenomena, including UFO sightings and encounters with strange beings.

Joshua Warren, a paranormal investigator, has discovered a connection between ghosts, UFOs and cryptids. We explore organic UFOs of the Bermuda triangle, telepathic connections used to contact UFOs around the world, the use of abstract symbols to focus the mind for manifestation and the strange case of Robert the haunted doll in this interview with George Noory.

body:
The Star Child investigation, as once led by the late Lloyd Pye, may finally be resolved as new information is brought forward by Chase Kloetzke and Kerry McClure. Lloyd Pye gave much of his life diligently pursuing the truth behind the Star Child skull, attempting to discover what it was and where it came from. Results of new tests are in and we finally have some answers as to its origin. The continuing efforts of investigators, have raised the bar for evidence required to meet the burden of proof. This means that hoaxes, false reports and public ridicule can no longer stand up to level of scrutiny being applied to such investigations. Learn more in this interview with George Noory.

Chase Kloetzke accepted the position of Deputy Director of Investigations and Special Case Manager, leading a team of high performance and highly skilled investigators to special assignments, in MUFON.

body:
Something massive is tugging on the planets of our solar system, and astrophysicists tell us, it is getting closer. Jason Martell deciphers clues left by ancient cultures which reveal that the sun is but one star in a binary system. As the ages pass, the precession of the equinox, considered the indicator of a coming golden age, may also foretell the return of our sun’s mysterious companion. Perhaps monuments on Mars reflect this ancient wisdom and prove that the seeds of life can be found throughout the cosmos. Learn more in this interview with George Noory.

teaser: Jason Martell deciphers clues left by ancient cultures which reveal that the sun is but one star in a binary system. As the ages pass, the precession of the equinox may foretell the return of our sun’s mysterious companion.

body: Andrew Collins explores the alignment of Göbekli Tepe, the oldest archeological site yet discovered, with the constellation of Cygnus, as a means of determining why this ancient megalithic site was built. When the first fragments of this sacred site were unearthed, questions were raised about who the builders were and when they lived. With every answer, new questions and controversies were raised. As we examine the stone spires, we see that they are aligned with the stars of Cygnus, opening the possibility of this site connecting Earth with celestial realms.
teaser: Andrew Collins explores the alignment of Göbekli Tepe with the constellation of Cygnus. As we examine the stone spires, we see that they may open a portal connecting Earth with celestial realms.

title: Evidence of Nuclear War on Mars with John Brandenburg
body: The research of John Brandenburg suggests that Mars was once teeming with life, cut short by the detonation of two massive nuclear weapons. As a nuclear scientist, he is keenly aware of the effects of nuclear explosions and has discovered such tell-tale signs on Mars. As the eons have passed and the radiation dispersed, the red planet is once again safe for habitation. He suggests that the greatest memorial we can erect for the lost Martian civilizations is to resurrect the biosphere and bring life back to Mars.
teaser: The research of John Brandenburg suggests that Mars was once teeming with life, cut short by the detonation of two massive nuclear weapons. As the eons have passed and the radiation dispersed, the red planet is once again safe for habitation.

title: The Life and Trials of Jordan Maxwell
body: Jordan Maxwell has studied the enigma of esoteric symbols and has caught the attention of some very powerful people because of his willingness to reveal the secrets behind these cyphers. Esoteric symbolism has been used by the power elite for centuries to convey secret information and to demonstrate clandestine affiliations between prominent organizations. His determination to reveal these secrets has led to life of trial and tribulation. Lean more in this interview with George Noory.
teaser: Jordan Maxwell has studied the enigma of esoteric symbols and has caught the attention of some very powerful people because of his willingness to reveal the secrets behind these cyphers. His determination to reveal these secrets has led to life of trial and tribulation.

title: Nephilim: The Ashes of Angels with Andrew Collins
body: Andrew Collins explores the possibility that the Nephilim and the Watchers from the Old Testament were celestial beings that became the progenitors of a dominating species of human. He suggests that the books of Genesis and Enoch tell of otherworldly beings comingling with primitive human-like creatures to form a race of giants that became the power elite of the ancient world.  With the discovery of the Denisovan hominin, an extinct species of human, comes the very real possibly that these fallen angels were indeed flesh and blood beings, genetically and politically influencing the course of human history. Learn more in this interview with George Noory.
teaser: Andrew Collins explores the possibility that the Nephilim and the Watchers from the Old Testament were celestial beings that became the progenitors of a dominating species of human. With the discovery of the Denisovan hominin comes the very real possibly that these were flesh and blood beings.

title: Inside Bilderberg with Daniel Estulin
body:
Once a year, the most powerful people on the planet gather, behind closed doors, to discuss the economic and political future of humanity. Daniel Estulin exposes the philosophy and motivations of an organization, which may be the biggest power behind the scenes, known as the Bilderberg Group. His research highlights the conflicts that arise within these clandestine conferences and how they affect vast swaths of the planet’s populace. He explains that this is not about conflicts between countries, rather various global projects that are competing for survival and dominance in a game where only the world’s elite are allowed to play in this interview with George Noory.

Daniel Estulin is a writer, investigative journalist, public speaker and film producer. He is the author of The True Story of the Bilderberg Group and producer of the documentary, Bilderberg, the Movie
teaser: Once a year, the most powerful people on the planet gather, behind closed doors, to discuss the economic and political future of humanity. They discuss various global projects that are competing for survival and dominance in a game where only the world’s elite are allowed to play.

title: Knights Templar Nation with Freddy Silva
body:
The Knights Templar quest was not for financial gain, but to uncover the greatest spiritual treasure of all time – the lost art of resurrection — which spurred them to their greatest and least known achievement. Freddy Silva presents his provocative research on how the original eleven Templars, two of whom were Portuguese, founded Europe’s first independent nation-state, Portugal, his native country. Supported by the Order of Sion and the Cistercian Order, the original Templars established a new paradise amid the ravages of Europe and a corrupt Church, disseminating 6000-year old esoteric teachings concerning the evolution of the soul. Learn more in this interview with George Noory.

Freddy Silva is one of the world’s leading experts of alternative history, sacred sites, ancient knowledge, sacred sites, and the interaction between temples and consciousness. He is best-selling author of, The Lost Art of Resurrection, First Templar Nation, The Divine Blueprint, and Secrets in the Fields. He is also an international keynote speaker.
teaser: The Knights Templar quest was not for financial gain, but to uncover the greatest spiritual treasure of all time – the lost art of resurrection — which spurred them to their greatest and least known achievement.

title: Ancient Tales of Death and Resurrection with Freddy Silva
body: Researching the lost art of resurrection, Freddy Silva has uncovered the spiritual truths buried in sacred texts concerning the true meaning of rebirth. Across the ancient world, temples and secret chambers were built where initiates endured great ordeals so they could experience living resurrection. And they returned to tell the tale. Over the eons, stories of these rites have been obscured and woven into the fabric of mainstream religion and occult practice, but what they profess is opposite to their real meaning. Truths that were once held only for the initiated few are now being brought forth for all to experience the spiritual evolution of the soul — while you are on Earth.  Learn more in this interview with George Noory.
teaser: Researching the lost art of resurrection, Freddy Silva has uncovered the spiritual truths buried in sacred texts concerning the true meaning of rebirth.  Truths that were once held only for the initiated few are now being brought forth for all to experience the spiritual evolution of the soul.

title: Bringing Mars to Life with Robert Zubrin
body:
What will it take to start a new space race which will bring humans to Mars? Many countries around the world are pushing to be the first to colonize our neighboring planet. But will it be a private company that beats any government organization? Robert Zubrin examines various concepts needed for a successful mission to Mars and highlights many of the problems with NASA’s plans. Despite the struggle to find our footing as we step out into space, he is confident that one day we will not just bring life to mars, but we will bring mars to life. 

Dr. Robert Zubrin is the founder and President of the Mars Society, as well as a member of the organization's Board of Directors. Formerly a Staff Engineer at Lockheed Martin Astronautics in Denver, he holds a Masters degree in Aeronautics and Astronautics and a Ph.D. in Nuclear Engineering from the University of Washington. He has authored over 100 published technical and non-technical papers in the field, as well as written several books.
teaser: What will it take to start a new space race which will bring humans to Mars? Despite the struggle to find our footing as we step out into space, Robert Zubrin is confident that one day we will not just bring life to mars, but we will bring mars to life.

title: The Great Pyramid: Power Plant of Giza with Christopher Dunn
body: Were power tools used to build the great pyramids? The great pyramid of Giza was built with the precision of a machine, and Christopher Dunn explains that it therefore must have the function of a machine. Combining his extensive background as a master craftsman in high-level aerospace manufacturing with his years of research on the Giza plateau, he brings forward new insights into the construction and function of the great pyramid. What comes to light is the nature of the tools used to carve and move stones, something that could only have been done with massive power tools. But where did the power come from?
teaser: Was the great pyramid of Giza built with the precision of a machine, using power tools? If so, where did the power come from?

title: Understanding Our Collective Will with Regina Meredith
body: Regina Meredith, host of Open Minds, brings forward an important message concerning our collective will. By examining the works of Zecharia Sitchin and Michael Cremo she shows us that the actual history of humanity is different from what we have been told. And now, as we enter a new era of human development, she relays an important message, which is just emerging, concerning our ability to manifest our collective will into reality.
teaser: Regina Meredith, host of Open Minds, brings forward an important message concerning the manifestation of our collective will.

title: Challenging Our Perceptions of Reality with Billy Carson
body: Across our planet and throughout the solar system new findings come forward which challenge the established beliefs of mainstream sciences. Billy Carson brings to light some of the strangest mysteries he has come across as he continuously works to expose these secrets. From the motivations of the ancient Annunaki to the cutting edge of quantum physics and anomalous astronomical discoveries, prepare to challenge your perceptions of our reality.
teaser: Across our planet and throughout the solar system new findings come forward which challenge the established beliefs of mainstream sciences. Billy Carson brings to light some of the strangest mysteries he has come across as he continuously works to expose these secrets.

title: Healing Through Past Life Regression with Georgina Cannon
body:
As we make our way through multiple lifetimes, we make unspoken contracts and decisions which are reflected in the current life. Some of this unresolved karma manifests as illness and interpersonal difficulties. Georgina Cannon explains that the soul can heal, through past life regression, by coming to an understanding the events of previous lifetimes and changing the choices made for this lifetime. 

Georgina is an award-winning, board-certified, master consulting hypnotist and founder of the Ontario Hypnosis Centre, which became Canada’s leading hypnosis training facility and clinic. With an eclectic background in journalism, the corporate world and counselling, Georgina is a powerful catalyst for change.
teaser: As we make our way through multiple lifetimes, we make unspoken contracts and decisions which are reflected in the current life. Georgina Cannon explains that the soul can heal, through regression, by coming to an understanding the events of previous lifetimes and changing the choices made for this lifetime.

title: Missing Persons and Portals with David Paulides
body:
As part of his continuing Missing 411 investigations, David Paulides relays recent findings on some of the most bizarre missing person cases that he has investigated; many of which have left more questions than answers. He has found that many areas in which people have mysteriously disappeared are prone to the spontaneous formation of portals. In addition, some insiders have revealed that technology exists which can direct these portals upon targeted individuals. 

Dave Paulides spent over twenty years in law enforcement and senior executive positions in the technology sector. He holds two degrees from the University of San Francisco and is the author of the Missing 411 books. This book series has been vetted by some of the best Search and Rescue professionals, investigative journalists, radio and television hosts and print journalists from North America.
teaser: As part of his continuing Missing 411 investigations, David Paulides relays recent findings on some of the most bizarre missing person cases that he has investigated. He has found that many areas in which people have mysteriously disappeared are prone to the spontaneous formation of portals.

title: Psychic Empowerment with Bruce Goldberg
body: Break out of the cycle of karma and maximize your potential in every area of your life with psychic empowerment. Bruce Goldberg explains how you can use hypnotically induced out-of-body experiences to clear past-life trauma and connect with higher self to make the best life possible.
teaser: Break out of the cycle of karma and maximize your potential in every area of your life with psychic empowerment.

title: Archeology of the Torah with Ken Hanson
body:
New discoveries are validating the history of the bible. Ken Hanson brings forward recent archeological findings which prove the authenticity of the Torah as an historical record. He guides us through discoveries such as inscriptions bearing the name of Isaiah, deciphering the Gematria code of 666 and new revelations from the Dead Sea Scrolls.

Dr. Ken Hanson, author, lecturer, is devoted to disseminating knowledge of the Biblical and classical world. He has dug on archaeological sites in the Middle East, lived in a politically volatile region of northern Galilee, and taught Hebrew on an Israeli agricultural settlement. He has also worked with a television news-gathering operation in a war zone in southern Lebanon, at the height of the civil war that left the jewel of the Mediterranean in ruins.
teaser: Ken Hanson brings forward recent archeological findings which prove the authenticity of the Torah as an historical record.

title: Portals and Cryptozoology with Jack Cary
body:
Is there evidence that bigfoot comes from another universe? After many years of investigating crypto-creatures and paranormal phenomena in North America, Jack Cary has accumulated mounds of evidence that may prove the existence of strange creatures. His research lends credence to the notion that interdimensional doorways intermittently open, permitting the unintentional transference of a person, or being, across parallel realities and time.

Jack Cary is the founder and current director at Paranormal Intelligence Agency and Researcher at Crypto Four Corners.
teaser: Jack Cary’s research lends credence to the notion that interdimensional doorways permit the transference of a person, or being, across parallel realities and time.

title: Tales from the Flipside with Richard Martini
body:
Life after death may be far more fantastical than you can believe. Richard Martini presents us with a new perspective of the afterlife, based on his documentation of countless Between Life sessions, including contact with the late Bill Paxton. We listen in on several of these sessions to glean the uncanny commonalities of the accounts, giving us a clearer picture of what awaits us on the flipside of life. 

After a dream vision of visiting his friend in the Great Beyond, author and award winning filmmaker Richard Martini went on a literary quest to discover the prevailing science and philosophical opinions on the afterlife. Eventually he was introduced to the work of author and hypnotherapist Dr. Michael Newton. FlipSide: A Tourist's Guide to the Afterlife is his debut non-fiction book on a topic that's been haunting him since the death of a soul mate.
teaser: Richard Martini presents us with a new perspective of the afterlife, based on his documentation of countless Between Life sessions.

title: From Hollywood Stuntman to Truth Seeker with Reuben Langdon
body: From Hollywood stuntman to truth seeker, Reuben Langdon shares his unique insight into the phenomenal nature of our reality. On the set of Avatar, his eyes opened to many of the unanswered mysteries in our world and set upon a mission to inform the public of the secrets being kept from them. This culminated in the Citizen Hearing on Disclosure in 2013 and continues through various projects. He shares what he has learned concerning channeling, shamanic ceremonies, our simulated reality, and more.
teaser: From Hollywood stuntman to truth seeker, Reuben Langdon shares his unique insight into the phenomenal nature of our reality. He shares what he has learned concerning channeling, shamanic ceremonies, our simulated reality, and more.

title: Physics of a Geometric Universe with Garrett Lisi
body: Gain a new perspective of our emergence from an infinitely complex universe and the way the infinitesimal interacts to create the physical reality we all know. Upon completing his studies in theoretical physics Garrett Lisi ventured upon a path divergent from his colleagues, leading him to a unique understanding of the geometric nature of our universe. With his explanation of the big bang and the enigma of gravity, your understanding of our universe may change.
teaser: Gain a new perspective of our emergence from an infinitely complex universe and the way the infinitesimal interacts to create the physical reality we all know. Garrett Lisi ventured upon a path divergent from his colleagues, leading him to a unique understanding of the geometric nature of our universe.

title: The Keys of Enoch with J.J. & Desiree Hurtak
body:
We are upon the edge of the greatest moment in human history as spiritual evolution rises to meet advancements in science and technology. Inspired by wisdom from interdimensional beings, Drs. J.J. and Desiree Hurtak explain how they discovered the Keys of Enoch to unlock new insights into the nature of humanity and the fate we face. Plus, they share some of their preliminary results of exploring the acoustic properties of ancient temples and their spiritual effects.

Dr. James J. Hurtak, Ph.D., Ph.D., M.A., M.Th., is author of twenty books, his best-seller is The Keys of Enoch.  He has two Ph.Ds, one from the University of California (1977), and one from the University of Minnesota(1993). Dr. Desiree Hurtak , Ph.D., MS.Sc., is an environmentalist and an author of several books including her most recent work, co-authored with her husband, entitled Overself Awakening.
teaser: Inspired by wisdom from interdimensional beings, Drs. J.J. and Desiree Hurtak explain how they discovered the Keys of Enoch to unlock new insights into the nature of humanity and the fate we face.

title: Psychedelics: Awakening the World with Ben Stewart
body:
Psychedelic substances may lay at the root of many religions and many have enabled higher degrees of cognitive capabilities in early human beings. Ben Stewart, producer of Psychedelica, discusses the historical and modern use of psychedelic substances which have been known to expand human consciousness.   What the future holds for us is still a mystery, but new uses for psychedelics may help to launch a new era of expanded human consciousness.

Ben Stewart is the creator of Esoteric Agenda, Kymatica, Ungrip and Waking Infinity - all available on Gaia.
teaser: Psychedelic substances may have enabled higher degrees of cognitive capabilities in early human beings. Ben Stewart discusses the historical and modern use of psychedelic substances which have been known to expand human consciousness.

title: Ancient Technology to Amplify Consciousness with David Sereda
body:
Were staffs held by ancient religious leaders antennae, amplifying the power of human consciousness and connecting them to the mind of god? David Sereda expounds upon his thesis that these staffs of legend, passed down across the ages, were more than a symbol of divine authority on Earth. The length and frequency of these tools, may hold the secret to unlock advanced technology, embedded in ancient temples by extraterrestrial beings.

David Sereda is a renowned author, spiritual genius, and free-thinking space and quantum scientist, who has worked with world class physicists and reaches millions of people through radio and TV shows.
teaser: Were staffs held by ancient religious leaders antennae, amplifying the power of human consciousness and connecting them to the mind of god?

title: The Failures of Chemtrails with Scott Stevens
body:
Beyond chemtrails and advances in climate engineering, evidence is mounting that the Earth stands upon the cusp of a massive environmental reset event. Scott Stevens discusses various solar and ecological circumstances that are currently transpiring and the outcomes we can expect. His research shows the impact geoengineering has on local weather, but these interventions fail to address the massive climate changes already underway. 

Scott Stevens is an award winning television weatherman who began investigating claims that North America was being subjected to full time weather modification. During the course of that personal investigation, he discovered the primary reason for the now global chemtrail phenomena. He is a principle with Blue Water Alchemy, a global project that seeks to bring about a shift of the human consciousness to be in concert with events surrounding the shift of the ages.
teaser: Evidence is mounting that the Earth stands upon the cusp of a massive environmental reset event. Scott Stevens discusses various geoengineering interventions fail to address the massive climate changes already underway.

title: Secret Testing Programs with Emery Smith
body:
After enlisting with the Air Force, Cosmic Disclosure’s insider, Emery Smith could have never known where his military career would take him and the things he would see. In this one-on-one discussion with George Noory, he shares his many strange experiences over the course of his time working for secret testing programs. Despite his coming forward with this secret information, the powers that be are most infuriated by his work with zero-point energy machines.

Emery Smith, the insider formerly known as “Paul”, comes forward to reveal his work inside secret biological facilities deep under the New Mexico desert. You may have seen him in the film Sirius, as he was dissecting the Atacama Humanoid body.
teaser: Cosmic Disclosure’s insider, Emery Smith shares many of his strange experiences from his time working for secret testing programs.

title: Antarctica: Land of Secrets with Michael Salla
body:
From biblical texts to remote viewing, Michael Salla takes a multidisciplinary approach to uncover some of the most startling secrets hidden in Antarctica. These secrets may have been known to Enoch, the Nazis, and held sacred by the power elites. As the ice melts, through volcanic activity and human intervention, the world will be watching as this mysterious land reveals the secrets it has held for so long.

Dr. Salla is an internationally recognized scholar in international politics, conflict resolution and US foreign policy, and is the author/editor of several books. Dr. Salla founded the Exopolitics Institute  and the Exopolitics Journal as well as co-organizing five international conferences on extraterrestrial life and Earth Transformation.
teaser: From biblical texts to remote viewing, Michael Salla takes a multidisciplinary approach to uncover some of the most startling secrets hidden in Antarctica. As the ice melts, the world will be watching as this mysterious land reveals the secrets it has held for so long.

title: Protecting the Grid with David Adair
body: What can we do to protect our electrical grid from potential disaster, and preserve our way of life? David Adair, the original rocket man, explains how we can work to protect our power infrastructure from solar flares, coronal mass ejections and electromagnetic impulses. As important as this topic is hardening the grid still faces staunch opposition from those who fail to see the importance.
teaser: What can we do to protect our electrical grid from potential disaster, and preserve our way of life? David Adair explains how we can work to protect our power infrastructure from solar flares, coronal mass ejections and electromagnetic impulses.

title: Paranormal Common Sense with John Desouza
body:
From terrorism to the paranormal, as an FBI special agent, John DeSouza investigated it all. Since retiring, he has continued his investigations and brings us four incredible cases which are considered to be genuine supernatural incidents, that have been officially buried. He urges us to do not defer to mainstream authorities for an explanation of these strange events, but to use our common sense which will lead us to the most obvious of solutions. 

John DeSouza was an FBI Special Agent who maintained a Top Secret security clearance for over 25 years as he investigated paranormal experiences. During that time, he collected what he calls, the real-life X-FILES.
teaser: From terrorism to the paranormal, as an FBI special agent, John DeSouza investigated it all. Now, he brings us four incredible cases which are considered to be genuine supernatural incidents, that have been officially buried.

title: Ancient Teachings of a Holographic Universe with Laird Scranton
body: Could it be that ancient civilizations knew more about the nature of our universe than historians have given them credit? Laird Scranton explores the intersection of Egyptian, Dogon, Kabbalah and Vedic teachings to uncover the secrets of space, time and our holographic universe. By examining the mythological representations of what we now understand through geometry and science, he is able to suss out the main message for humanity which has been hidden before us, this whole time.
teaser: Laird Scranton explores the intersection of Egyptian, Dogon, Kabbalah and Vedic teachings to uncover the secrets of space, time and our holographic universe. He is able to suss out the main message for humanity which has been hidden before us, this whole time.

title: Merging Spirit and Technology with Jonathan Zap
body: What if technology could produce out-of-body experiences on demand? Jonathan Zap defines a new frontier of the mind as advances in medical and media technology offer human consciousness a massive upgrade. Shamanic practices and spiritualism have progressed our ability to perceive the spiritual realms. Now, as an unprecedented number of people are surviving near death experiences and CGI enhances our perception, we stand upon the moment when the spiritual and technological merge, taking humanity to a new level of conscious evolution.
teaser: Jonathan Zap defines a new frontier of the mind as advances in technology offer human consciousness a massive upgrade. We stand upon the moment when the spiritual and technological merge, taking humanity to a new level of conscious evolution.

title: Geometry of Heaven, on Earth with Freddy Silva
body: Freddy Silva reveals the secrets to the construction and placement of tens of thousands of ancient temples across the face of the planet. Ages ago, after a world-wide cataclysm, an advanced civilization came forth to rebuild the former world of the gods. They built sacred temples, which encoded their knowledge of mathematics and the geometry of the heavens, to create places of power which could transform people’s lives.
teaser: Freddy Silva reveals the secrets of ancient temples, across the face of the planet. An advanced civilization came forth to build sacred temples, which encoded their knowledge of mathematics and the geometry of the heavens.

title: Special Investigations with Jaime Maussan
body:
Many of the most well-documented cases of UFOs and alien contact remain untouched by mainstream media. Jaime Maussan has dedicated his life to uncovering the truth as he investigates these cases to report on his findings. Such is with two prominent cases from Italy: The Amicizia Case and the films of Antonio Urzi. He has also examined many Crop Circles and shares the messages he has uncovered. Plus, he gives us an update on the anomalous bodies discovered near Nazca, Peru.

Since 1970 Jaime Maussan has been a reporter, correspondent and director with various newspapers and broadcasting outlets, including the Mexican television program "60 Minutos".
teaser: Many of the most well-documented cases of UFOs and alien contact remain untouched by mainstream media. Jaime Maussan has dedicated his life to uncovering the truth as he investigates these cases to report on his findings.

title: 20 Years of Healing after 20 Years of Service with Randy Cramer
body: Some are called to service with the Secret Space Program, others are born into it. This is the case with Randy Cramer, who claims to have been engineered for a military life on the moon and on Mars. After his return from 20 years of service, disturbing memories flooded his mind which he worked hard to reconcile. Knowing that there are many others who are enduring the same ordeal, it has become his mission to tell his story, to encourage them to come forward and reveal their experiences and heal.
teaser: After his return from 20 years of service with the Secret Space Program, Randy Cramer worked hard to heal from the flood of disturbing memories. He tells his story to encourage others to come forward to reveal their experience and begin healing.

title: A New 20 & Back Whistleblower
body: A new insider has come forward to reveal his experiences within the Secret Space Program. Jason Rice is a veteran of the 20 & Back program which has sent many unsuspecting “volunteers'' on a shocking tour of duty through the cosmos. Much of what he brings forward corroborates the testimonies of several other SSP whistleblowers. Is this mismanagement of the federal government a conspiracy or is there legitimacy to these whistleblower complaints? If so, what other unethical and illegal activities were involved in this classified program? Discover the truth for yourself.
teaser: Jason Rice is a veteran of the 20 & Back program which has sent many unsuspecting “volunteers” on a shocking tour of duty through the cosmos. Much of what he brings forward corroborates the testimonies of several other SSP whistleblowers.

title: 9/11 and the Hutchison Effect with Dr. Judy Wood
body: Is it possible that the metal in the towers of the World Trade Center turned to dust on 9/11? Dr. Judy Wood believes so and she persists in her mission to uncover the truth of what caused the towers to fall that fateful day. She brings forward measurable evidence which contradicts official explanations and various conspiracy theories of what happened. However, she suggests the use of secret technology, using the Hutchison Effect, which can turn metal to dust.
teaser: Is it possible that the metal in the towers of the World Trade Center turned to dust on 9/11? Dr. Judy Wood believes so and she persists in her mission to uncover the truth of what caused the towers to fall that fateful day.

title: Confirming the Existence of Cryptids with Loren Coleman
body: Bigfoot, Loch Ness Monster, and Moth-Man are the most notable cryptids, and there are other beasts of legends which are currently being confirmed to exist. Loren Coleman explains that this is the job of cryptozoologists – to find and prove the existence of creatures, assumed to exists, based only on anecdotal accounts. It is estimated that there are nearly nine-million species living on our planet, and new species are being discovered, every year.
teaser: Bigfoot, Loch Ness Monster, and Moth-Man are the most notable cryptids, and there are other beasts of legends which are currently being confirmed to exist. Loren Coleman explains that this is the job of cryptozoologists.

title: Forbidden Knowledge of Multidimensions with Jason Quitt
body:
From lucid dreaming to out of body experiences, you can cross the veil between dimensions and experience other realities. Jason Quitt has been doing this for years and he shares the forbidden knowledge he gained as a multi-dimensional time traveler. It does not take advanced technology or secret government programs. All it takes is a willingness to connect with your guides and allow your awareness to slip out of your body to experience the reality of other worlds.  

Jason Quitt, author of “Egyptian Postures of Power,” combines the methods and modalities of energy medicine, shamanism, and dowsing to assist those on their own personal paths of healing and enlightenment.
teaser: From lucid dreaming to out of body experiences, you can cross the veil between dimensions and experience other realities. Jason Quitt has been doing this for years and he shares the forbidden knowledge he gained as a multi-dimensional time traveler.

title: Guidance for Your Soul Contracts with Dr. Lauren Cielo
body: From soul mates to soul contracts, the subtle complexity of our lives may seem daunting, and it is good that we have spiritual guides to help us navigate these turbulent waters. Dr. Lauren Cielo helps people to connect with their highest guidance in order to understand why they agreed to certain soul contracts before incarnating in this life. This includes gaining clarity on the various roles people play, whether they are constant antagonists or life-long romantic partners.
teaser: Dr. Lauren Cielo helps people to understand why they agreed to certain soul contracts before incarnating in this life. This includes gaining clarity on the various roles people play, whether they are constant antagonists or life-long romantic partners.

title: Becoming Supernatural with Dr Joe Dispenza
body: What does it mean to become supernatural? Dr Joe Dispenza has traveled the world to study people who have spontaneously healed from major illnesses in order to find ways that all of us can use to make significant changes in our wellbeing. He has uncovered the connection between body and mind, whereby changes in your personality can create changes in your personal reality. He shares techniques that we can use to change our emotional states and perceptions, which reflect as positive changes in the body and states of wellbeing.
teaser: Dr Joe Dispenza studied people who have healed from major illnesses to find ways we can use to make changes in our wellbeing. He has uncovered the connection between body and mind, whereby changes in personality can create changes in personal reality.

title: Using the Emotion Code to Ease Suffering with Bradley Nelson
body: Your subconscious mind has the power to ease your suffering. Bradley Nelson, author of the Emotion Code, explains that you have the ability to tap into your own emotional code to discover how you can begin relieving yourself from the suffering of emotional baggage and achieve well-balanced states of health. He shares simple ways that you can connect with your subconscious mind, to reveal the imbalances that you may be enduring, and discover a pathway to begin bringing healing into your body.
teaser: Bradley Nelson, author of the Emotion Code, explains that you have the ability to tap into your own emotional code to discover how you can begin relieving yourself from the suffering of emotional baggage and achieve well-balanced states of health.

title: Shifting into Higher States of Being
body: Jim Self, a former advisor to President Carter, has his finger on the pulse of our ever-changing planetary and societal conditions. He explains that our world is undergoing dramatic shifts and we must be willing to adapt to those changes and ascend into higher states of being. He describes the changes that are taking place with the sun, which affect not only weather patterns on Earth, but the electro-chemical states of our bodies. All of this reflects in our spiritual wellbeing.
teaser: Jim Self explains that our world is undergoing dramatic shifts and we must be willing to adapt to those changes and ascend into higher states of being.

title: Portals to a Hollow Earth with Brooks Agnew
body:
What if, deep under the surface of our planet, we find a whole new world, complete with its own sun and thriving bio-sphere? This is the premise Brooks Agnew pursued as he seeks to put together an expedition to find a portal deep into the subterranean realm. He describes his theory of how this inner-earth world formed and how it continues to thrive. He also reveals what he believes to be the biggest threats to life on the surface of our planet, the extent of control by the deep state, the vulnerability of the grid and how we can raise our consciousness to be free of their domination. 

As a physicist, Dr. Brooks Agnew is probably one of the most experienced pioneers of ground probing radar technology in the world. He has a bachelor's degree in Chemistry, a master's degree in statistics, and a PhD in physics and has authored thousands of technical, scientific, papers, booklets and documentaries.
teaser: What if, deep under the surface of our planet, is a whole new world, complete with its own sun and thriving bio-sphere? This is the premise Brooks Agnew pursued as he seeks to put together an expedition to find a portal into the subterranean realm.

title: Classic Cases of UFO Contact with Frank Chille
body:
The move toward disclosure is accelerating, as scientists and physicists are finally being given access to the technology that is soon to be released to the world. As an ardent seeker of truth and knowledge, Frank Chille has compiled a vast repository of accounts from some of the world’s most credible UFO contactees and the widespread dispersion of these tales nudges us into states of wakefulness. He believes that despite the hype of dread, the reaction from various organizations, including the world’s religions, will help the world accept these revelations as a positive thing.

Frank Chille has been a self-proclaimed seeker of Arcane Knowledge. He has firsthand knowledge of contactee experiences & unpublished manuscripts. He knows individuals with unique talents and abilities doing advanced work on this planet to accelerate consciousness and awareness.
teaser: The move toward disclosure is accelerating. Frank Chille has compiled a vast repository of accounts from some of the world’s most credible UFO contactees and the widespread dispersion of these tales nudges us into states of wakefulness.

title: Extraterrestrial Messages in Music with Grant Cameron
body: After many years of investigating UFOs and extraterrestrial activity, a moment of inspiration told Grant Cameron to look for evidence of alien contact in the lyrics of popular music. After analyzing the works of musical legends such as Led Zeppelin, Neil Young and John Denver, he is convinced that these artists have tapped into a higher-consciousness field in which advanced beings transmit messages to be relayed to the whole of humanity, through their lyrics.
teaser: After many years of investigating UFOs and extraterrestrial activity, a moment of inspiration told Grant Cameron to look for evidence of alien contact in the lyrics of popular music.

title: Anomalous Structures on Mars with George Haas
body: George Haas highlights some of the most striking features and strange structures found on Mars, which hint to the existence of an ancient civilization that endured a planet-wide catastrophe. Some of these anomalous structures, including faces and pyramids, bear striking similarities to ancient geoglyphs near Mayan cities in Nazca, and other human-made constructions on Earth.
teaser: George Haas highlights some of the most striking features and strange structures found on Mars, which hint to the existence of an ancient civilization that endured a planet-wide catastrophe.

title: E.T.s in the Military Industrial Complex with Anthony Sanchez
body: Anthony Sanchez may be considered a controversial figure in the UFO community as he brings about revelations that the Military Industrial Complex has been working alongside extraterrestrial beings, for a very long time. When we look to the mysterious construction of vast underground complexes and the push to weaponize space, the advancements in technology that makes these things possible cannot come solely from terrestrial sources. He reveals what the future holds as we all come together, taking a strong interest in getting the message out to the public that humanity is not alone on this planet.
teaser: Anthony Sanchez reveals what the future holds as we all come together, taking a strong interest in getting the message out to the public that humanity is not alone on this planet. He brings about revelations that the MIL has been working alongside E.T.s.

title: Antigravity Propulsion with Paul LaViolette
body: Paul LaViolette reveals the secrets of antigravity propulsion which could get us to Mars in five days. A handful of cutting edge scientist have already produced results making use of the ether and the model of subquantum kinetics and they are struggling to bring forward the fruits of their labor. Some of this has already been revealed by the works of Thomas Townsend Brown, Project Winterhaven and the Philadelphia Experiment.
teaser: Paul LaViolette reveals the secrets of antigravity propulsion which could get us to Mars in five days. A handful of cutting edge scientist have already produced results and are struggling to bring forward the fruits of their labor.

title: Solving Climate Change with Free Energy with Tom Valone
body: Why is climate change such a forbidden subject in some government circles? Is the solution already available with free-energy technology? Tom Valone suggests that scientists are raising the red flag that something is wrong, but their message is largely ignored by the media. He proposes that a technological boom looms on the horizon, which can help humanity live in harmony with nature, once again. However, he explains that these advances in free energy technology are being suppressed by those who stand to gain from our current energy-based economy.
teaser: Is the solution to climate change already available with free-energy technology? Tom Valone proposes that a technological boom looms on the horizon, which can help humanity live in harmony with nature, once again.

title: The Worldwide Flood with Michael Jaye
body: What if the ancient tales of a worldwide flood were true? Since the late 1800’s, geologists hold firm that the geological records show no indication of a deluge affecting the entire planet. Michael Jaye brings forward the evidence he has collected, which he believes proves the differ. He states that the landscape of ancient Earth was vastly different from what it is today and was obliterated by a massive cosmic event which increased the world’s water by more than 90%.
teaser: What if the ancient tales of a worldwide flood were true? Michael Jaye brings forward evidence which suggests that the landscape of ancient Earth was vastly different from what it is today and was obliterated by a deluge affecting the entire planet.

title: Remote Viewing & Universal Consciousness with Lyn Buchanan
body: Lyn Buchanan was there in the earliest days of Remote Viewing and is still leading the way into the future development of this psychic-like practice. He explains how different types of Remote Viewing work, and how they make use of our 6th and 7th senses. This is the secret to unlocking communication between our subconscious and conscious minds as we reach out to connect with the universal collective consciousness.
teaser: Lyn Buchanan was there in the earliest days of Remote Viewing and is still leading the way into the future development of this psychic-like practice. This is a means to unlocking communication with the universal collective consciousness.

title: Surfacing Subconscious Encounters with Barbara Lamb
body: Do you have memories of an encounter with extraterrestrial beings hidden deep within your subconscious? As a regression therapist, Barbara Lamb has helped over 2,000 people recover memories, locked away from their conscious awareness by beings from other worlds. She shares what she has discovered through these hypnotherapy regression sessions that includes healing illness and injuries, agreements made in past and between lives, what makes Earth unique and why humans are so interesting. What she reveals may change your assumptions of why they here.
teaser: Do you have memories of an encounter with extraterrestrial beings hidden deep within your subconscious? Barbara Lamb has helped over 2,000 people recover memories, locked away from their conscious awareness by beings from other worlds.

title: How to Read the Akashic Records with Bill Foss
body: Accessing your Akashic Records empowers you to heal and clear blockages, create ideal relationships and gain divine guidance throughout your life. Bill Foss discusses the many benefits of learning how to read your own great book of life. His insights give us deeper clarity of how we are all interlinked, Earth’s etheric connection, who the keepers of the records are and the many benefits you gain as you access the deepest details of this divine archive.
teaser: Accessing your Akashic Records empowers you to heal and clear blockages, create ideal relationships and gain divine guidance throughout your life. Bill Foss discusses the many benefits of learning how to read your own great book of life.

title: Teachings of Edgar Cayce with Kevin Todeschi
body:
Edgar Cayce, known as the American Prophet, was perhaps the most prolific psychic in the history of humanity, producing a vast library of prophecies and readings. Kevin Todeschi has studied the life and practices of this sleeping prophet and shares details of Cayce’s life and techniques for tapping into a higher source of consciousness. Topics that Cayce spoke on included the Akashic records, karmic memory, miraculous healings, predictions for our future, Atlantis and what transpires upon the moment of death. 

Kevin Todeschi has been a student and teacher of the Cayce material for 35 years, lecturing on five continents, in front of thousands of individuals. He is executive director and CEO of Edgar Cayce’s A.R.E and Atlantic University, responsible for managing the day-to-day operations of the Edgar Cayce organizations.
teaser: Kevin Todeschi has studied the life and practices of this sleeping prophet and shares details of Edgar Cayce’s life and techniques for tapping into a higher source of consciousness.

title: Coincidence in Our Perfect Universe with John Martineau
body:
Sacred geometry and intricate mathematical formulas can explain how our universe is ideally suited for life, but our consciousness may be the factor to explain why. John Martineau, author of A Little Book of Coincidence in the Solar System, explains that the cosmos is perfectly finely tuned to create and sustain life, and it is in expression of this precision where we find the greatest beauty. He explains that our power to observe these ideal conditions may be the key to sustaining life in the universe.

John Martineau, author of, A Little Book of Coincidence in the Solar System, is editor and publisher of the Wooden Books international liberal arts series. He is working to develop a new theory of the local anthropic principle.
teaser: Sacred geometry and mathematics can explain how our universe is ideally suited for life. John Martineau explains that the cosmos is perfect to create life and that our power to observe these ideal conditions is key to sustaining that life.

title: Trilateral Commission and Technocracy with Patrick Wood
body: In 1973, the Trilateral Commission was founded with the goal of creating a new international economic order. Patrick Wood argues that their secret endeavor is to own and control all of the major resources of the world. He explains that their collusion enabled a technocracy to form as a major economic system, managed by scientists and engineers, to become a new world order, of sorts. This includes intricate web of controls that have been put in place through the digital domain, on every financial institution from banks to commercial sales. He cautions us that the technocracy has gained so much power that the only thing that may be able stop them is we the people.
teaser: Patrick Wood, author of Technocracy Rising, explains how the Trilateral Commission was founded in 1973, with the goal of creating a new international economic order. Understand how the digital domain is controlled and how we can check that power.

title: Communicating with Spirits & Guides with James Van Praagh
body:
James Van Praagh takes us on a journey through his life as he learned to tap into and hone his natural abilities to communicate with the spirits of departed loved ones. Now he is engaged in sharing his gift with the world. He explains that as consciousness on our planet is changing and many people are ready to learn how to make contact themselves. He shares with us what the spirit world is like and what people experience as they transition to the other side. We also learn a technique for discovering the guides in our life and how we can begin regular communication with them. 

The New York Times bestselling author of Unfinished Business, Ghosts Among Us and Talking to Heaven, James Van Praagh is considered a pioneer in the mediumship movement and the voice of the spirit world for more than twenty-five years. He is also the co-executive producer of the hit CBS primetime series Ghost Whisperer, starring Jennifer Love Hewitt.
teaser: James Van Praagh offers a simple technique for discovering and communicating with our guides.

title: Possibilities of the Afterlife with Roberta Grimes
body: Roberta Grimes shares common accounts from people who have conveyed what they experienced as they transitioned from life into the afterlife. What she hopes we understand is that death is nothing to fear. It is simply the shift of consciousness which was tuned to life in the body at a slightly higher vibration in the world of the hereafter. The experiences she conveys shed light on the spiritual growth of a stressful life, preplanned exit points, the hall of records, and seven levels of the afterlife.
teaser: Explore the world hereafter, the hall of records, and the seven levels of the afterlife as Roberta Grimes shares accounts of common experiences.

title: Changing the Culture of Dying with Jessica Zitter
body: Many doctors are trained to do everything in their power to save the lives of their patients. But what if this is doing more harm than good? Dr. Jessica Zitter offers us a new way to rethink end of life care that looks beyond physical suffering to include healing emotions and spirit. By offering four things we can do to prepare for dying, she is helping to change the culture of palliative care through patient-focused outcomes. This means that a good death is the definition of success, rather than artificially prolonging one’s final moments.
teaser: Rethink end of life care with Dr. Jessica Zitter who offers four ways to shift the culture of palliative care.

title: Our Place in a Spiritual Universe with Eben Alexander
body: A near-death experience changed Eben Alexander's perspective on the nature of life and consciousness. Now, he shares his understanding of living in a mindful universe with those ready to hear his message.  He explains that the overwhelming evidence from multiple scientific disciplines is overturning the old materialistic models concerning the origin of consciousness. What they are finding is that we are spiritual beings, living in a spiritual universe, and that our interaction with this primordial mind is the determinate for our experience of reality.
teaser: A near-death experience showed Dr. Eben Alexander a new way to understand reality beyond the old materialistic models. He shares how our interaction with the primordial mind can determine our reality.

title: American Psychic with Marla Frees
body:
We are all looking for our connection with Source, and that can come from the psychic connections we hold with each other.  Marla Frees explains how her life changed once she accepted her own extrasensory abilities and with the help of James Van Praagh and other teachers, became a prominent American psychic. Now she works with luminaries, like Tom Campbell, to help science-minded individuals discover and develop their own innate psychic abilities and realize that they are part of larger consciousness systems.

Throughout her life, Marla Frees has learned to trust the voice of Spirit, which never fails her. Her stories of spiritual transformation take us into realms that will astonish and inspire.Some of the extraordinary experiences and appear in her books, “American Psychic: A Spiritual Journey from the Heartland to Hollywood, Heaven, and Beyond”, “How do the deceased contact us and why?” and “What are we tapping into when we have an intuitive or psychic experience?”
teaser: Discover the innate psychic abilities that connect us all. Marla Frees share how her life changed when she accepted her abilities and began to develop them with the help of James Van Praagh.

title: An Expanded Phantasmagoria of the Paranormal with Joshua Warren
body: All across our world, certain locations have an especially large number of paranormal encounters. Joshua Warren has been mapping these locales with specialized equipment that can detect and confirm the presence spacetime anomalies. His exploration of the relationship between matter and energy goes beyond ghost hunting and into the realms of manifestation and E.T.s. This includes the flight capabilities of UFOs, missing time, para-cymatics, the wishing machine, and an update on Robert the Haunted Doll.
teaser: Explore the paranormal with researcher Joshua Warren as he expands on his work in mapping spacetime anomalies to find the relationships among ghosts, E.T.s, UFO flight, missing time, wishing machines, and more.

title: Are You an Empath? with Lee Harris
body: Could you be an empath? Are you one of these leaders of consciousness and emotions that the world needs, today? In other programs on Gaia, we have met Lee Harris as a channeler, offering guidance from the Zs. Now we meet the intuitive and empath who teaches people how to harness the energetics of emotion and integrate spirituality into their own daily life. He explains that empaths are people with a high level of feeling and sensitive connection others and their mission in life to help alleviate suffering and raise the vibration of the planet.
teaser: Harness the energy of emotion to connect with others, alleviate suffering, and raise the vibration of the planet. Lee Harris shares his own experience in how empaths can become conscious leaders.

title: The Lost Science of Ancient Peru with Brad Olsen
body:
In Peru, we find the highest concentration of megalithic sites in the world, but no one knows who built them and why. Brad Olsen has examined some of the most popular ancient sites in Peru to explain that these monuments and temples were built using a form of technology that we do not yet understand, by a civilization long forgotten. From Machu Picchu to Saksaywaman, we follow along ancient Inca trails connecting the temples, to try to uncover the lost science of ancient Peru. 

Brad Olsen’s passion for writing goes far beyond his book publishing business or the online content he produces. His books have reached a wide audience across the country and have won numerous awards. Wearing his publisher’s hat, he makes the stated goal of only releasing only the kinds of books he would value owning himself, which incorporates thought-provoking and critical content, and with a wide appeal to readers. His book publishing business CCC Publishing is distributed by Independent Publishers Group.
teaser: Explore the lost technology of a forgotten civilization who built the highest concentration of megalithic sites in the ancient world. Brad Olsen shares his findings from Machu Picchu to Saksaywaman in Peru.

title: Reversing the Policy of Suppression with Nick Pope
body:
Gain an insight to the motivation underling the concealment of alien activity on Earth, from a government insider once charged with investigating UFOs. Nick Pope discusses various government programs, including AATIP and Project Blue Book, which seem to be tasked with keeping UFO-eyewitness tight lipped about what they experienced. He brings an alarming new perspective on what is motivating the world’s governments to keep this information hidden and the various attempts, through media and calls for congressional hearings, to reverse this policy of suppression.  

Nick Pope worked for the British Government for 21 years and spent three years running the Ministry of Defence's UFO project. While undertaking official research and investigation into UFOs, he also looked into alien abductions, crop circles, and reports of ghosts on military bases, as well as evaluating claims from psychics who volunteered their services as 'remote viewers' for the UK's intelligence agencies. He is now recognized as one of the world's leading authorities on UFOs, the unexplained, conspiracy theories and fringe science.
teaser: Join insider Nick Pope as he discusses Project Blue Book and AATIP which seem to be keeping UFO-eyewitnesses quiet. He shares new insights and perspectives about the government’s motivations.

title: Unraveling the Web of Disclosure with Stephen Bassett
body: What is keeping official acknowledgement of disclosure from the world? An intricate chess game is being played out, right before our eyes, using politicians and celebrities, like Tom Delonge, as the playing pieces. Stephen Bassettunravels a complex web of deceit that has been woven to conceal the most important issue currently facing our planet: the extraterrestrial presence on Earth. He shares with us a play-by-play analysis of the complicated game of disclosure already underway as certain historical events pass us by, barely recognized by the public, at large.
teaser: Peel back the complex layers of deceit that are preventing official disclosure. Stephen Basset shares a play-by-play analysis of the chess piece politicians and celebrities, like Tom Delonge, who are involved.

title: Debunking UFOlogy with Glenn Steckling
body: George Adamski was chosen by extraterrestrial beings, in the 1940s, to bring an important message to humanity. Through his life, Glenn Steckling followed and documented many of the alien encounters and messages that George Adamski was chosen to convey. His efforts are slowly unraveling an ever-tightening web of deceit that has been woven by government agencies tasked with concealing the alien presence on Earth. During this discussion, they examine aerial phenomena, bases on the moon, debunking of UFOlogy, reincarnation on other planets, and the plethora of life throughout our solar system.
teaser: Discover the effort to unravel the ever-tightening web of deceit that has been woven by government agencies tasked with concealing the alien presence on Earth. Glenn Steckling reveals many of the alien encounters and messages that George Adamski was chosen to convey.

title: Opening the Doors of Mystery Schools with Theresa Bullard
body: Theresa Bullard, host of Mystery Teachings, introduces us to the wisdom of mystery schools and conveys the importance of their ancient teachings to bring a much-needed wisdom in these times of drastic changes.  Throughout the ages, great mystery schools taught intrepid seekers the secrets of ascension, spiritual alchemy, and expansion of consciousness. All the while, their teachings remained hidden from the masses with their mysteries secreted away behind closed doors and encoded within layers of mythology.  Today, as technology is advancing quickly, and many people are born with psychic abilities, this training is becoming all the more important for the whole of humanity.
teaser: Theresa Bullard introduces us to the wisdom of mystery schools and conveys the importance of their ancient teachings in these times of drastic changes.

title: Life 2.0 with John St. Augustine
body: Life is setup to challenge us. To coax us into becoming the absolute best that we can be. This may not be easy, but it can be amazing! These are just some of the lessons that John St. Augustine learned through, what he calls, his near life experiences. We explore topics near and dear to him including, Life 2.0, Earth Matters, non-linear learning, and many of the amazing encounters he has experienced. He explains that our job is to wake up and stay as awake as possible, and we must understand that the most difficult times of our lives are what makes us who we really are.
teaser: Life is setup to challenge us. To coax us into becoming the absolute best that we can be. This may not be easy, but it can be amazing! These are just some of the lessons that John St. Augustine learned through, what he calls, his near life experiences.

title: How Soon Is Now? with Daniel Pinchbeck
body:
Daniel Pinchbeck explores the dramatic changes our planet is currently facing and offers solutions that may not be easy to implement, but he cautions us that they are necessary. Looking to the wisdom of indigenous practices and prophecies, we may find the guidance we need to bring the economic and social changes to the world. Ultimately, he calls for a mass global movement, that is nonviolent, to take us from the path of extinction to create a regenerative system on a planetary scale. 

Daniel Pinchbeck is the author of Breaking Open the Head, The Return of Quetzalcoatl, and Notes from the Edge Times. He is also the founder of the think tank, Center for Planetary Culture, which produced the Regenerative Society Wiki.
teaser: Daniel Pinchbeck explores the dramatic changes our planet is currently facing and offers solutions that may not be easy to implement, but necessary. He calls for a mass global movement to create a regenerative system on a planetary scale.

title: Nazca Mummies: Breaking Scientific Norms with Konstantin Korotkov
body: Konstantin Korotokov says that we may be facing the greatest scientific discovery of our time. Yet, it is being rejected because the data collected is too far outside of accepted scientific norms. Dr. Korotkov is one of the leading researchers exploring the mysteries of the anomalous bodies discovered in the desert near Nazca Peru. He shares with us results from his examinations of the mummies, and the evidence collected by scientists all over the world, which corroborates his findings. One of the most startling revelations is the determination of how Maria, the large body, died.
teaser: Konstantin Korotokov says that we may be facing the greatest scientific discovery of our time. He is one of the leading researchers exploring the mysteries of the anomalous bodies discovered in the desert near Nazca Peru.

title: The Esoteric Napoleon with Walter Bosley
body: What secrets did Napoleon Bonaparte discover in his exploration of sacred places during his conquests? Walter Bosley has dug into the esoteric history of the emperor of France to discover why he was so interested in the lost history of ancient Earth. Napoleon’s exploits took him all over the world, including the Great Pyramids and the Hypogeum in Malta. What he was searching for, and what he discovered may have intentionally been left out of the history books. But a deeper exploration into his life, including his clandestine residence in America, may reveal the secrets that have been kept from the public.
teaser: What secrets did Napoleon Bonaparte discover in his exploration of sacred places during his conquests? Walter Bosley has dug into the esoteric history of the emperor of France to discover why he was so interested in the lost history of ancient Earth.

title: Intuition and Psychic Abilities with Jeffrey Mishlove
body: From gut feeling to voices in the head, we are all naturally prone to intuition. Unfortunately, it is often written off as mental illness, and in some cases, it is. As Jeffrey Mishlove, who has a Ph.D. in parapsychology has learned, each one of us has innate intuitive abilities. What manifests from them is all a matter of what we learn to do with them. He shares deeper insights in the beneficial uses of intuition ranging from Remote Viewing to psychic abilities and contact with spiritual forces.
teaser: Jeffrey Mishlove shares deep insights in the beneficial uses of intuition ranging from Remote Viewing to psychic abilities and contact with spiritual forces.

title: American Esoterica with Mitch Horowitz
body:
A golden thread connects the wisdom of ancient mystery schools through American culture and politics. Occult historian Mitch Horowitz divulges the esoteric principles from secret societies like Freemasonry, Rosicrucianism, and Hermetics, that have guided America to become the nation it is today. He explains how these teachings directed the course of social and political influence. And we discover how they led to the development of seances and the Ouija board. Throughout it all, presidents, corporate leaders, and celebrities sought the wisdom of psychics and mystics to guide their careers and the course of America’s destiny. 

A widely known voice of esoteric ideas, Mitch Horowitz is a writer-in-residence at the New York Public Library, lecturer-in-residence at the Philosophical Research Society in Los Angeles, and the PEN Award-winning author of books including Occult America; One Simple Idea: How Positive Thinking Reshaped Modern Life; and The Miracle Club: How Thoughts Become Reality.
teaser: A golden thread connects the wisdom of ancient mystery schools through American culture and politics. Occult historian, Mitch Horowitz divulges the esoteric principles which have guided America to become the nation it is today.

title: The Science of Precognition with Julia Mossbridge
body: Precognition is real! Julia Mossbrige Ph.D., a futurist trained in cognitive neurophyisics, has dedicated her career to studying the reality of premonitions, precognition, and prophecy. Armed with decades of evidence, she is bridging the gap in understanding the connection between psychic abilities and quantum science. What we learn is that precognition is not only normal, but a human ability that we all can learn to hone. This gives us an optimistic view of the future where we have all developed advanced conscious abilities, created a Precog-Economy, and discovered the secrets of time travel.
teaser: Julia Mossbrige Ph.D., a futurist trained in cognitive neurophyisics, has dedicated her career to studying the reality of premonitions, precognition, and prophecy.

title: The Energetics of Wellbeing with Randy Veitenheimer
body: Life force may be at the root of illness and disease. Randy Veitenheimer, host of Quantum Effect, discusses the energetic nature of the human body, our consciousness, and how this energy affects our wellbeing, life and death. He fully acknowledges that our modern understanding of physics cannot properly explain how all of this works. So, he is working on developing a new scientific understanding of subtle energy, the duality of reality, and life force so that we can better understand the energetic nature of human wellbeing.
teaser: Randy Veitenheimer, host of Quantum Effect, discusses the energetic nature of the human body, our consciousness, and how this energy affects our wellbeing, life and death.

title: The Missing $21 Trillion with Catherine Fitts
body:
$21 trillion dollars is missing from the U.S. federal government! Is this how the secret space program is being funded by Congress? This is the surprising discovery that Catherine Austin Fitts made while working deep within the financial sector. She shares how she made this finding and the national security laws that protect lawmakers from funneling taxpayer money into secret projects.
Catherine Austin Fitts is the president of Solari Inc. and publishes the Solari Report. Her extensive experience with Wall Street and the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) enables her to offer a unique perspective on the opportunities and risks in the global financial system and political economy.
teaser: $21 trillion dollars is missing from the U.S. Government! Is this how the secret space program is being funded? This is the surprising discovery that Catherine Austin Fitts made while working deep within the financial sectors.

title: Stone Circles of the Giants with Hugh Newman
body: What is the connection between giants and ancient stone circles? These megalithic sites have intrigued and confounded researchers, historians, and seekers alike. Hugh Newman has made it his quest to uncover the deepest secrets of who built these sites and how they were used. To his surprise, he discovered that many of these locations hold the remains of giant humanoid bodies and tools far too large for a normal human to wield.
teaser: What is the connection between giants and ancient stone circles? Hugh Newman has made it his quest to uncover the deepest secrets of who built these sites and how they were used. He discovered that many of these locations hold the remains of giants.

title: The Suppression of Ascension with William Henry
body:
Watch William Henry's New Sereis, on Gaia - Ascension Keepers:
http://www.gaia.com/video/lost-history-essenes

What is so dangerous about the Dead Sea Scrolls that they were hidden away from the public for nearly four decades? Throughout the ages, there have been spiritual orders tasked with passing on the secrets of ascension. William Henry delves into what he will be discussing in his new series on Gaia, Ascension Keepers. He introduces us to the history, philosophy, and spiritual practices of the Essenes, Gnostics, and Cathars. As we explore their teachings it becomes apparent why the ruling powers fought so hard to suppress these groups and why they hid the Dead Sea Scrolls for so long.
teaser: Throughout the ages, there have been spiritual orders tasked with passing on the secrets of ascension. William Henry introduces us to the history, philosophy, and spiritual practices of the Essenes, Gnostics, and Cathars.

title: Mayans, Dogons & E.T.s
body: Ancient civilizations were guided by the hand of advanced beings who may not have been of our Earth.  This is the finding of Jason Martell, who has studied the lore and beliefs of many ancient peoples. He found a commonality among the Mayans, Dogons, and many others who tell of visitors from another land guiding the course of their society. As we come to terms with these findings, we may be ready to once again learn from these otherworldly visitors and take our place as an advanced civilization among the stars.
teaser: Ancient civilizations were guided by advanced beings who may not have been of our Earth. This is the finding of Jason Martell, who has studied the beliefs of ancient peoples, who tell of visitors from another land guiding the course of their society.

title: Séances and Magic with Patti Negri
body: What if imaginary friends are not imaginary at all, but spiritual beings that we can communicate and work with? Patti Negri is a psychic medium that helps people contact the spirits of the dead and gain a clearer picture of their lives, with magic for the modern world. She explains how she developed her magical abilities to overcome a debilitating illness, what it means to be psychic, and how you can have the power to magically change your life. Plus, we see what happens when someone bursts into flames during a séance!
teaser: What if imaginary friends are not imaginary at all, but spiritual beings that we can communicate and work with? Patti Negri helps people contact the spirits of the dead and gain a clearer picture of their lives, with magic for the modern world.

title: Enlightened Magick with Jason Louv
body: Magick and ritual is not what we see in Hollywood. It is about creating the space to shift consciousness into higher states and shape reality in accordance with Will. Jason Louv helps us to gain a deeper understanding of what magick really is. From meditation to the works of John Dee and Aleister Crowley, he explains that magic helps us reach enlightenment states where we can begin to understand what reality is really about. He shares ways that you can begin your own journey of exploring magick and how to find yourself within the pattern of the universe.
teaser: Magick and ritual is not what we see in Hollywood.  Jason Louv shares ways that you can begin your own journey of exploring magick and how to find yourself within the pattern of the universe.

title: Disclosure Goes Mainstream with Richard Dolan
body: Disclosure is finally being accepted and reported by mainstream media. Richard Dolan takes us back to 2017 when things started to change as UFOs received credible coverage in major news outlets detailing a seismic shift in the mainstream portrayal of unexplained aerial phenomena. We examine footage released by the Navy, with the help of To the Stars Academy, as well as the original alien autopsy coverage. What we are starting to see is the official disclosure of the facts proving that we are not alone.
teaser: Richard Dolan takes us back to 2017 when things started to change as UFOs received credible coverage in major news outlets detailing a seismic shift in the mainstream portrayal of unexplained aerial phenomena.

title: Documenting Disclosure with Grant Cameron
body: U.S. and Canadian governments know that UFOs are real, and they are insidiously keeping this information from us. But, Grant Cameron is persistently pursuing the documentation that officially confirms the existence of these unexplainable aerial phenomena. He shares, with us, what he has learned from the personal files of some prominent people such as Edgar Mitchell and Stanton Friedman. He describes the process of researching material that could lead to full disclosure. He explains that it is like and intricate chess game, where opponents are trying to out maneuver each other.
