teaser: U.S. and Canadian governments know that UFOs are real, and they are keeping this information from us. But, Grant Cameron is persistently pursuing the documentation that officially confirms the existence of these unexplainable aerial phenomena.

title: The Art of Witch with Fiona Horne
body: The Art of witchcraft is alive and well in modern times and is gaining mainstream acceptance. At the vanguard of this shift is Fiona Horne who helps to dispel many misconceptions of what it means to be a witch. She shares her story of learning magic as a perpetual act of transformation and personal evolution. She reveals the secret to making spells work, every time, and how we can improve our lives by connecting with nature and being of service to each other.
teaser: The Art of witchcraft is alive and well in modern times and is gaining mainstream acceptance. At the vanguard of this shift is Fiona Horne who helps to dispel many misconceptions of what it means to be a witch.

title: Evolution in a Virtual Reality with Tom Campbell
body: We are conscious beings inhabiting physical bodies as avatar-players in a virtual reality. As such, Tom Campbell explains, that our goal in this big game is to pursue conscious evolution. At the core of this information-based universe, we find the Akashic Records as the main database running a code that looks very similar to computer code. This is all part of his big theory of everything which creates an overarching system to explain the connection between science, physics, consciousness and spirituality.
teaser: We are conscious beings inhabiting physical bodies as avatar-players in a virtual reality. As such, Tom Campbell explains, that our goal in this big game is to pursue conscious evolution.

title: Thoth and the Annunaki with Billy Carson
body: The Annunaki may have been instrumental in restarting an ancient civilization after the great flood. But there was one individual responsible for the continued evolution of humanity. Thoth was a great teacher whose teachings spanned the course of tens of thousands of years as he inhabited different bodies with different names. Best-selling author Billy Carson (Compendium Of The Emerald Tablets), who founded 4biddenknowledge TV, reveals the secrets of his teachings from the Emerald Tablets and explains how his work protects us from the machinations of the Dark Brotherhood, the influence of the Yuga cycles, and the mission we have all been tasked with.
teaser: The Annunaki may have been instrumental in restarting civilization after the great flood. But there was one individual responsible for the continued evolution of humanity: Thoth. Billy Carson reveals the secrets of his teachings from the Emerald Tablets.

title: Living Beyond Near Death with Anita Moorjani
body: Tapping into and living your purpose can make you feel big & energetic in a way that will become reflected in your body. It took a near death experience for Anita Moorjani to learn how to love her life and passionately pursue her soul’s purpose. Now she shares how you can improve your health and happiness without having an NDE. She explains that our souls come here with a calling. We tend to suppress that and ignore who we really are.
teaser: Tapping into and living your purpose can make you feel big & energetic in a way that will become reflected in your body. It took a near death experience for Anita Moorjani to learn how to love her life and passionately pursue her soul’s purpose.

title: Clearing Karmic Debt with Bruce Goldberg
body: You may have had more than 1,000 past lives, building up karmic debt with each one, and making it difficult to move on to a higher plane of existence. After decades of hypnosis and past life regression with his clients, Bruce Goldberg may have found the answer to connecting with your higher being and clearing out this karma. He tells us that this type of work is essential, as the world is in desperate need of metaphysical experts and practitioners to help others live a life full of psychic empowerment.
teaser: After decades of hypnosis and past life regression with his clients, Bruce Goldberg may have found the answer to connecting with your higher being and clearing out this karma.

title: UFO False Flags with John DeSouza
body: Reports of Navy pilots encountering unidentified areal phenomena have made the news and more videos are coming. We all have heard the cover stories, but what is really going on? John DeSouza, a former FBI agent that was tasked with investigating paranormal cases, gives his take on the truth underlying these encounters. Are these videos all a part of the deep state controlling the narrative on UFOlogy to push the fake alien invasion agenda?
teaser: Videos of unidentified areal phenomena have made the news and more videos are coming. We all have heard the cover stories, but what is really going on? John DeSouza gives his take on the truth underlying these encounters.

title: Geometry of Universal Connectedness with Adam Apollo
body: The fundamental field that is taught in all mystery schools was cut out of modern physics. This field follows the same geometric principles that enabled ancient peoples to engage with magic and is the same geometry that creates the fundamental forces of our universe. As a teenager, Adam Apollo had a cosmic epiphany and saw the universal connectedness of everything. So, he took a deep dive studying physics to discover the keys to understanding this connection. What he found is geometry of the field that connects everything.
teaser: The same geometric principles that enabled ancient peoples to engage with magic and is the same geometry that creates the fundamental forces of our universe. Adam Apollo discusses the geometry of the field that connects everything.

title: Reawakening the Norse with Sonja Grace
body: The old gods are alive and coming back into the world. Sonja Grace is an accomplished spiritual healer and astral traveler. Now she explores aspects of Norse mythology that she embedded in a divination card set that she created. For us to better understand how this works, she explains how she connected with the Norse gods, the message they gave to her, and how she is working with them to help the people.
teaser: The old gods are alive and coming back into the world. Sonja Grace explores aspects of Norse mythology that she embedded in a divination card set that she created.

title: Geoengineering Morgellons Disease with Clifford Carnicom
body:
Everyone has heard of chemtrails and global climate change, but the geo-engineering agenda goes even deeper than we could have imagined. Clifford Carnicom reveals seven major geoengineering programs that affect everything on Earth from weather to the electromagnetic state of our planet. A consequence of this global tinkering may be the rise of an illness that authorities continue to dismiss as mass delusion: Morgellons Disease. However, as the number of cases rise, the calls to acknowledge the suffering and the root cause grow louder.

Clifford Carnicom, founder of the Carnicom institute, was a research scientist and federal employee for 15 years with three agencies, including the United States Department of Defense, the Bureau of Land Management and the U.S. Forest Service.
teaser: Clifford Carnicom reveals seven major geoengineering programs that affect everything on Earth from weather to the electromagnetic state of our planet. A consequence of this global tinkering may be the rise of Morgellons Disease.

title: Fundamentals of Astrology with Heather Arielle
body: Heather Arielle’s many years studying Astrology has culminated in a new oracle card deck she calls, the Fundamentals of Astrology. As we explore these fundamentals, we gain insights into many aspects of astrology, including the influence of houses, planets, rising signs, and what to keep in mind during retrograde times. More than just the fundamentals, she walks us through a reading where we explore George Noory’s natal chart.
teaser: Heather Arielle’s many years studying Astrology has culminated in a new oracle card deck she calls, the Fundamentals of Astrology. As we explore these fundamentals, we gain insights into many aspects of astrology.

title: Paranormal Planet with Jack Cary
body: We live on a paranormal planet full of anomalous activity and Jack Cary may have uncovered the secret as to why. He refers to this as a unified field theory of paranormal activity and it is based upon the laws of the universe in harmonic resonance, as expressed through sacred geometry. He has found that places with increased incidences are connected along ley lines. This may be why these locales have seen a rise in cryptid sightings and unexplained disappearances of people. If this theory holds out, we may better understand psychic abilities, UFOs and the motivations of the Annunaki.
teaser: We live on a paranormal planet full of anomalous activity and Jack Cary may have uncovered the secret as to why. He refers to this as a unified field theory of paranormal activity and it is based upon the laws of the universe in harmonic resonance.

title: Putting Consciousness to the Test with Caroline Cory
body: We have only just begun to tap into the full potential of the human mind. Caroline Cory is exploring ways that we can expand the capabilities of our consciousness to affect the world around us. Under clinical conditions, she is developing new systems for reprogramming consciousness, with astounding results. From ESP and telekinesis to the intentional manipulation of molecular structures at a distance, she is redefining what it means to be superhuman.
teaser: Caroline Cory is exploring ways that we can expand the capabilities of our consciousness to affect the world around us. From ESP and telekinesis to the intentional manipulation of molecular structures, she is redefining what it means to be superhuman.

title: Origin of Life with Bruce Damer
body:
How did life originate on our planet? This question has perplexed Bruce Damer, who proposes that the building blocks of life are self-assembling and thrive in increasing networks of cooperation. As he scoured the globe, enduring extreme environments, he has gathered evidence proving his model. Extrapolating from his material, paired with human progress, he gives us a vision of what our future can look like, if we start now, to help our technology work in consonance with the natural world. What he proposes equates to environmental moonshots.

This episode was filmed, January 2020.
teaser: How did life originate on our planet? This question has perplexed Bruce Damer, who proposes that the building blocks of life are self-assembling and thrive in increasing networks of cooperation.

title: Living in a 5G World with Ben Stewart
body: Our world stands upon the precipice of a new spectrum of cellular technology bathing our planet with increased electromagnetic fields. Will it be a 5G Utopia or Dystopia? Ben Stewart weighs in on the potential health risks, privacy concerns, and the hope for living in a 5G world. He believes that once we get past the pitfalls and learn to mitigate any health problems, this technology will be beneficial for humanity and our world, in many ways. A potential factor that we have not taken into consideration is how 5G may affect DMT in our bodies, which could help to take our conscious evolution to the next level.
teaser: What will it be like to live in a 5G world? Ben Stewart weighs in on the potential health risks, privacy concerns, and the hope that 5G can bring to our future.

title: Lucid Dreaming & Afterlife with Mark Stavish
body: Mark Stavish discusses the importance of learning lucid dreaming as a means of raising expanding consciousness to achieve a successful transition into the afterlife. He explains that sacred consciousness is a spectrum of awareness that can run from lucid dreaming to the continuation of life after death. Other important states of mind along this spectrum include remote viewing, out of body experiences, and astral projection. He shares methods that you can use to start lucid dreaming, tonight.
teaser: Mark Stavish discusses the importance of learning lucid dreaming as a means of raising expanding consciousness to achieve a successful transition into the afterlife. He shares methods that you can use to start lucid dreaming, tonight.

title: Messenger Between Worlds with Kristy Robinett
body: When Kristy Robinett discovered her psychic abilities, it came under dire circumstances. Now, she is a messenger between worlds, using her abilities to help the police solve difficult cases. She shares with us what she has learned from her years of working with spirits, how they communicate with her, and what the transition is like at the moment of death. From the recently deceased to animal spirits, she has seen and dealt with it all.
teaser: Kristy Robinett is a messenger between worlds, using her abilities to help the police solve difficult cases. She shares with us what she has learned from her years of working with spirits.

title: Back to the Moon with Brooks Agnew
body: How will humanity return to the moon? The time has come for us to earnestly venture into the new frontier as the private sector space race has already begun. Brooks Agnew discusses the next steps humanity will be taking as we build permanent infrastructure on the Moon and expand onto Mars. He details three lanes of our expansion into space: economic, government, and exploration. The key to which is successfully exploiting extraterrestrial materials such as asteroid mining.
teaser: How will humanity return to the moon? Brooks Agnew discusses the next steps humanity will be taking as we build permanent infrastructure on the Moon and expand onto Mars.

title: Real Pyramid Power with Chris Dunn
body: Could ancient Egypt have been far more advanced than we give them credit for? Chris Dunn presents his theory that the great pyramid of Giza was built as a powerplant for advanced technology. It is a theory that is still controversial, 20 years later. While many questions persist, such as the use of acoustic and solar energy within the pyramids' structure, what is certain is that they were never intended as burial sites.
teaser: Could ancient Egypt have been far more advanced than we give them credit for? Chris Dunn presents his theory that the great pyramid of Giza was built as a powerplant for advanced technology.

title: A Hybrid's Story with Kate Thorvaldsen
body: An experience with an unearthly creature, at age 3, set Kate Thorvaldsen’s life on an amazing trajectory. This was just the first of three major life-changing encounters. One of which left her with implants that heightened all of her senses to a startling degree; unsettling at first, but ultimately beneficial. She shares her unique perception on paranormal activity across the planet and why people are being fitted with extraterrestrial implants. Plus, she demonstrates the location of her implants with magnets.
teaser: An experience with an unearthly creature, at age 3, set Kate Thorvaldsen’s life on an amazing trajectory. This was just the first of three major life-changing encounters. She shares her unique perception on paranormal activity across the planet.

title: Connect with Your Angels with Corin Grillo
body: You have a celestial team of angels waiting to help you become angel-empowered and create the best life possible. Corin Grillo is an angel channeler who comes, just in time, to offer you tools to connect with your angels. We just need to learn how to listen to their voices and be willing to ask for their help. She shares advice on what you can do to experience their presence in your life and how to make contact through ritual and invocation.
teaser: You have a celestial team of angels waiting to help you become angel-empowered and create the best life possible. Corin Grillo is an angel channeler who comes, just in time, to offer you tools to connect with your angels.

title: E.T. Activity on Earth with Paola Harris
body: If aliens from other worlds are here, Paola Harris has been hot on their trail. She highlights some of the key cases that she has investigated over the years, including what she learned from such pivotal figures as J. Allen Hynek, Philip Corso, Wendelle Stevens, and Billy Meier. Plus, she shares, for the first time, her own personal encounters with extraterrestrial beings. The revelations that are just starting to trickle into the mainstream media is nothing compared to amount of information that she has uncovered concerning E.T. activity on Earth.
teaser: If aliens from other worlds are here, Paola Harris has been hot on their trail. She highlights some of the key cases that she has investigated over the years, including what she learned from many pivotal figures.

title: Mitigating Herd Mentality with Judy Wood
body: When calamity turns to crisis and communities become inundated with fear and confusion, people turn to a herd mentality, which feels safe but does not give the clarity needed for the best decisions. Judy Wood expounds upon ways that the media has misled us in such times, including 9/11, fires on the west coast, and medications that we were led to believe were beneficial but turned out to be anything but. She helps us find ways to mitigate herd mentality by being able to accurately evaluate the facts. But first, we revisit some of the evidence that she has collected concerning the collapse of the World Trade Center, including new findings on building seven.
teaser: Judy Wood expounds upon ways that the media has misled us in times of calamity, such as 9/11, and more. She helps us find ways to mitigate herd mentality by being able to accurately evaluate the facts.

title: Disclosing Antarctica with Brad Olsen
body: With unusual findings and even more fascinating tales, Antarctica is rousing intrigue across the globe. Brad Olsen has returned from a 26-day expedition through this frozen land in search of evidence of E.T. craft and remnants of antediluvian civilizations. He shares images of anomalous structures that do not appear to be naturally formed. As the ice melts, evidence will no longer remain hidden, leading to a thawing of disclosure for the world. He also discusses his next mission in search of a portal to the inner earth.
teaser: Brad Olsen has returned from a 26-day expedition through this frozen land in search of evidence of E.T. craft and remnants of antediluvian civilizations. He shares images of anomalous structures that do not appear to be naturally formed.

title: Microchips & A.I. Integration with William Henry
body: Could we be headed into the foretold time when implanting of microchips into the human body and integration with A.I. becomes mandated? William Henry states that we stand at a critical juncture where we need to make some important decisions regarding the future of humanity. He has investigated the ancient mythological origins of human consciousness as a gift from extraterrestrial beings, and he cautions that the future of technology may not bear the same degree of endowment. He is not too quick to shun the potential benefits of this technology, but he cautions us to proceed carefully and spiritually so as not to dehumanize humanity.
teaser: Could we be headed into the foretold time when implanting of microchips and integration with A.I. becomes mandated? William Henry states that we need to make some important decisions regarding the future of humanity.

title: Psychedelics Sacred History with Tom Hatsis
body: Psychedelics have played an important part in humanity’s conscious awakening and our continued spiritual growth. Tom Hatsis shares the forbidden fruits of his research into the sacred history of psychedelics and spirituality. He brings examples of mushroom veneration as depicted in medieval Christian artwork and literature. His research debunks some previously held notions of religions and psychedelics, while bringing to light some unexpected findings of the spiritual benefits of responsible psychedelic use.
teaser: Psychedelics have played an important part in humanity’s conscious awakening and our continued spiritual growth. Tom Hatsis shares the forbidden fruits of his research into the sacred history of psychedelics and spirituality.

title: Paranormal Hotspots with Joshua Warren
body: All things strange and supernatural are the life’s work of Joshua Warren. He shares some of the results that have come from the paranormal research he conducts in his laboratory, including sigils made with intention and sound waves which have had a profound effect on people’s lives. He also discusses the practical reality of invisibility technology and demonstrates how easy it is. Then, we explore his research into measuring gravity fluctuations that correlate with paranormal hotspots across the globe.
teaser: All things strange and supernatural are the life’s work of Joshua Warren. He shares some of the results that have come from the paranormal research he conducts in his laboratory, including sigils made with intention and sound waves which have had a profound effect on people’s lives.

title: Paranormal Time Slips with Nick Groff
body: What if hauntings are not emanations of spirits of the dead? After many years of investigating the paranormal, Nick Groff has new thoughts as to the nature of ghosts and offers possible explanations for some of the most common paranormal experiences. For example, some ghosts may be thoughtforms created by the living, or shadow figures may be higher forms of life exploring locations with high emotional energy. He posits that many hauntings may be the result of some sort of slippage in time, where we can see and interact with people in the past or future.
teaser: What if hauntings are not emanations of spirits of the dead? After many years of investigating the paranormal, Nick Groff has new thoughts as to the nature of ghosts and offers possible explanations for some of the most common paranormal experiences.

title: Critical Health with Ben Fuchs
body: We live in times when we are becoming increasingly aware of our susceptibility to illness. Ben Fuchs explains that the best way to deal with all of the events going on is to strengthen your immune system. He cautions us on the detriments of medications used for chronic conditions, stating that they can actually drain the body of essential nutrients. Rather he promotes the use of nutritional supplementation as a means of boosting the movement of electricity through the body and improving our critical health.
teaser: We live in times when we are becoming increasingly aware of our susceptibility to illness. Ben Fuchs explains that the best way to deal with all of the events going on is to strengthen your immune system.

title: Hiding the Ark of the Covenant with Ken Hanson
body: Why do some people want to keep the Ark of the Covenant hidden? Ken Hanson walks us through some of the holy sites in Jerusalem, including the Western Wall and the Dome of the Rock, while discussing how archeology in the Holy Land is affected by current geopolitics. As we follow along with his journey, we learn new details in the search for the Ark of the Covenant and the routes it may have been taken to keep its whereabouts clandestine. Noting the import placed upon this artifact and the effect it’s discovery could have on the world, Dr. Hanson reveals recent actions taken by geopolitcal leaders to prevent the Ark’s unearthing.
teaser: Why do some people want to keep the Ark of the Covenant hidden? Ken Hanson walks us through some of the holy sites in Jerusalem, including the Western Wall and the Dome of the Rock, while discussing how archeology in the Holy Land is affected by current geopolitics.

title: Galactic Akashic Historian with Debbie Solaris
body: Debbie Solaris was not a person who believed in E.T.s until she had a contact experience that changed everything about her. After the encounter she discovered that she was left with enhanced psychic abilities and the capacity to tap into the Akashic Records. Now she is recognized as a galactic historian and starseed intuitive who demonstrates her skills with a reading for George. She describes his first lifetime as a being living the Lyra star system fighting in a war with the Dracos.
teaser: Debbie Solaris was not a person who believed in E.T.s until she had a contact experience that changed everything about her. After the encounter she discovered that she was left with enhanced psychic abilities and the capacity to tap into the Akashic Records.

title: When Spirits Cross Over with Mark Nelson
body: What is it like when a person crosses over? Mark Nelson is a psychic who has the ability to help people connect with their loved ones who have crossed over to the other side. He explains how he discovered his abilities and what it is like when spirits communicate with him. As part of his working, he has helped spirits transition from life into the afterlife and reveals what it means to go into the light.
teaser: Mark Nelson is a psychic who has the ability to help people connect with their loved ones who have crossed over to the other side. He explains how he discovered his abilities and what it is like when spirits communicate with him.

title: Three Types of Hauntings with Richard Estep
body: Do you know what to do if your home is haunted? Richard Estep offers his view on three types of hauntings — people, places, and objects, and he gives tips on what you could do during such spiritual encounters. From growing up in a haunted home to leading paranormal investigation teams on television, he has encountered many types of entities and hauntings. He explains what it is like to investigate old hospitals and abandoned jails, experiencing the overwhelming emotional energy left behind from the past tragedies.
teaser: Do you know what to do if your home is haunted? Richard Estep offers his view on three types of hauntings — people, places, and objects, and he gives tips on what you could do during such spiritual encounters.

title: Channeling the Dead with the Ouija with Karen A. Dahlman
body: Are you afraid of the Ouija board? Karen A. Dahlman explains that you do not have to be afraid of communicating with the dead, and she offers expert advice for safely connecting with spirits. She explains how you can use the Ouija to reach out to loved ones who have died, channel spirits of the dead, and even communicate with your higher self. It is her hope that we understand that the board does not connect us with negative beings, it is just a tool that we can use to communicate with spirits of all kinds. It is you that does all of the work, and what you believe is what you receive.
teaser: Are you afraid of the Ouija board? Karen A. Dahlman explains that you do not have to be afraid of communicating with the dead, and she offers expert advice for safely connecting with spirits.

title: The Populated Universe with Marc D'Antonio
body: Science has failed us, at least in astronomy. That is the perspective that astronomer Marc Dantonio brings as he discusses some of the strange phenomena in our galaxy, including dark matter, dark energy, and the possibility of life. He is an astronomer who does believe we have been visited by extraterrestrial beings, and he shares his own personal experience with what may have been an alien implant found in his nose. As we examine some strange photographs, we discover that our perceptions can deceive us, and sometimes the unbelievable turns out to be real. Sometimes it’s hard to figure out what is real even with careful analysis.
teaser: Science has failed us, at least in astronomy. That is the perspective that astronomer Marc Dantonio brings as he discusses some of the strange phenomena in our galaxy, including dark matter, dark energy, and the possibility of life.

title: Post-Disclosure World with Randy Cramer
body: Plans are already underway to help us transition into a post-disclosure world. Randy Cramer returns to discuss details of the Secret Space Program that he has been authorized to reveal. As we see the development of a new branch of the military called Space Force, Cramer explains to George Noory why the militiarization of space is needed now more than ever. This comes the revelation that covert branches have been deployed throughout the solar system for decades to protect our planet. But why is all of this just now coming into public view? It may have something to do with increase trading with the intergalactic community and the removal of trade embargos.
teaser: Randy Cramer returns to discuss details of the Secret Space Program that he has been authorized to reveal. He explains to George Noory why the militiarization of space is needed now more than ever.

title: The Science of Subtle Energy with Dr. Simeon Hein
body: New scientific evidence shows that subtle energy plays an integral part in Crop Circles and Remote Viewing. Originally a skeptic, Dr. Simeon Hein has come to understand that psychic abilities, precognition, and distant healing stem from an ultra-low energy that imbues human beings with special abilities. He likens it to an internet that the universe has created which connects us all. As more evidence is collected, the larger scientific community is slowly starting to accept the phenomenal nature of our human potential.
teaser: Originally a skeptic, Dr. Simeon Hein has come to understand that psychic abilities, precognition, and distant healing stem from an ultra-low energy that imbues human beings with special abilities.

title: Breaking From Mainstream Identity with Sonia Barrett
body: We are stuck in a version of reality that is continuously reinforced by mainstream media which tries to reduce each of us into a defined identity. Sonia Barret offers hope for coping with the ordeals that our planet and societies are enduring by showing us how we can awaken our supernatural selves. This comes when you give yourself permission to change everything you knew that has shaped you into what you think you are, then pull away from that identity to discover and live as you authentically are.
teaser: Sonia Barret offers hope for coping with the ordeals that our planet and societies are enduring by showing us how we can awaken our supernatural selves.

title: Architecture of the Afterlife with Richard Martini
body: Perhaps the last great frontier is to explore the world beyond death. This is the work of Richard Martini who documents hypnosis sessions of people who venture into the spiritual realms and report on what they experience. From this he has been able to glean the architecture of the afterlife. In addition to sharing corroborated information from his research subjects on the spirit world, he shares how we can connect with our own personal council for guidance and offers a simple technique to reach out to loved ones on the flipside.
teaser: Perhaps the last great frontier is to explore the world beyond death. This is the work of Richard Martini who documents hypnosis sessions of people who venture into the spiritual realms.

title: Honing Psychic Techniques with Dr. Lauren Cielo
body: We are familiar with the five senses we use to navigate through our daily lives. Few use the subtle senses which can give us deeper insight into the unseen portions of our world. Lauren Cielo, who was trained in the psychic arts, now helps people tap into their psychic senses, like clairvoyance, clairaudience, and clairsentience as a means of healing and working with higher self. Dr. Cielo shares techniques that you can start using right away to awaken your psychic abilities and deepen your intuitive gifts.
teaser: We are familiar with the five senses we use to navigate through our daily lives. Dr. Cielo shares techniques that you can start using right away to awaken your psychic abilities and deepen your intuitive gifts.

title: Pentagon Recognition of UFOs with Nick Pope
body: We hear the stories of pilots encountering UFOs and think that this will never be officially acknowledged, but that is exactly what is happening as the Pentagon is releasing videos of Navy jets encountering UAPs. Nick Pope discusses the waxing congressional interest in the reality of the extraterrestrial presence on Earth. What is coming of this interest is a massive shift in the ridicule factor as we are now as close as we have ever been to official disclosure. Finally, many pilots feel vindicated for their reports of strange flying craft for which they have previously been silenced and shamed.
teaser: Nick Pope discusses the waxing congressional interest in the reality of the extraterrestrial presence on Earth. What is coming of this interest is a massive shift in the ridicule factor as we are now as close as we have ever been to official disclosure.

title: Pyramids & Hydrogen Power with J.J.and Desiree Hurtak
body: Did ancient Egyptians have light bulbs and the means to power them? J.J. and Desiree Hurtak explore the technology available on the Giza plateau to produce hydrogen that could have been used to generate electricity. Many mysteries and differing opinions pervade archeology concerning the function of monuments in ancient Egypt, but there is agreement that the mathematical sophistication and precision is unprecedented in history. New evidence comes forth suggesting the pyramids may have been built for the production of electrical power and advancements in human consciousness.
teaser: Did ancient Egyptians have light bulbs and the means to power them? J.J. and Desiree Hurtak explore the technology available on the Giza plateau to produce hydrogen that could have been used to generate electricity.

title: Body Language for Healing with Gay Hendricks
body: What if just by listening to your body you could change your world. This is exactly the premise that Gay Hendricks suggests with his mind-body therapy practice. He explains that the body speaks volumes even before a word can leave our mouths, and those who can perceive these subtle movements have a deeper insight into the emotional state of the speaker. Cluing into body language as a subtle form of communication can reveal limiting beliefs and the underlying causes to physical problems.
teaser: What if just by listening to your body you could change your world. This is exactly the premise that Gay Hendricks suggests with his mind-body therapy practice.

title: History of the Ouija with Robert Murch
body: The Ouija board has a power that other spirit communication devices don’t. That is according to Robert Murch, a collector of and expert on Ouija boards. He sheds light on many of the myths and fables surrounding this tool which originated in the late 1800s, and has since been mired in myths and misunderstandings. As we explore the history of talking boards, we gain an understanding of how it got its unwarranted reputation as a portal to evil. There are many benefit to be gained, but It all depends upon the expectations of the user. Murch offers advice for safely using the board for the first time so that you can experience the beneficial outcomes that so many other have had.
teaser: Robert Murch, a collector and expert on Ouija, sheds light on many of the myths and fables surrounding talking boards, which originated in the late 1800s, and has since been mired in myths and misunderstandings.

title: The In Between with Jim Bruton
body: A near death experience is one of the most dramatic ways to change one’s life. This is what Jim Bruton learned, firsthand, after he crashed a vintage airplane he had be restoring. This led to a weeklong induced coma, where he explored a trip of a lifetime in the "in between"; a unique afterlife experience that changed his life in every way possible. He shares the perspectives he gained concerning life and the afterlife to help others learn about their purpose and the dangers of living someone else’s life, so that they do not have to experience an NDE to make important changes.
teaser: A near death experience is one of the most dramatic ways to change one’s life. This is what Jim Bruton learned, firsthand, after he crashed a vintage airplane he had be restoring.

title: Navigating a LifeQuake with Toni Galardi
body: The course of your life could change in the blip of a moment. Wouldn’t it be great if you had a roadmap to guide you through the potential pitfalls? This is what Dr. Toni Galardi offers with the seven stages of her LifeQuake Repurposing method which offers us the opportunity to understand what we will face as we engage the most turbulent of times of our lives. Dr. Galardi’s working includes tools like evolutionary and medical astrology which can help us better understand what to expect, why it is occurring, and what we can do about it.
teaser: Dr. Toni Galardi discusses her LifeQuake Repurposing method which helps us understand what we will face as we engage the most turbulent of times of our lives.

title: Contacting Interdimensional Entities with Jonathan Zap
body: We tend to shrug off the mysterious voices in our head, but what if some of them stem from spontaneous contact with otherworldly entities? Jonathan Zap defines different kinds of relationships that we can have with interdimensional beings, that are not limited to contact with deceased loved ones. This can include mind-made entities like tulpas, advanced beings known to the Greeks as daemons, or various intrapsychic forms that can be interpreted as multiple personalities. He shares stories and examples from working with different types of beings and the benefits we can gain from them.
teaser: Jonathan Zap defines different kinds of relationships that we can have with interdimensional beings, that are not limited to contact with deceased loved ones.

title: How to Conduct Safe Séances with Kaedrich Olsen
body: We each have the ability to communicate with the dead. All you have to do is learn how to tap into your unique gifts and find the right method for you. You will be amazed watching Kaedrich Olsen conduct séances to connect people with spirits and loved ones on the other side.  He demonstrates techniques for a safe and successful séance using the Ouija, pendulums, and automatic writing as tools to communicate with spirits. Whether you want to connect with lost loved ones or gain inspiration from higher beings, you have the ability to part the veils and connect with the spiritual realms.
teaser: Watch as Kaedrich Olsen conducts séances to connect people with spirits and loved ones on the other side.  He demonstrates techniques for a safe and successful séance using the Ouija, pendulums, and automatic writing as tools to communicate with spirits.

title: Annunaki, Giants, and Serpent People with Freddy Silva
body: Who were the serpent people, Annunaki, or the giants, and how did they affect humanity? Freddy Silva takes us back in time on a journey around the world, to discover the redacted history of a group of people that came from the stars to ensure that humanity would inherit the Earth amid conflict with other worlds. No matter the depictions, the stories all tell of an advanced people that guided humanity into civilization. We see signs of their influence with the spontaneous rise of agriculture, architecture, and animal husbandry. As we examine the clues left behind, we see signs of these people in South America, New Zealand, and Egypt.
teaser: Freddy Silva takes us back in time on a journey around the world, to discover a group of people that came from the stars to ensure that humanity would inherit the Earth amid conflict with other worlds. No matter the depictions, the stories all tell of an advanced people that guided humanity into civilization.

title: Colonizing the Solar System with Brooks Agnew
body: Colonizing the moon and beyond is the next giant leap for humankind. But it starts with one small step. Brooks Agnew gives us a glimpse into the very near future as we venture farther than ever to colonizing our solar system. First stop is the moon to make use of the copious amounts of Helium-3 to refuel craft. Then on to Mars and the asteroid belt to make use of raw materials to build out the infrastructure we would need. From there we could see a fully industrialized solar system capable of taking us to the stars.
teaser: Colonizing the moon and beyond is the next giant leap for humankind. But it starts with one small step. Brooks Agnew gives us a glimpse into the very near future as we venture farther than ever to colonizing our solar system.

title: Mounds of the Nephilim with L.A. Marzulli
body: Tales across the ancient world tell us of giant red-headed people rampaging through human populaces. L.A. Marzulli has identified these beings as the Nephilim as described in the Bible. He has been on their trail, uncovering evidence left behind in great mounds found still standing in the American Midwest. He gives us a tour through his discoveries from many sites, including the Cahokia mounds and Serpent mound. What he found answers some questions but raises many more including how the mounds were built and what became of these beings.
teaser: Tales across the ancient world tell us of giant red-headed people rampaging through human populaces. L.A. Marzulli has identified these beings as the Nephilim and he has uncovered evidence left behind in great mounds in the American Midwest.

title: UFO Data Analysis with Cheryl Costa
body: As reports of UFOs become more commonplace, a key factor in removing ridicule from mainstream reporting is the accurate reporting of data and deciphering patterns from the sightings. This is the role Cheryl Costa takes as an investigative journalist and UFO researcher who gives us an overall view of hot spots and the best times to spot them. For over twenty years, she has kept a growing database of UFO sightings; documenting date, time, location, and shapes of UFOs. In this episode she shares the fruits of her research, pinpointing patterns and trends. The analysis of the data shows that the UFO phenomena is much bigger than mainstream media lets on. But all of that is about to change.
teaser: For over twenty years, Cheryl Costa has kept a growing database of UFO sightings; documenting date, time, location, and shapes of UFOs. She gives us an overall view of hot spots and the best times to spot them.

title: Geometrical Ruins On Mars with George Haas
body:
Did geometrical ruins found on Mars and the moon halt American space programs?

George Hass dials in on photos from Mariner 9, Athena, and other probes that depict artificial structures that may suggest past civilization. He compares many of the Mars photos to Earth’s structures with startling similarities. The evidence of more recent settlements, leaves us quandering the mysteries of where the Martians could have gone or still are.
teaser: Did geometrical ruins found on Mars and the moon halt American space programs? George Hass dials in on photos from Mariner 9, Athena, and other probes that depict artificial structures that may suggest past civilization.

title: Divination Tools For Intuition with Paul O’Brien
body: Most look to the external for answers, yet with divination tools we can connect to what our innate already knows. Paul O’Brien, a software development entrepreneur of divination tools, walks us through the meditative practice of gathering wisdom by working with the I Ching and the archetypes. He explains that our Intuition is a higher form of intelligence that can use divination tools as a way to stimulate inner wisdom and think outside the box.  He reminds us, through “visionary decision making”, to cultivate curiosity and to tune in to what is true to you. Thus, creating a better relationship with change.
teaser: Paul O’Brien explains that our Intuition is a higher form of intelligence that can use divination tools as a way to stimulate inner wisdom and think outside the box.

title: Constructing Realities In The Quantum Realm with Marina Jacobi
body: What is the dimensional quantum realm and how does it affect our reality? Dive deep into dimensional quantum experiences by breaking long chain patterns and reconstructing molecular structures to open new possibilites in your life. Marina Jacobi, a 4th generational intuitive, channels interdimensional beings to help people understand the quantum and the physical structure as magnetic and gravitational fields. It is through our choices and our vibrational outputs that we manifest our reality, affecting all of our timelines or parallel universes. Watch as she weaves possibilities of reprinting & restructuring realities.
teaser: What is the dimensional quantum realm and how does it affect our reality? Dive deep into dimensional quantum experiences by breaking long chain patterns and reconstructing molecular structures to open new possibilities in your life.

title: Quantum Leap to the Other Side
body: Are you aware of the connection between consciousness and the soul? There may be a quantum view to explain this. Mark Anthony bridges the scientific and spiritual perspective of what he terms the “electromagnetic soul” which unifies us all. When we die, the soul quantum leaps from the material world to the other side, which is considered the collective consciousness. Watch as he organizes the thoughts of Newtonian theory and the quantum view by correlating studies of biophotons, quantum leaping, and the relationship of death to the infinite.
teaser: Mark Anthony bridges the scientific and spiritual perspective of what he terms the “electromagnetic soul” which unifies us all. When we die, the soul quantum leaps from the material world to the other side, considered as the collective consciousness.

title: Psychically Locating Human Resonance
body:
Like sonar for a dolphin or bat, Patricia Monna, an internationally known psychic medium, is able to target a person’s resonance and see their location and environment through remote viewing and dowsing. From a young age, she recognized her abilities to sense death and see illness in another through her hyper-sensitivity. 

She brings story and perspective to her psychic experiences as a hospice oncology nurse, her work as a psychic for private clients, and her assistance in locating missing people with law enforcement. As she explains these techniques that have come naturally for her, she reminds us that this can be learned by all.
teaser: Like sonar for a dolphin or bat, Patricia Monna can target a person’s resonance and see their environment through remote viewing and dowsing. As she explains these techniques that have come naturally for her, she reminds us that this can be learned by all.

title: Chakras and Money Flow
body:
Can trauma directly affect our relationship with money? Leisa Peterson, wealth coach and author of The Mindful Millionaire, explains how scarcity consciousness and trauma can block or close the chakra system. She further communicates that trauma bubbles stored in chakras are directly tied to money issues. Healing needs to occur first in order to create a harmonious connection and experience with wealth. 

She shares quick action steps on how to open and be with our chakras -- concluding that by learning how to look inward and work on ourselves we not only are self-empowered, but it also gives us more discerning awareness of our patterns and how our bodies feel cycling in those patterns.
teaser: Can trauma directly affect our relationship with money? Leisa Peterson, wealth coach and author of The Mindful Millionaire, explains how scarcity consciousness and trauma can block or close the chakra system.

title: Scientific Remote Viewing & Emotions
body: How can we unlock our own innate abilities? PrinCess Jeanee says that remote viewing is a way to know the truth. Her modality of scientific remote viewing (SRV), a remote viewing model in which the viewer does not know their target, has unlocked her pathway as a teacher, meditator, and knowledge seeker. During her time as an artist, she was approached by renowned director, Dr. Courtney Brown who worked with her at the Farsight institute. Using SRV differently than most of her contemporaries, Jeanee utilizes her emotions and her consciousness to see through the eyes of those she remote views. Watch as she conveys her process and the tools she uses to create grounding and alignment before a session.
teaser: How can we unlock our own innate abilities? PrinCess Jeanee's modality of scientific remote viewing (SRV) has unlocked her pathway as a teacher, meditator, and knowledge seeker. She utilizes her emotions to see through the eyes of those she remote views.

title: The Light System Organization
body:
Ancient civilizations that predate our written history have protected sacred knowledge and technology, waiting for the right time for it to be unveiled to the world. Approached by a clandestine organization called The Light System (TLS), Jason Shurka is a messenger of information for this group, revealing who they are, what they do, and what their purpose is. 

With intergalactic connections, TLS’s main purpose is to guide humanity in reaching a higher level of consciousness and awareness. While ancient knowledge has been seeing the light of day, powerful and sacred items may remain hidden under the Dome of the Rock still waiting to be fully unlocked with the Pyramid Code. When we learn to unlock these codes, we will be closer to reaching our collective destiny.
teaser: Approached by a clandestine organization called The Light System (TLS), Jason Shurka is a messenger of information for this group, revealing who they are, what they do, and what their purpose is.

title: Mystical Matchmaker
body: Finding a romantic match is a spiritual process. Marla Martenson is a mystical matchmaker, spiritual life coach, and intuitive reader. Her work is to facilitate transformational shifts for her clients to allow them to align to who they truly are, to find someone with perfect affinity to them. She shares how shifting to a spiritual perspective can attune us to finding a soulmate and shift our entire lives. Surprisingly, letting go of our ideals about what it means to be spiritual will lead to a connection to the right person for us.
teaser: Marla Martenson is a mystical matchmaker, spiritual life coach, and intuitive reader. Her work is to facilitate transformational shifts for her clients to allow them to align to who they truly are, to find someone with perfect affinity to them.

title: Transcending 5G Frequencies
body: Fear and stress in the mind and body diminishes our frequency, but we can strengthen ourselves by living and acting in gratitude and connecting to the natural world. Following the popular interview Living in a 5G World, Ben Stewart, researcher and documentarian, returns to answer our viewer questions review the impact of 5G connection and surveillance in a high speed society. He communicates that we can coexist in a world of technology and transcend the negative impact it poses. One example would be the Schumann Resonance -- which is the heartbeat of our planet. Realigning to this individually can have an effect on our global frequency to move us to a brighter future.
teaser: Fear and stress in the mind and body diminishes our frequency, but we can strengthen ourselves by living in gratitude and connecting to the natural world. Ben Stewart returns to answer questions on the impact of 5G connection in a high speed society.

title: Navigating the Hermetic Kybalion
body: Thought is a tool of creation that alters our reality. Writer, historian, and scholar of the occult, Mitch Horowitz discusses the history of occult (hidden) knowledge. The wisdom traditions that deify the forces of nature as gods and archetypes can bring us to greater understanding of ethics and life in our cosmos. Horowitz explains that studying books such as the Hermetic Kybalion and Manly P. Hall's Secret Teachings for All Ages can help in shifting to a higher perspective, outside of our everyday lives. As we make this shift, we create a new path for how we encounter every experience, and change the polarity of life as we see it.
teaser: Thought is a tool of creation that alters our reality. Writer, historian, and scholar of the occult, Mitch Horowitz discusses the history of occult (hidden) knowledge.

title: Dispatching Your Spirit Guides
body:
How can people improve their lives by accessing their spirit guides? Bruce Goldberg, a healer hypnotherapist and author of award-winning books, developed a technique called ‘the super conscious mind tap’. Through this, he trains patients to access their higher selves.
 
Learn to connect to your higher self as the dispatcher to your spirit guides to raise the vibrational frequency of our soul. This enables us to become psychically empowered and to let go of fear. We can receive guides in more advanced ways as we lift our energy. The interaction of these guides in our lives can be subtle or a profound physical experience – reaching out to us as animal spirits, gate keepers, biochemical, doctor, and messenger guides.
teaser: How can people improve their lives by accessing their spirit guides? Bruce Goldberg, a healer hypnotherapist and author of award-winning books, developed a technique called ‘the super conscious mind tap’. He trains patients to access their higher selves.

title: Magick for the Modern World
body:
Magick can be used to evolve our consciousness. Patti Negri, a psychic and author of Old World Magick for the Modern World shares the techniques of rituals and spell making. These practices are intentional actions which create shifts in our belief systems. By adding magick as a physical component, such as lighting a candle, we strengthen our intention setting.
 
Negri’s goal is to support and simultaneously allow people to see their own power when doing ritual and working with magick. Through this process we cause cascading shifts always creating a reaction from our actions. Having a sense of right and wrong is important when working with ritual. As we observe each shift that follows our action we become more masterful in the flow of our lives.
teaser: Magick can be used to evolve our consciousness. Patti Negri, a psychic and author of Old World Magick for the Modern World shares the techniques of rituals and spell making.

title: Science, Spirituality, the Universe & You
body: What is your place in the universe? Dr. Theresa Bullard, host of Mystery Teachings on Gaia and instructor with the Modern Mystery School, combines a Physics PhD with a lifelong path of exploring consciousness and ancient wisdom traditions. She discusses how it is possible to observe the world with both a scientific and creative mind. We can tap into archetypal symbols through tools such as Tarot, and study mystery traditions that point us toward greater wisdom, peace, and balance.
teaser: Theresa Bullard discusses how it is possible to observe the world with both a scientific and creative mind. We can tap into archetypal symbols and study mystery traditions that point us toward greater wisdom, peace, and balance.

title: Cutting Through to Hidden Truths
body: Now is the time to uncover hidden truths. Sean Stone, filmmaker and host of Buzzsaw on Gaia, describes his spiritual work in contributing to the awakening of our society and transforming the world. He explains that government agencies and media organizations conceal knowledge about historical events that have changed the course of our reality. We each have the power to change this reality by paying close attention to events outside of the mainstream narrative.
teaser: Now is the time to uncover hidden truths. Sean Stone, filmmaker and host of Buzzsaw on Gaia, describes his spiritual work in contributing to the awakening of our society and transforming the world.

title: Healing Contact Experiences
body: Laurie McDonald returns to Gaia to speak more about her extraterrestrial contact experiences, which have prompted her work as a clinical hypnotherapist. She explains how through regression, her clients are able to recover their memories of alien abductions. She describes feeling alienated while growing up, both from the reaction to her mother's abduction experience while pregnant with Laurie, and her own questions about her origins. Connection to the ET groups who visit our planet has led her to teach others to describe and share their own memories.
teaser: Laurie McDonald returns to Gaia to speak more about her extraterrestrial contact experiences, which have prompted her work as a clinical hypnotherapist.

title: Tracking Signs of Sasquatch
body:
Researcher Jim Myers has been following signs of the sasquatch, or bigfoot, across the continent. Are sasquatch human or ET beings? He examines the evidence of sasquatch presence in remote forest land, and the many reported sightings over the years. We also visit the Sasquatch Encounter Museum in Colorado where Jim curates ongoing research on sasquatch to shed light on their behavior so we too can notice when they cross our paths.

Myers explains that his research leads him to believe that there are sasquatch, bigfoot, and yeti on every continent under different names. As more evidence is gathered, we may be closer to understanding these beings.
teaser: Researcher Jim Myers has been following signs of the sasquatch, or bigfoot, across the continent. Are sasquatch human or ET beings? He examines the evidence of sasquatch presence in remote forest land, and the many reported sightings over the years

title: Demanding Disclosure
body: Why are UFO phenomena still being concealed from the public? Filmmaker James Fox has spent many years researching evidence of UFOs. His documentary film The Phenomenon calls for government transparency in disclosing what is known about ET presence. Fox discusses his research in the US National Archives, the many interviews he has conducted with leading investigators and insiders, and why we all need to keep asking for disclosure.
teaser: Filmmaker James Fox has spent many years researching evidence of UFOs. His documentary film The Phenomenon calls for government transparency in disclosing what is known about ET presence.

title: Oracle Cards & Dreaming
body: Our dreams carry the patterns of our waking lives, and understanding them can help us understand ourselves. Kelly Sullivan Walden is a dream expert and hypnotherapist who uses dream therapy to help her clients access wisdom from their subconscious dreaming minds. She discusses how the dreaming mind taps into the truths of our fears and potential. Walden demonstrates an oracle card reading from her own Awakened Dreamer oracle deck to inspire and manifest answers to life's questions.
teaser: Our dreams carry the patterns of our waking lives, and understanding them can help us understand ourselves. Kelly Sullivan Walden is a dream expert and hypnotherapist who uses dream therapy to help her clients access wisdom from their subconscious dreaming minds.

title: Intergalactic Council for 5D Ascension
body: We are each part of a universal whole. Vincent Genna is a psychic medium who has learned to channel messages from extraterrestrial beings. He discusses his experiences of telepathically communicating with ET beings who are part of an intergalactic council working to raise humanity to a higher level of awareness, consciousness, and action. Ultimately, we can work with these beings to ascend to the fifth dimension.
teaser: Vincent Genna is a psychic medium who has learned to channel messages from extraterrestrial beings. He discusses his experiences of telepathically communicating with ET beings who are part of an intergalactic council working to raise humanity to a higher level of awareness, consciousness, and action.

title: Healing Secrets of Sunlight
body: Is there a way to overcome viruses that doesn't include pharmaceutical drugs? Ben Fuchs is a registered pharmacist, nutritionist, and chemist who specializes in using nutritional supplements instead of the toxic pharmaceutical drugs used by other healthcare practitioners. He explains how supporting our physical health includes mindful exposure to sunlight and phytonutrient intake from plants. Fuchs shares the practical techniques we can use to heal our immune systems with energy from both plants and sunlight.
teaser: Is there a way to overcome viruses that doesn't include pharmaceutical drugs? Fuchs shares the practical techniques we can use to heal our immune systems with energy from both plants and sunlight.

title: Escape From Prison Planet
body: As we are learning more about the secret agendas on our planet, can we escape their confines and wake up to our individual and collective potential? Writer, publisher, and researcher Brad Olsen works to uncover lost and hidden knowledge in our planet’s history and current events. In his most recent book, Beyond Esoteric: Escape From Prison Planet, Olsen describes the current war for humanity’s minds and souls, and how it is possible to expand our consciousness to understand the true nature of our reality. He shares how esoteric knowledge brings greater understanding to our world.
teaser: As we are learning more about the secret agendas on our planet, can we escape their confines and wake up to our individual and collective potential? Writer, publisher, and researcher Brad Olsen works to uncover lost and hidden knowledge in our planet’s history and current events.

title: Invoking Angelic Beings
body: Learn how to recognize the presence of angels and begin to follow your intuitive guidance to release resistance and allow miracles in your own life. Corin Grillo, author of The Angel Experiment, returns to Gaia for an expanded conversation on the power of ever-present angels in our lives and the techniques we can use to invite their assistance. Grillo reveals how angels help us manifest the life we desire, raise our consciousness, and experience powerful healing. She also answers questions about who the angels are, where they originate, and how to connect with them.
teaser: Learn how to recognize the presence of angels and begin to follow your intuitive guidance to release resistance and allow miracles in your own life. Corin Grillo, author of The Angel Experiment, returns to Gaia for an expanded conversation on the power of ever-present angels in our lives and the techniques we can use to invite their assistance.

title: Reincarnation & Past Life Memories
body: Is it possible to understand our present conditions by exploring our past lives? Hypnotherapist Dr. Shelley Kaehr PhD describes her work of many years regressing clients to their past life experiences. This work helps patients to identify, resolve and then heal from past life traumas. Explaining she too has many memories from previous incarnations, Dr. Kaehr says we each carry memories from other lifetimes. Exploring these cyclical memories from throughout time empowers us to be at peace in our present situations.
teaser: Hypnotherapist Dr. Shelley Kaehr PhD describes her work of many years regressing clients to their past life experiences. This work helps patients to identify, resolve and then heal from past life traumas.

title: Collateral Damage of the JFK Assassination
body: John F. Kennedy was one of the most famous US presidents of all time. His assassination in 1963 has been under investigation for more than fifty years. Legal analyst and historian Mark Shaw highlights some of the surrounding events of this presidential assassination, including the deaths of actress Marilyn Monroe and reporter Dorothy Kilgallen. Shaw's book Collateral Damage is an in-depth examination of the questions around this turning point in history. Find out what Kilgallen was about to expose, which ultimately led to her untimely demise.
teaser: Legal analyst and historian Mark Shaw highlights some of the surrounding events of the JFK assassination, including the deaths of actress Marilyn Monroe and reporter Dorothy Kilgallen.

title: Exploring Extrasensory Consciousness
body: The power of human consciousness is still not fully understood. Caroline Cory is the award-winning filmmaker of Superhuman: the Invisible Made Visible. Her documented studies of psychokinesis, precognition, and telepathy are helping to expand public understanding of skills which are not yet developed in many of us. Cory describes the interconnection of our consciousness with the fabric of the entire universe, which allows us to move and act in ways previously not understood. As individuals, we may be able to use our minds to directly control matter and gain new perceptions. Continuing her research into consciousness, Cory also mentions her work on an upcoming documentary investigating the UFO phenomena.
teaser: Caroline Cory describes the interconnection of our consciousness with the fabric of the entire universe, which allows us to move and act in ways previously not understood.

title: Exploring African Shamanism
body: Renowned South African filmmaker Lionel Friedberg has worked for many years in television and film, eventually making his way to the United States. Friedberg's book Forever in My Veins: How Film Led Me to the Mysterious World of the African Shaman describes his journey and spiritual awakening through a firsthand transformative encounter with a shaman in Africa. Friedberg also explores how each of us can find inspiration to face all beings with greater compassion.
teaser: Renowned South African filmmaker Lionel Friedberg has worked for many years in television and film, eventually making his way to the United States. He shares his shamanic encounters and explores how each of us can find inspiration to face all beings with greater compassion..

title: Dream Work & Angelic Guidance
body: What do we know about who we really are? Susan Plunket PhD is a clinical psychologist and writer who began to understand her higher self and other dimensions through dream work. Studying the work of Jung, she specializes in dream interpretation for her clients. Dr. Plunket describes her communication with incorporeal angelic beings who have guided her throughout life, and her study of the Law of One. Ultimately, each of us can reach a better understanding of ourselves and our own internal stories.
teaser: What do we know about who we really are? Susan Plunket PhD is a clinical psychologist and writer who began to understand her higher self and other dimensions through dream work.

title: Raising Starseed Consciousness
body: A Starseed is someone who incarnated in another star system and reincarnated on Earth. Starseed Bridget Nielsen is an intuitive healer, medium, and ambassador for various ET/human hybrid children. She works to help her clients recognize their higher vibrational nature. Nielsen discusses inner earth civilizations, abundance and synchronicity. Learn to use perceptions beyond your everyday senses to understand more about individual roles in raising collective consciousness.
teaser: Starseed Bridget Nielsen is an intuitive healer, medium, and ambassador for various ET/human hybrid children. She works to help her clients recognize their higher vibrational nature.

title: Finding Your Akashic Crystal
body: Galactic historian and ET contactee Debbie Solaris discusses her extrasensory perceptions and her work in reading the Galactic Akashic Records over the past decade. As a Starseed with her origins in Arcturus, she specializes in helping others make connections to their own Starseed origins and understand their soul journeys across the universe from past to present. Based on the works of Dolores Cannon and Linda Howe, she explains how to find the right “crystal” within the records and how to connect to one’s larger soul family, life purpose, and personal skill sets. From her experience onboard a sentient plasma light ship to an exploration of George Noory’s ancient Egyptian connections, Debbie Solaris provides empowering inspiration for the soul’s journey and metamorphosis into a 5D life.
teaser: Galactic historian and ET contactee Debbie Solaris discusses her extrasensory perceptions and her work in reading the Galactic Akashic Records over the past decade.

title: Overcoming Egregore Energy
body: Are you being controlled by group thought? Writer and Hermetic researcher Mark Stavish speaks about the path of inner awakening and the way that collective consciousness can manifest as an egregore. He defines this as an unseen force or thought-form that manipulates the minds of humans. The key to avoid being controlled by egregore energy in our current timeline is to cultivate your own internal strength and awareness.
teaser: Writer and Hermetic researcher Mark Stavish speaks about the path of inner awakening and the way that collective consciousness can manifest as an egregore, or group thought.

title: Accepting Miraculous Change
body: Dr. Harley Rotbart has seen many miracles in the course of his work as a pediatric physician, even describing how viruses can be miracles. Founder of The Miracles Project, he is dedicated to shining a light on the power of wonder and contentment in the world. In this inspiring conversation, Dr. Rotbart describes his views of good and evil, his personal spiritual journey, and how we can change our perspective to find the capacity for miracles in adversity.
teaser: In this inspiring conversation, Dr. Harley Rotbart describes his views of good and evil, his personal spiritual journey, and how we can change our perspective to find the capacity for miracles in adversity.

title: Understanding & Using Bioenergetic Medicine
body:
We are all made up of energy. Dr. Bradley Nelson demonstrates the muscle testing technique that allows bioenergetic practitioners to release the deeply rooted trapped emotions that create an energetic "heart wall," keeping us from expressing a state of happiness. Dr. Nelson teaches individuals through his app The Body Code to release emotions and experience a physical shift. 

For more information on how to use Dr. Bradley Nelson's techniques, see The Emotion Code Toolkit on Gaia.
teaser: We are all made up of energy. Dr. Bradley Nelson demonstrates how to release deeply rooted trapped emotions, and recognize the power of sending and receiving love.

title: Our Simulated Multiverse
body: Are we living in a simulation? Computer scientist and author of The Simulated Multiverse, Rizwan Virk discusses the theory that we are living in a simulated reality operated from an external source. As our current technologies explore the nature of existence, we may reach what Virk calls the simulation point, where we will be able to create our own hyperrealistic realities by exploring multiverses and the possibilities beyond.
teaser: Computer scientist and author of The Simulated Multiverse, Rizwan Virk discusses the theory that we are living in a simulated reality operated from an external source

title: Connecting to Cosmic Intelligence
body: There are ancient mysteries continually being uncovered across the world pointing to humanity's cosmic connections beyond our planet. For many years, JJ and Desiree Hurtak have worked together to investigate the historical and theological phenomena that point to who we are and why we are here. They share their studies of ancient technology and how all of humanity can discover we are much greater than we know. As we learn to uncover our connections to other beings in the cosmos, we will raise our collective consciousness to a higher understanding of both spirituality and science.
teaser: JJ and Desiree Hurtak share their studies of ancient technology and how all of humanity can discover we are much greater than we know.

title: Finding Close Encounters
body: When will we reach full Disclosure of secret knowledge about extraterrestrial contact? Investigative journalist Paola Harris first became involved in documenting known ET activity after being inspired by the film Close Encounters of the Third Kind, the 1979 story of world-renowned scientist Jacques Vallee. Her work began with J. Allen Hynek and his disclosures after the government's Project Blue Book came to light. Harris recently co-authored the book Trinity: The Best-Kept Secret with Vallee, sharing her perspective on the realities of ET contact in the past, present, and future.
teaser: When will we reach full Disclosure of secret knowledge about extraterrestrial contact? Investigative journalist Paola Harris shares her perspective on the realities of ET contact in the past, present, and future.

title: Living in a Limitless World
body: In our constantly changing world, we can hold to our highest intentions and purpose. Author and teacher Sonia Barrett shares her inspirations for finding and expressing the highest possibilities of who we can be, not limited by our expectations. Barrett explains how our human nature allows us to become infinitely adaptable and flourish even in the most difficult times. She discusses how we can discover the natural intelligence of our mind and body, awakening to higher energetic frequencies.
teaser: Author and teacher Sonia Barrett shares her inspirations for finding and expressing the highest possibilities of who we can be, not limited by our expectations.

title: Mystic Healing
body: What is “mystic healing” and how can it better our lives? Award-winning author and mystic healer Sonja Grace is an “energetic surgeon” who has been “healing in the unseen world” for over 40 years. Embodying a pure vessel to share divine healing with individuals by defying space and time, Grace supports those trying to change their lives through accomplishing inner work. By teaching people to access their inner peace, Grace helps individuals understand that peace is always accessible because it exists within our soul body.
teaser: What is “mystic healing” and how can it better our lives? Award-winning author and mystic healer Sonja Grace is an “energetic surgeon” who has been “healing in the unseen world” for over 40 years.

title: Yogic Dreaming Practices
body: What’s the next step in human evolution? Author and humanitarian Andrew Holecek teaches about liminal consciousness and the tridirectional skills of lucid dreaming, lucid living, and lucid dying through five levels of nocturnal meditations. The practice of dream yoga, he says, can be seven to eight times more effective than waking practices, and this uncharted territory may hold the key for the evolution of humanity. While ancient and indigenous cultures have accessed these brain states for millennia, modern science is just beginning to realize the potentials of this vast natural resource.
teaser: What’s the next step in human evolution? Author and humanitarian Andrew Holecek teaches the tridirectional skills of lucid dreaming, lucid living, and lucid dying through five levels of nocturnal meditations.

title: Holy Relics & the Afterlife
body: It’s the age-old question: what happens when we die? New York Times best-selling author Paul Perry has been researching the after life and near-death experiences for decades. Producing books, films, and documentaries, Perry has teamed with dedicated researchers including Dr. Raymond Moody, Dr. Melvin Morse, and Dannion Brinkley. Sharing insight from years working in the field with experts, Perry discusses holy relics from the Vatican, his knighthood from the Portuguese royal family, following the trail of Jesus in Egypt, near-death experiences, and reincarnation.
teaser: It’s the age-old question: what happens when we die? New York Times best-selling author Paul Perry has been researching the after life and near-death experiences for decades. Sharing insight from years working in the field with experts, Perry discusses holy relics from the Vatican, his knighthood from the Portuguese royal family, following the trail of Jesus in Egypt, near-death experiences, and reincarnation.

title: Ancient Codes of History
body: How do ancient civilizations on Earth link us to extraterrestrials throughout time? Speaking on how Aboriginal leaders believe humanity was seeded by extraterrestrials, best-selling author Billy Carson shares insight from his years of experience and research. Discussing ancient sites, religious texts, advanced beings, lost technology, and ETs, Carson is looking for big picture answers by connecting data points across history.
teaser: How do ancient civilizations on Earth link us to extraterrestrials throughout time? Speaking on how Aboriginal leaders believe humanity was seeded by extraterrestrials, Billy Carson shares insight from his years of experience and research.

title: Accessing Paranormal Dimensions
body: Paranormal dimensions are accessible to us at all times. Teacher and guide Kaedrich Olsen returns to Beyond Belief to discuss his work awakening people to the reality of spirits around us. Olsen explains there are many supernatural presences humans can communicate with and learn from. These include the spirits of nature, spirits of the dead, and manifest entities such as egregores, which awaken from the collective unconscious of humanity.
teaser: Paranormal dimensions are accessible to us at all times. Teacher and guide Kaedrich Olsen returns to Beyond Belief to discuss his work awakening people to the reality of spirits around us.

title: A Path to 5D Ascension
body: Offering a path out of a dark night of the soul, spiritual life coach Suzanne Ross speaks about the process of attaining ascension to a 5D matrix. Having found divine love and radiant light, she shares her experience of spiritual awakening, which led to her work helping others to heal.
teaser: Offering a path out of a dark night of the soul, spiritual life coach Suzanne Ross speaks about the process of attaining ascension to a 5D matrix.

title: A Simple Method for Bending Time
body: Are there simple techniques we can use to begin living the magic of higher dimensions? Bill McKenna teaches us how to move into the fourth and fifth dimensions by mastering our emotions. Author of The Only Lesson and founder of Cognomovement (a modality used to process subconscious roadblocks), McKenna explains that the negative emotions and experiences we have are based in the third dimension, and that feeling higher emotions automatically moves us into the fourth dimension where mystical experiences show up in our lives. Bill shares an example of when he used emotion with intention and ignored the laws of the 3rd dimension to bend time. He explains in detail how to move between the dimensions and offers clear direction for how we can bend time in our own lives.
teaser: Are there simple techniques we can use to begin living the magic of higher dimensions? Bill McKenna teaches us how to move into the fourth and fifth dimensions by mastering our emotions.

title: Symbols, Patterns, & Gnosis
body: Our daily life experiences could represent symbolic codes or signs with deeper meaning. Are we tapping into precognitive patterns that are manifestations of collective consciousness? An esoteric researcher and founder of the Gnostic Reclamation Press, Jason James Bickford discusses Gnostic philosophy, precognition, and the intrinsic connections between them. Bickford also explains his Unified Code Theory, which describes the order of the universe, the predictive programming we see in Hollywood, and perhaps even the future.
teaser: Our daily life experiences could represent symbolic codes or signs with deeper meaning. Jason James Bickford discusses Gnostic philosophy, precognition, and the intrinsic connections between them.

title: Forgotten Fragments from the Fertile Crescent
body:
Could the secrets of humanity be written in the past? Analyzing breakthroughs in archaeology and his studies of sacred texts, forgotten tablets, and mysterious megaliths, author and researcher Matthew LaCroix explains the significance of different ancient civilizations on Earth.
